name: La Femme Prada L'Eau Eau de Toilette, 100ml
description: La Femme Prada is an invitation to emotion: straying from Italian Fashion House’s more familiar routes, this is a sultry scent, evoked by its frangipani wake. It has a hyper-sensual floral aroma, interwoven with ylang-ylang, and a spicy, vetiver finish that grounds is a luxurious feeling. The golden metal bottle and delicate pink Saffiano leather, which bears the Prada heritage crest ensure it makes a treasured gift.

name: Good Girl Légère Eau de Parfum, 80ml
description: Carolina Herrera's Légère Parfum represents the essence of a modern, chic woman. The fragrance is lighter and smoother than its original counterpart, featuring notes of tonka, aromatic wood and soft Dulce de Leche. It's presented in the signature stiletto shoe bottle, coloured to a stunning shade of blue that slowly fades to a clear base, complemented by a golden heel.

name: White & Black Striped Tie-front Shirt
description: Part of the label's contemporary Runway collection, this Striped Shirt showcases Demna Gvasalia's off-beat approach. It is crafted from burgundy cotton poplin with a classic point-collar, dropped shoulders, featuring a black long-sleeved T-shirt that drapes around the shoulders. Team it along with printed pants from the collection.

name: Clarifying Lotion 0, 400ml
description: Clinique’s Clarifying Lotion is Step 2 in the brand’s customised 3-Step Skin Care System. This dermatologist-developed liquid exfoliating lotion clears the way for smoother, brighter skin. Its gentle, refreshing formula sweeps away pollution, grime, dulling flakes to reveal a smoother, clearer complexion. Skin is perfectly prepped and more receptive to hydration and treatment products. For oilier skins, twice-daily exfoliation helps minimise excess oil and keep pores clear. For drier skins, twice-daily exfoliation helps remove surface flakes that can be a barrier to moisture absorption.

name: Mini Max White Rhino Candle
description: Baobab's Mini Max candles infuse any room with gorgeous, long-lasting aromas thanks to its single wick composition. This White Rhino scent has rich woody notes with a zing of citrus, a sharp hint of strong cedar, and a top note of santal vetyver - inspired by enchanting African scenes.

name: Mini Max Zanzibar Spices Candle
description: Baobab's Mini Max candles infuse any room with gorgeous, long-lasting aromas thanks to its single wick composition. This particular scent is a blend of delectable spices, like cinnamon of curcuma, an immediate voyage to the other side of the world.

name: Max One White Pearls Candle, 190g
description: Baobab's Max One candles infuse any room with gorgeous, long-lasting aromas thanks to its single wick composition. This particular White Pearls scent infuses romantic musk with luscious notes of jasmin - a fitting tribute to the beloved gemstone.

name: Gold & Silver Plated 2 Tier Stand
description: Make homes feel majestic with Accract's Gold & Silver Plated 2 Tier Stand. Plated with silver and gold, the stand exudes luxury. Place this on coffee tables or on shelves in the bedroom.

name: Platnium Stars Frame 8x10
description: L'Objet's Stars collection will Illuminate any living space instantly. Emulating centuries of fine jewelry design and technique, these meticulously handcrafted shimmer frames are adorned with Swarovski crystals, in platinum plating setting, beveled glass, satin lining and finished with Italian leather and suede backs with beautifully detailed closures. Treasure memories forever in these or use them for gifting.

name: Purple & Orange Lito Plate
description: Bring opulence to dining with this Lito Plate from L'Objet. This eye-catching plate is exquisitely crafted from Limoges porcelain and decorated with an eye, which is the surrealistic “talisman” of good luck and a traditional symbol of protection. Ideal for when entertaining, and is perfectly sized for mains or starters.

name: Rose Gold Slant Tweezer
description: Keep those eyebrows looking perfect with Tweezerman's Rose Gold Slant Tweezer. The stainless steel tweezers are designed for precise and expert eyebrow grooming. To make tweezing easier and painless, take a hot shower or use a warm cloth to open pores, and tweeze in the direction of hair growth.

name: Warm-Honey Touche Éclat Cushion Foundation
description: YSL Touche Éclat Cushion is the next generation foundation, with a sheer, buildable coverage, providing a fresh dewy glow. Formulated with the magical Touche Éclat formula, which is packed with golden pigments and antioxidants. The Vitamin E in the formula gives the cushion an anti-fatigue complex, soothes stressed skin and boosts micro-circulation, while the liquid gel technology fuses with clay on the skin for a natural finish.

name: French Leather Smooth Body Cream, 250ml
description: The Smooth Body Cream from Memo Paris is infused with the signature French Leather fragrance that eloquently captures the deceptively casual, nonchalant French spirit. The hydrating formula nourishes and moisturises skin, making it smooth and soft, while leaving behind a delicate aroma.

name: Almond Encre De Peau All Hours Extreme Foundation, 25ml
description: YSL's Encre De Peau All Hours Extreme Foundation has a 24-Hour advanced formula won’t cake, dry, flake or fade. Transfer-proof, oil-free and non-pore clogging, this foundation stands up to makeup meltdowns by combining flexible pigments and skin-loving ingredients for better flawless coverage and skin that feels fresh and comfortable day to night. Infused with a black tea anti-oxidant complex for additional skin care that combats the signs of dullness and fatigue, while protecting skin from pollution.

name: Warm-Bisque Encre De Peau All Hours Extreme Foundation, 25ml
description: YSL's Encre De Peau All Hours Extreme Foundation has a 24-Hour advanced formula won’t cake, dry, flake or fade. Transfer-proof, oil-free and non-pore clogging, this foundation stands up to makeup meltdowns by combining flexible pigments and skin-loving ingredients for better flawless coverage and skin that feels fresh and comfortable day to night. Infused with a black tea anti-oxidant complex for additional skin care that combats the signs of dullness and fatigue, while protecting skin from pollution.

name: Ivory All Hours Concealer, 5ml
description: Instantly blur eye imperfections, dark circles, and erase discoloration effortlessly with YSL's All Hours Concealer. It has an advanced 16-hour formula that will not cake, crease or fade nor will it accentuate the look of fine lines and wrinkles. The highly concentrated, flexible pigments provide a highly effective texture that hinders makeup meltdowns and resists fading, heat, humidity and touch.

name: Sleek Suede Eau de Parfum, 125ml
description: Bold spices and deep woody accords define the Sleek Suede Eau de Parfum, creating a fragrance that adds a layer of elegance to looks. Starting with a unique merge of nutmeg, pepper and cacao, the perfume's scent intensifies with notes of cedar, tobacco and patchouli. Just like its fragrance, Sleek Suede is presented in a luxurious bottle inspired by Morocco's rich culture.

name: Signature Conditioner, 30ml
description: Oribe's signature conditioner is a restorative daily moisturiser for hair. It's formulated with Hydrating polymers that help revive shine for lustrous, healthy looking locks. It also helps detangle for ease of combing throughout the day.

name: Green 04 Colour Control SOS Primer
description: Reach for perfection with Clarins SOS Primer, designed for dull and tired complexions and redness. The concealer diminishes all signs of fatigue and revitalises the complexion in a flash, offering a boot of radiance and brightening the face. Its fresh-feeling, flawless-effect formula contains High Lumitech complex to correct, revive and illuminate the complexion instantly. It is enriched with organic sea lily extract to deliver 24-hour hydration to the skin. While the fine, weightless texture lets skin breathe and is formulated with the Clarins anti-pollution complex to protect the skin from environmental damage.

name: Silverati Conditioner, 200ml
description: Oribe's Silverati Conditioner is a brightening, intensely-hydrating conditioner that banishes dullness and yellow tones. It hydrates hair and restores elasticity and shine. Use it with the Silverati Shampoo for better results.

name: Cool Honey Skin Long-Wear Weightless Foundation, 30ml
description: Bobbi Brown's Skin Long-Wear Weightless Foundation is a 16-hour wear, full-coverage foundation with a natural, multidimensional matte finish that’s comfortable, breathable and weightless. Created through a high-speed cold fusion process, this ultra-silky emulsion features a perfectly balanced blend of skin-loving ingredients, oil-controlling actives and skin-true pigments suspended in an emollient gel base that float on skin, reflecting light to enhance skin’s natural contours and dimension. Incredibly smooth and blendable, this sweat- and humidity-resistant foundation glides on with a second-skin feel, offering a natural, flexible coverage that won’t crease or streak.

name: Chestnut Skin Long-Wear Weightless Foundation, 30ml
description: Bobbi Brown's Skin Long-Wear Weightless Foundation is a 16-hour wear, full-coverage foundation with a natural, multidimensional matte finish that’s comfortable, breathable and weightless. Created through a high-speed cold fusion process, this ultra-silky emulsion features a perfectly balanced blend of skin-loving ingredients, oil-controlling actives and skin-true pigments suspended in an emollient gel base that float on skin, reflecting light to enhance skin’s natural contours and dimension. Incredibly smooth and blendable, this sweat- and humidity-resistant foundation glides on with a second-skin feel, offering a natural, flexible coverage that won’t crease or streak.

name: Warm Honey Skin Long-Wear Weightless Foundation, 30ml
description: Bobbi Brown's Skin Long-Wear Weightless Foundation is a 16-hour wear, full-coverage foundation with a natural, multidimensional matte finish that’s comfortable, breathable and weightless. Created through a high-speed cold fusion process, this ultra-silky emulsion features a perfectly balanced blend of skin-loving ingredients, oil-controlling actives and skin-true pigments suspended in an emollient gel base that float on skin, reflecting light to enhance skin’s natural contours and dimension. description: Bobbi Brown's Skin Long-Wear Weightless Foundation is a 16-hour wear, full-coverage foundation with a natural, multidimensional matte finish that’s comfortable, breathable and weightless. description: Bobbi Brown's Skin Long-Wear Weightless Foundation is a 16-hour wear, full-coverage foundation with a natural, multidimensional matte finish that’s comfortable, breathable and weightless. Created through a high-speed cold fusion process, this ultra-silky emulsion features a perfectly balanced blend of skin-loving ingredients, oil-controlling actives and skin-true pigments suspended in an emollient gel base that float on skin, reflecting light to enhance skin’s natural contours and dimension. name: Golden Skin Long-Wear Weightless Foundation, 30ml
description: Bobbi Brown's Skin Long-Wear Weightless Foundation is a 16-hour wear, full-coverage foundation with a natural, multidimensional matte finish that’s comfortable, breathable and weightless. Created through a high-speed cold fusion process, this ultra-silky emulsion features a perfectly balanced blend of skin-loving ingredients, oil-controlling actives and skin-true pigments suspended in an emollient gel base that float on skin, reflecting light to enhance skin’s natural contours and dimension. Incredibly smooth and blendable, this sweat- and humidity-resistant foundation glides on with a second-skin feel, offering a natural, flexible coverage that won’t crease or streak.

name: Cool Walnut Skin Long-Wear Weightless Foundation, 30ml
description: Bobbi Brown's Skin Long-Wear Weightless Foundation is a 16-hour wear, full-coverage foundation with a natural, multidimensional matte finish that’s comfortable, breathable and weightless. Created through a high-speed cold fusion process, this ultra-silky emulsion features a perfectly balanced blend of skin-loving ingredients, oil-controlling actives and skin-true pigments suspended in an emollient gel base that float on skin, reflecting light to enhance skin’s natural contours and dimension. Incredibly smooth and blendable, this sweat- and humidity-resistant foundation glides on with a second-skin feel, offering a natural, flexible coverage that won’t crease or streak.

name: Aqua Vitae Eau de Parfum Refills, 3 x 11ml
description: The irresistible Aqua Vitae Eau de Parfum by Maison Francis Kurkdjian awakens the senses and leaves a delicious whisper of scent on the skin. The enchanting formula is created with lemon from Calabria, mandarin from Sicily, and enhanced with hedione, vanilla absolute, tonka bean and guaiac wood.

name: Aqua Universalis Forte Eau de Parfum Refills, 3 x 11ml
description: Maison Francis Kurkdjian's luminous Aqua Universalis is a fragrance to be shared, with an ethereal trail that is the epitome of refinement. The brightness of a bouquet of lily-of-the-valley and mock orange, underscored by jasmine from Egypt. The freshness of bergamot from Calabria and lemon from Sicily, rounded out with sandalwood from India and clear, musky cedar wood.

name: À La Rose Scented Hand Cream, 70ml
description: The À La Rose scent created by Maison Francis Kurkdjian is an ode to femininity, a declaration of love translated into this hand cream. Two hundred and fifty freshly bloomed roses from Grasse offer their unequalled richness to the bottle, and will enhance the daily routine with a romantic aroma.

name: Oud Silk Mood Extrait de Parfum Refills, 3 x 11ml
description: Maison Francis Kurkdjian's Oud Silk Mood Refill set is reminiscent of an airy fragrance combining the rustle of silk and the soft touch of a rose petal. The invigorating combination of bergamot from Italy with blue chamomile from Morocco is lifted with rose from Bulgaria, and is grounded with an Indian papyrus base.

name: Gold Edition Globe Trotter Travel Spray Bottle
description: Much more than a spray, Maison Francis Kurkdjian's Globe Trotter is a metal case with a magnetised cap designed in sculptural and uncluttered shapes. Created to naturally fit in the hand, it shelters the 11ml perfume refills from the House's fragrance collection.

name: Aqua Universalis Forte Eau de Parfum, 70ml
description: Maison Francis Kurkdjian's luminous Aqua Universalis is a fragrance to be shared, with an ethereal trail that is the epitome of refinement. The brightness of a bouquet of lily-of-the-valley and mock orange, underscored by jasmine from Egypt. The freshness of bergamot from Calabria and lemon from Sicily, rounded out with sandalwood from India and clear, musky cedar wood. The hand-engraved bottle sits at the center of an immaculate case that was made in France and adorned with mirrors to enhance the precious perfume.

name: À La Rose Scented Hair Mist, 70ml
description: The À La Rose scent created by Maison Francis Kurkdjian is an ode to femininity, a declaration of love translated into a light hair spray. Two hundred and fifty freshly bloomed roses from Grasse offer their unequalled richness to the formula and will enhance the daily routine with a romantic aroma.

name: Aqua Universalis Scented Body Oil, 70ml
description: The moisturising and nourishing oil from Maison Francis Kurkdjian includes natural benefits and the notes of the signature Aqua Universalis fragrance. Formulated with extracts of seringa, delicately scented with bergamot from Calabria, lemon from Sicily, and jasmine from Egypt, the oil will enhance the everyday routine with an invigorating scent.

name: Amyris Femme Eau de Parfum, 200ml
description: The luminous Amyris Femme fragrance was born from the flamboyant encounter between Amyris tree from Jamaica and rare Iris from Florence. The floral yet woody scent is enhanced with juicy Californian orange notes, laced with Haitian vetiver and musky amber to create a bold contrast for the senses.

name: Oud Satin Mood Eau de Parfum, 70ml
description: Maison Francis Kurkdjian's Oud Satin Mood Eau de Parfum conveys a shimmering and desirable Oriental mood. The captivating combination of natural oud from Laos with rose essence from Bulgaria creates an invigorating contrast, while the soft benzoin from Siam compliments the violet and vanilla accords.

name: Saddle Powder Bronzer
description: Perfectly processed in a finely-milled formula, Anastasia Beverly Hills' Saddle Powder Bronzer seamlessly blends into the skin, building coverage and giving a beautiful warm, sun-kissed glow. With a natural matte, this rich bronzer feels traceless on the face and body. The perfect finishing touch to a daytime makeup look.

name: Soft Glam Eyeshadow Palette
description: The Soft Glam Eyeshadow Palette by Anastasia Beverly Hills features fourteen gorgeous shades in matte and shimmer finishes. The long-lasting, full-pigment shadows blend flawlessly and come in a balanced mix of bronze metallics and neutral mattes making this an absolute essential for the makeup kit. Perfect for daytime as well as evening gatherings.

name: Texture Tonic™, 125ml
description: Provide the hair with a natural, beachy texture with Aveda's Texture Tonic. Through texture tonic, straight hair can be transformed to beachy waves, enhanced texture or add light hold to fine, silky hair that may be generally hard to style. This tonic features Aveda's pure-fume aroma that boasts certified organic ginger, clary sage, ylang ylang and other pure plant and flower essences

name: Serpent Bohème S Motif Diamond Ring in 18kt Yellow Gold
description: Crafted from 18kt gold, Boucheron’s Serpent Bohème S Motif Diamond Ring is a subtle interpretation of the line’s aesthetic. Beautifully set with round-cut, pavé-set diamonds, the ring’s body is inspired by the rope chain motif. Its streamlined, slender shape lends an elegant appeal to day-to-night looks.

name: Rose-Gold & Diamond Eros Arrow Bangle
description: Bee Goddess enhances its repertoire of symbolic, memorable jewellery designs with this Eros Arrow Bangle. It is expertly crafted from polished 14kt rose gold for a sinuous shape encrusted with shimmering diamonds, appearing as if it is floating weightlessly on either side of the wrist. Wear it with a chic black dress to a summer party.

name: Goldfinger Oatmeal Lounge Chair
description: Jonathan Adler's Goldfinger Chair blends sleek geometry with chic natural tones. Crafted in bright polished brass and a luxe linen blend, this structured lounge chair has a 1970's feel that's very of-the-moment Complement the striking chair with a large curved floor lamp.

name: Gold Foil Tropical Palm Print
description: Give your walls a tropical flourish with this Gold Foil Palm Print from Eichholtz. The metallic gold foil has a modern feel, making this ideal for decorating a contemporary living or dining room.

name: Flaky And Itchy Scalp Shampoo, 250ml
description: Relieve the discomfort of a flaky and itchy scalp with Philip Kingsley’s award-winning shampoo. Its specially developed formulation quickly clears dandruff, without stripping colour or causing further irritation, leaving the scalp soothed and hair shiny and manageable.

name: La Vie Est Belle Eau de Parfum, 75ml
description: ‘La vie est belle’ is a French expression that translates to ‘life is beautiful’. This delicate scent makes it even more so, filling the air and lingering on the skin with notes of blackberry, pear and sparkling orange blossom. The fragrance is feminine and gentle, with unexpected depth and complexity.

name: Rose-Gold & Light-Blue Topaz Nudo Ring
description: Pomellato's most iconic ring, the Nudo, features an ultra-sleek design that's characterised by a 'nude' stone. The circular band features a faceted light-blue topaz at the centre. The gemstone has astounding clarity and reflects light beautifully. A refined finishing touch to everyday edits.

name: Phyto-Blanc Instant Lightening Serum
description: Phyto-Blanc Intensive Lightening Serum is an intensive serum that visibly brightens the skin and diminishes the look of dark spots. It contains a Vitamin C derivative, combined with Lemon, Scutellaria and White Mulberry extracts. In addition, a complex of essential oils, vitamins and natural extracts support a boost to the skin’s radiance. The skin is moisturised and the complexion appears luminous and evened. The fluid and light texture of Phyto-Blanc Intensive Lightening Serum is non-sticky and is quickly absorbed, leaving a matte, imperceptible veil on the skin.

name: Ecological Compound, 125ml
description: Sisley’s Ecological Compound is an essential, revitalising and hydrating skin care product. It’s formulated with a synergistic compound of plants, such as centella asiatica, ginseng, rosemary, hops, and horsetail, for their stimulating properties. Note the fluid, non-greasy texture that leaves skin with a matte appearance.

name: Stardust Slant Tweezer
description: Shape your eyebrows like a professional with the help of Tweezerman’s Stardust Slant Tweezer. The ultimate beauty tool, it has a 25-degree slanted tip that provides the perfect angle for shaping and precise hair removal.

name: Supremÿa Eyes at Night, 15ml
description: Target the eye contour area with Sisley’s Supremÿa Eyes at Night. Acting as the ultimate anti-aging treatment, it features phyto-complex LC12 (12h longevity concentrate) - a patented combination of 4 plant-based active ingredients that work best at night, the key period for cellular regeneration, to rejuvenate the eyes.

name: Ultra Precision Slanted Tweezer
description: Part of Tweezerman’s Ultra Precision series, these slanted tweezers allow you to reach the finest and hard-to-reach hairs. The finely hand-filed point is designed to precisley remove ingrown or fine stray hairs.

name: Sisleya L'Intégral Anti-Age Extra-Riche, 50ml
description: Sisley’s Sisleya L'Intégral Anti-Age Extra-Riche is formulated with intensive nourishing active ingredients and comes with a luxurious, creamy texture that hydrates dry skin with undeniable ease. It targets and yields impressive results on wrinkles, firmness, radiance, density, and hydration, preserving the skin's youthful appearance and beauty.

name: L'Autre Oud Eau de Parfum, 100ml
description: Assemblage of 17 raw materials to recompose a deep Oud Wood enchanted by an Incense Rose signature. The most precious golds of the Perfumer's palette blend together to create a dark and leathery Oud accord, between spicy undertones of Cypriol and deep shadows of Myrrh.

name: Assoluto Adhil Extrait de Parfum, 100ml
description: Adhil is the second fragrance from Tiziana Terenzi’s Assoluto perfume range. Inspired by the star of the Andromeda constellation, it is made from raw and precious ingredients. Top notes of cassis blend bExtraittifully with a heart of jasmine and base of amber and Australian sandalwood.

name: Terrybleu Mascara Terrybly
description: By Terry’s Mascara Terrybly in Terrybleu is an effective way to enhance sparse, short and fragile lashes. Each hair is covered in voluminising pigment, while lash-enhancing ingredients stimulate strength and growth. Glide the wand slowly from roots to tips, to achieve length and volume.

name: Rouge Initiation Rouge Expert Click Stick Hybrid Lipstick
description: By Terry's 3-in1 Hybrid Lipstick in Rouge Initiation provides the precision of a pencil, with the rich pigment of a lip colour, and the conditioning nourishment of a balm. Achieve a bold, long-lasting look with just one click.

name: Dark Purple Rouge Expert Click Stick Hybrid Lipstick
description: By Terry's 3-in1 Hybrid Lipstick in Dark Purple provides the precision of a pencil, with the rich pigment of a lip colour, and the conditioning nourishment of a balm. Achieve a bold, long-lasting look with just one click.

name: Rose-gold B.zero1 Pendant With Pavé Diamonds Necklace
description: Exuding ethereal charm, Bulgari's B.zero1 Pendant With Pavé Diamonds Necklace elegantly nods to the geometric lines of modern Italian design, fused with Roman-inspired elements. Expertly crafted from 18kt rose gold, the pendant is beautifully decorated in sparkling pavé-set diamonds on the edges, and is suspended from an elegant chain. It will lend a charming appeal to day to night looks.

name: Rose-Gold & Malachite Serpenti Sautoir Necklace
description: The Serpenti Seduttori Necklace is imbued with Bulgari's sense of forbidden allure. The delicate 18kt rose-gold chain is punctuated with colourful malachite gemstones and snake head motifs, which represent vitality, wisdom and seduction in this charming creation.

name: White-gold B.zero1 Pendant With Pavé Diamonds Necklace
description: Exuding ethereal charm, Bulgari's B.zero1 Pendant With Pavé Diamonds Necklace elegantly nods to the geometric lines of modern Italian design, fused with Roman-inspired elements. Expertly crafted from 18kt white-gold, the pendant is beautifully decorated in sparkling pavé diamonds on the edges. Suspended from an elegant chain, it will lend a charming appeal to day to night looks.

name: Rose-Gold & Black Ceramic B.zero1 Cuff Bracelet
description: Nourished by deep Roman roots, Bulgari's B.zero1 Cuff Bracelet blends daring combinations of classic shapes with precious metals. The elegant accessory comprises a polished rose-gold outer enclosing a black ceramic inner band, which creates a stunning design suitable for evening occasions.

name: Amber Sky, 50ml
description: Inspired by sunsets, the Amber Sky fragrance by Ex Nihilo is a sensual scent that combines woody notes of cedar, sandalwood and vanilla with an edge of sensuality.

name: Venenum Kiss, 50ml
description: The Venenum Kiss by Ex Nihilo is a hypnotic mist that brings forward an amalgamation of apricot and vanilla with a breath of rose and saffron. The fragrance leaves a strong feeling with its electric intensity.

name: Golden Beige Terrybly Densiliss Anti-Wrinkle Serum Foundation
description: A hybrid of a fluid foundation with a wrinkle-control serum, By Terry’s Terrybly Densiliss formula is an innovative product that will instantly become a favourite in your makeup edit. The high-performance, anti-ageing ingredients firm the skin and smooth fine lines and wrinkles away, while also evening out skin tone for a youthful radiance with a beautifully natural, matte finish.

name: Venice Peacock Lampert Three Seater Sofa
description: Add a touch of Chinoise elegance to your home interior with Jonathan Adler's k Lampert Three Seater Sofa. Crafted in a low-pile cotton velvet with a slight luxe sheen, the double row of nickel nail heads along the arms will lend an air of sophistication to your living space. Simply place in your living room and accessorise with patterned cushions to create a modern focal point.

name: Thé Russe No.75 Candle, 350g
description: The L’OBJET Thé Russe No.75 Candle holds the power to recapture powerful memories with its enveloping scent. Blended and poured by hand, it is created from an uplifting blend of natural oils and essences to burn and create an aromatic nirvana in your home.

name: Mamounia No.28 Candle, 350g
description: The L’OBJET Mamounia No.28 Candle holds the power to recapture powerful memories with its enveloping scent. Blended and poured by hand, it is created from an uplifting blend of natural oils and essences to burn and create an aromatic nirvana in your home.

name: Camouflage Shirt
description: Sacai’s Camouflage Shirt is an edgy and novel take on a classic. It’s shaped with short, capped sleeves, a drawstring waist, and layered details that fall longer at the back. Style with the matching skirt for a coordinated look, day or night.

name: Rose-Gold B.zero1 Pendant With Chain
description: Bulgari's expertly crafted B.zero1 Pendant With Chain is inspired by modern geometries of Italian designs. This 18kt pink-gold design showcases a polished pendant inspired by the arcs of the Roman Colosseum, and is suspended from a elegant chain to gracefully accent the neckline of evening looks.

name: Ambre Candle, 190g
description: Experience the captivating scent of the Orient with Diptyque's Ambre Candle. The fragrance is created using woody vetiver and patchouli with a harmonious blend of spices and incense that will exude an enveloping opulence in any room.

name: Ambre Cognac Candle, 300g
description: Experience the captivating scent of the Orient with Diptyque's Ambre Candle. The fragrance is created using woody vetiver and patchouli with a harmonious blend of spices and incense that will exude an enveloping opulence in any room. It's presented in a cognac-coloured glass container.

name: Yvresse Eau de Toilette, 80ml
description: YSL’s Yvresse is a sophisticated and elegant fragrance that calls upon fruity notes of nectarine and lychee, and the floral yet mellow violet blossom. The sensual base liberates the senses and lingers all-day long.

name: Amethyst  Caviar Stick Eye Colour
description: The Caviar Stick Colour by Laura Mercier gives you an easy way to do a smokey eye. The stick allows smooth gliding over the lids thanks to its creamy rich-pigment formula. It’s a perfect option for any eyelid thanks to the transfer-and crease-resistant formula.

name: Copper Caviar Stick Eye Colour
description: The Caviar Stick Colour by Laura Mercier gives you an easy way to do a smokey eye. The stick allows smooth gliding over the lids thanks to its creamy rich-pigment formula. It’s a perfect option for any eyelid thanks to the transfer-and crease-resistant formula.

name: Eau du Soir Perfumed Deodorant, 150ml
description: Sisley’s quick-drying deodorant is subtly scented with the label's Eau du Soir fragrance. It has an alcohol-based formula that provides immediate and fresh protection all-day long.

name: Gold Woman Eau De Parfum, 100ml
description: Gold Woman was the first fragrance created by Amouage. The perfumer Guy Robert designed the scent in 1983 as an intensive floral aroma that has elegant evenings and special occasions in mind.

name: The Man From Ipanema, Eau De Parfum, 100ml
description: The Fragrance Kitchen’s The Man From Ipanema is a tribute to Rio. It releases a fresh mix of spices and citrus notes, and is embellished with sweet floral accords. Spray it to be transported instantly to the beaches of Brazil.

name: Bracken Eau de Parfum, 100ml
description: Bracken for men by Amouage is an elegant Fougère unveiling the aromatic vibrancy of bright and fresh citrus notes, accented with exotic spices. The mesmerising perfume evolves into cinnamon, cedarwood and sandalwood at its heart before revealing patchouli and musk in the drydown as an enigmatic signature.

name: Fair Glow Crema Nuda Reviving Tinted Cream, 50ml
description: Improve skin radiance and reveal younger looking skin with Armani Beauty's Crema Nuda Reviving Tinted Cream. The specially blended formula contains Armani’s exclusive anti-aging complex Reviscentalis, whilst Hyaluronic acid and mannose extracts perfect the skin by adding deep hydration with a weightless feel.

name: Noir Supreme Kajal D'orient
description: With a sleek contemporary design, the Kajal D’orient stick by Laura Mercier allows for an easy and comfortable application to the eyes. Create a smoldering smoky eye or simply glide on the inner waterline for a simple look.

name: Bois D'Encens Eau de Parfum, 50ml
description: Sharp and spiritual, Giorgio Armani’s Prive Bois D'Encens Eau de Parfum showcases Somalian Incense, a reflection of the hours Giorgio Armani spent with his grandmother in Italian churches. A reinvented version of the oldest known perfume in the world, Kyphi, it balances the essence and pure incense of woody smells, sumptuously enhanced with vetiver for its dark, warm root, and cedar for its beige and mild scent.

name: Mascara Eccentrico
description: A high-volume, long-wear mascara, Giorgio Armani’s Eccentrico Mascara results in precise separation with stunning results. Built with a red, elastomer, and velco brush for fullness and definition in a flake, clump, and smudge-free blend, this intense, obsidian-black formula is the one you’ve been waiting for.

name: Dinky Chain Strap
description: Inject new life into a favourite handbag by simply changing the detachable strap for the Dinky Chain Strap. The curb-chain in dark gunmetal lends edgy elegance to a casual or evening ensemble. There's freedom of style too: , wear it short or long on the shoulder, or crossbody style.

name: Shagreen Coasters, Set of 4
description: These shagreen embossed coasters, with their gold-tone brass hardware detailing, will add an opulent touch to the drinks table. They come in a matching protective packaging that will add a distinctive touch to the bar tray.

name: Vit C Brightening Cleanser, 135ml
description: Rodial's Vit C Brightening Cleanser is an intensive, non-abrasive daily gel cleansing formula to improve skin texture and brighten the complexion. It's a super brightening wake up call for the skin with a complex combination of Vitamin C and exfoliating fruit AHAs to deeply cleanse skin, purifying and tightening pores. Skin is more even-toned and brighter with a more refined complexion providing a youthful glow.

name: Cologne Indelebile Perfume Spray, 50ml
description: Frédéric Malle produces a perfume both innocent and irresistible with Cologne Indelebile Perfume Spray. It's split between a clean cologne accord of lemon, bergamot and orange blossom, and a seductive white musk accord. Its staggering concentration of musk overcomes the transient nature of an eau de cologne and renders the perfume indestructible.

name: Lys Mediterranee Perfume, 50ml
description: Exuding the scent of a floral sea breeze, Frédéric Malle's Lys Mediterranee Perfume is inspired by gusts of ocean air infused with salty spice of ginger lilies. Reinforcing these salty notes and sweetening them with orange blossom, the radiant perfume is perfect for sun-soaked days and balmy nights at getaways.

name: Dans Tes Bras Perfume, 100ml
description: >Frédéric Malle’s Dans Tes Bras Perfume is formulated with cashmeran, which performs like a vibrating musk, is crowned with violet, warmed by heliotrope and imbued with the saltiness of moist skin. With hints of sandalwood, which adds a milky softness, and white musk, a clean magnetism, evokes a familar scent appeal.

name: Une Rose Perfume, 30ml
description: Edouard Fléchier’s Une Rose combines the voluptuousness of the flower with the carnal depth of a truffle accord. A fruit and honey burst of Turkish rose absolute is punctuated with geranium and wine dregs. Vetiver, patchouli and castoreum create an intimate link between the wearer’s skin and the vegetal fragrance of the flower. Une Rose seems to emanate from the skin, the intoxicating earthy aroma of a garden rose plucked from the ground by its root – that is Une Rose. A virtuoso rose.

name: Yellow-Gold & Diamond Mini Heart Pinky Ring
description: Part of the label's cable collectibles, this Mini Heart Pinky Ring will make a playful addition to weekend or evening ensembles. It is expertly crafted by skilled artisans from 18kt yellow-gold with a mini heart encrusted with diamonds totalling 0.03ct. Let it make a statement solo, or coordinate it with other feminine designs.

name: Ultra Light Daily UV Defense, 60ml
description: Kiehl's Ultra Light Daily UV Defense is a lightweight facial sunscreen with SPF 50 PA ++++ that helps provide protection against environmental aggressors and premature signs of ageing.The daily non-comedogenic sunscreen provides all-day hydration and absorbs quickly into the skin.

name: Black & Champagne Sweetie Glitter Acrylic Clutch
description: Jimmy Choo's Sweetie Glitter Clutch is a statement must-have from the label's coveted collection. This structured style is designed with ribbed acrylic panelling in dark-tone glitter. It is finished with an internal side slit pocket for holding small essentials securely. Carry it with ethereal evening gowns.

name: Damage Remedy™ Intensive Restructuring Treatment, 25ml
description: Demonstrating Aveda's commitment to using the powerof natural ingredients, this Damage Remedy™ Intensive Restructuring Treatment looks to quinoa protein to strengthen damaged hair with deep repair. It's also infused with a blend of pure plant oils, including jojoba, for long lasting smoothness and softness.

name: Pure Abundance™ Volumising Shampoo, 250ml
description: A daily cleanser with certified organic acacia gum, Aveda's Pure Abundance™ Volumising Shampoo builds body and volume. It's formulated with kaolin clay and acacia gum, which helps hair look more full and bouncy. Perfect for those with fine, limp or thin hair.

name: Scandal Eau De Toilette, 50ml
description: Jean Paul Gaultier presents a Parisian femininity loosened up by the spirit of Pigalle - beloved by the man himself - in the Scandal Scent. The delicious fresh honey is fused with the wonderful aroma of gardenia and blood orange, and anchored by sensual and scandalous honey and patchouli.

name: Bois D'Hiver, 50ml
description: Ex Nihilo's Bois D'Hiver is a musky scent at heart that brings forward an urban take on the classic woody fragrance. A must-have, this scent blends smoothly and leaves a long-lasting freshness.

name: Oud Vendome Eau de Parfum, 100ml
description: Oud Vendôme by EX NIHILO is a delicious fusion of oriental and Parisian elements, illustrating the East and the West colliding in the middle of Place Vendôme. The fragrance opens with a spicy touch of saffron blended with ginger and cinnamon, giving a firey redolence to the scent. The precious accord of Agarwood is enhanced by a heart of galbanum and cedar wood and is wrapped into a musky cocoon for added sensuality.

name: Cologne 352, 50ml
description: Surprising, addictive and mysterious, Cologne 352 by Ex Nihilo brings a splash of lemon with an ornage blossom and a classic cedar wood in the backdrop for an intense, fortifying scent.

name: Cologne 352 Eau de Parfum, 100ml
description: Cologne 352 Eau de Parfum is a signature of EX NIHILO'S Parisian address Rue Saint-Honoré. The delicate, exquisitely addictive fragrance has a gentle splash of Italian lemon that rises into an orange blossom heart and is balanced by the abundant base of white cedar wood, gaiac wood and white musk- reminiscent of a morning walk in the Tuileries’ garden.

name: Original Collection X Masculine Edition, 100ml
description: Clive Christian's 'X Masculine' perfume is inspired by the rich spices brought along by the Silk Road. The fragrance opens to an explosive blend of spicy cardamom, pepper, ginger and bergamot, before mellowing to floral heart notes of Iris. The scent finally wears down to earthy vetiver, sweetened by vanilla and elevated by cinnamon, reminiscent of a dewy ground at dawn.

name: Private Collection V Amber Fougere Perfume Spray, 50ml
description: Clive Christian's V Amber Fougere Perfume Spray celebrates the vitality of youth by weaving together distinctive scents. It's fiery pepper heart is enlivened with the sharp tang of citrus that immediately evokes the spice of the Orient, and is complemented perfectly by a warming base of Frankincense.

name: Private Collection E Green Fougere Perfume Spray, 50ml
description: Clive Christian's E Green Fougere Perfume is inspired by the opulent gardens of Buckingham Palace. The scent marries the illustrious heritage of a revered perfume house and its propensity for skilled artistry, and is made luminous with the fresh outdoorsy notes of rose, lavender and narcissus.

name: Gucci Oud, 50ml
description: Gucci Oud has a unique aroma that is suited for after-dark occasions. Opening with the fruity notes of pear and raspberry, the fragrance is evoked by floral notes of Bulgarian rose and orange flower, all of which are finally crowned with a natural oud oil.

name: Lipstick Rose Perfume, 30ml
description: Inspired by the very particular fragrance of his mother’s lipstick that he smelled when kissing her, Ralf Schwieger created Lipstick Rose. A perfume that is both regressive and a modern take on Hollywood glamor, Lipstick Rose smiles at you, like a dash of lipstick with its rose and violet-flavored candy scent. It embodies an alluring woman, part Gilda, part socialite. Grapefruit and violet enhance the fragrance’s rose note. The backdrop is musk and vanilla with a hint of vetiver and amber. A vision of glamorized femininity in technicolor.

name: Portrait Of A Lady Eau De Parfum, 100ml
description: The Portrait Of A Lady Eau De Parfum by Frédéric Malle stays true to its name. A boisterous flavour that combines the classic rose with urban spices redefines power. With a dash of Turkish rose and cinnamon, the essence stands for self-expression and modernity.

name: Portrait Of A Lady Eau De Parfum, 50ml
description: The Portrait Of A Lady Eau De Parfum by Frédéric Malle stays true to its name. A boisterous flavour that combines the classic rose with urban spices redefines power. With a dash of Turkish rose and cinnamon, the essence stands for self-expression and modernity.

name: Cleanser, 150ml
description: Dr. Barbara Sturm’s soft and fine cleansing foam provides gentle yet deep cleansing without upsetting the skin’s natural moisture balance. Nurturing ingredients and mild tensides free the skin gently of superfluous fat and environmental residues. The formula also perfectly prepares the skin and opens its pores, so that active ingredients during the following skincare routine can be optimally and deeply absorbed.

name: Yellow-Gold & White-Enamel Al Hobb Bracelet
description: This striking bracelet captures the arresting mood of Bil Arabi's captivating designs. Expertly crafted from polished 18kt yellow-gold, it is adorned with an enamel disc decorated with Arabic calligraphy. Wear as an opulent finishing touch to everyday ensembles.

name: 2C Light Flawless Fusion Concealer
description: Laura Mercier's Flawless Fusion Concealer seamlessly covers under-eye darkness and reduces discolouration. The lightweight formula provides all-day hydration and blends smoothly into skin, creating a crease-resistant, natural finish. Designed with Skin Fusion Technology, flexible water-resistent polymers adhere to the surface of the skin, effortlessly lasting throughout humid, warm-weather days.

name: 4N Fair Flawless Fusion Ultra Longwear Concealer
description: Laura Mercier's Flawless Fusion Ultra Longwear Concealer seamlessly covers under-eye darkness and reduces discolouration. The lightweight formula provides all-day hydration and blends smoothly into skin, creating a crease-resistant, natural finish. Designed with Skin Fusion Technology, flexible water-resistent polymers adhere to the surface of the skin, effortlessly lasting throughout humid, warm-weather days.

name: Bisous Orange Sheer Voile Lip Colour
description: Christian Louboutin's Sheer Voile Lip Colour adds luminous shine to the lips. Offering a creamy smooth and nourishing sensation, the impactful colours accents lips with natural radiance. It also offers effective protection against dryness, thanks to the complex of natural oils and seed butters. The bottle design is Inspired by Middle Eastern antiquities and the Art Deco movement, reminiscent of a precious vial. The turret-like crown cap is topped with a small ring threaded with a silk ribbon, turning the lip colour into a necklace.

name: Serpent Bohéme Toi et Moi Mother of Pearl S Motifs Ring in 18kt Yellow Gold
description: Part of the Serpent collection first designed in 1870, delicately sculpted details come together with fine Italian craftsmanship in this Boucheron Toi et Moi Ring. Offering an enhanced finishing touch to sophisticated looks, the 18kt gold sculpted body subtly evokes the scales of a snake. The two heads of the white mother-of-pearl snake come together in Toi et Moi while faceted pear-cut stones add extra sparkle.

name: Yellow-Gold & Two-Stone Citrine Serpent Bohème Ring
description: Part of the Serpent collection with delicately sculpted details and exuding skilled, fine craftsmanship, this Two-Stone Ring will enhance the appeal of sophisticated, polished looks. The 18kt yellow-gold sculpted body subtly evokes the scales of a snake and delicately wraps around the finger. The Serpent Bohème ring adorned with two citrines captivates the beholder in the same way as does the mesmerizing gaze of a spirited woman. The pear-cut stones are faceted for extra sparkle.

name: Yellow-Gold & Two-Stone Malachite Serpent Bohème Ring
description: Part of the Serpent collection with delicately sculpted details and exuding skilled, fine craftsmanship, this Two-Stone Ring will enhance the appeal of sophisticated, polished looks. The 18kt yellow-gold sculpted body subtly evokes the scales of a snake, while the curved lines are adorned with malachite. The pear-cut malachites stones are faceted for extra sparkle. Wear it alongside coordinating styles from the collection, paired with a white shirt and tailored pants.

name: Invati Advanced™ Thickening Conditioner, 200ml
description: Aveda's new Invati Advanced™ conditioner instantly thickens and delivers weightless conditioning to help protect the hair from breakage. Naturally derived amino acids mimic hair’s building blocks to help strengthen hair from roots to ends. Hair is left thicker with fullness that lasts all day.

name: Grey Suede Maureen Mules
description: Part of the classic collection, Malone Souliers' iconic Maureen Mules are reiterated in soft suede for contemporary styling. They're designed with a sleek point-toe silhouette that's further detailed with opulent metallic arch straps to keep feet secure. Team this elegant pair with sleek separates for a sophisticated look.

name: Fuchsia Intime Tatouage Couture Liquid Matte Lip Stain
description: YSL's Tatouage Couture Liquid Matte Lip Stain is a revolutionary formula that offers ultra-matte, high-impact, long-lasting colour. The richly pigmented lip stain effortlessly glides onto the lips and quickly dries down to a lightweight, transfer-free layer that lasts up to eight hours. The brand-exclusive applicator combines the precision of a liner and the control of a brush for perfectly defined lips, every single time.

name: Splendida Magnolia Sensuel Eau De Parfum, 100ml
description: The Magnolia Sensuel from Bulgari's Splendida collection is an opulent tribute to feminine beauty. The fragrance is inspired by the delicacy of the flower that inspired it, expertly blending magnolia essence with hints of mandarin and orange flower absolute. The sweetness of vanilla and minty patchouli make a lavish base for this luxuriously graceful Eau De Parfum.

name: Le Gemme Reali Nylaia Eau de Parfum, 100ml
description: The luminous Nylaia Eau de Parfum is one of Bulgari’s signature scents from the Le Gemme Reali collection. This delicate fragrance embodies the charm of precious gems and draws inspiration from Kashmir, the land of beautiful sapphires. The Nylaia features light floral notes of blue Iris and jasmine that unfold to a white musk base that lingers on throughout the day.

name: Oud Rose Candle in Metal Container, 330g
description: Elevate the ambience of your home with the Oud Rose candle from Lava. Infused with a luxurious florall blend, the fragrance centres around the sugary note of vanilla reminiscent of sweet ice-cream with hints of raspberry, geranium and patchouli accords. It comes in an elegant container with a lid, making it a refined decorative accessory when not in use.

name: Moment Douillet Cube
description: The Moment Douillet Rectangle Scented Candle is the ultimate accessory for indulgent and well-deserved moments of relaxation. This stylish geometric-inspired candle disperses an inviting and warm aroma. Soft notes of caramel, hazelnut and cinnamon mingle with gently spiced ginger and sweet vanilla.

name: Nomade Eau de Parfum, 50ml
description: Chloé’s captivating Nomade Eau De Parfum perfectly captures a contemporary yet confident feminine essence. This inspiring scent strikes the perfect balance between sweet notes of cherry plum, freesia and is enhanced with the intensity of oakmoss for a beautiful combination of different elements. Evoking a romantic spirit that is a wonderful mix of fantasy and reality.

name: SF1 Formentera True Skin Serum Foundation, 30g
description: ILIA's True Skin Serum Foundation is a complexion-perfecting, serum-infused foundation that’s equal parts skincare and colour correction. It weightlessly delivers buildable medium coverage with a lustrous finishwhile nourishing with a powerful blend of botanical actives that leaves skin feeling like silk. Aloe leaf, rose hip, jojoba and marula oils soothe irritations tame redness, plump fine lines, and ensure the formula effortlessly melts into skin for a more even, luminous appearance. Blurs imperfections and diminishes pores for a complexion that looks refined and refreshed.

name: Silver & Gold Stackable Cuff
description: Each Azza Fahmy piece is exquisitely crafted by skilled artisans using precious metals and gemstones. This Stackable Cuff features an engraved sterling silver band that's edged with gold, and finished with sparkling amethysts that are encircled with white diamonds. Match it with sleek separates to add a luxe touch to everyday dressing.

name: Reddish Berry Hot Velour Extreme Lipstick
description: Laura Mercier introduces the Velour Extreme Matte Lipsticks, which provide full-coverage in a single-stroke. With a long-lasting, creamy finish, this intense shade comes in a sleek slimline design, along with a built-in sharpner that customises the tip for precision lining and detailed filling. It's innovative matifying powders and nourishing conditioners will ensure a comfortable finish without dry and resist cracking for all-day wear.

name: Chocolate Fierce Velour Extreme Lipstick
description: Laura Mercier introduces the Velour Extreme Matte Lipsticks, which provide full-coverage in a single-stroke. With a long-lasting, creamy finish, this intense shade comes in a sleek slimline design, along with a built-in sharpner that customises the tip for precision lining and detailed filling. It's innovative matifying powders and nourishing conditioners will ensure a comfortable finish without dry and resist cracking for all-day wear.

name: Medium-Beige Nude Vibe Velour Extreme Lipstick
description: Laura Mercier introduces the Velour Extreme Matte Lipsticks, which provide full-coverage in a single-stroke. With a long-lasting, creamy finish, this intense shade comes in a sleek slimline design, along with a built-in sharpner that customises the tip for precision lining and detailed filling. It's innovative matifying powders and nourishing conditioners will ensure a comfortable finish without dry and resist cracking for all-day wear.

name: Neon Orange Onpoint Velour Extreme Lipstick
description: Laura Mercier introduces the Velour Extreme Matte Lipsticks, which provide full-coverage in a single-stroke. With a long-lasting, creamy finish, this intense shade comes in a sleek slimline design, along with a built-in sharpner that customises the tip for precision lining and detailed filling. It's innovative matifying powders and nourishing conditioners will ensure a comfortable finish without dry and resist cracking for all-day wear.

name: Re-Nutriv Ultimate Lift Regenerating Youth Eye Creme Rich, 15ml
description: Estee Lauder's Re-Nutriv Ultimate Lift Regenerating Youth Eye Crème is designed to offer the eyes with the best. It is infused with powerful Ultimate Lift technologies and intensive nourishment for the delicate eye area. The formula results in a more lifted appearance, whilst resisting future signs of ageing. It also reduces puffiness and dark circles. The vital radiance of youthful eyes is regenerated.

name: Guilty Absolute Pour Femme Eau de Parfum, 50ml
description: Born out of a special collaboration between Creative Director Alessandro Michele and master perfumer Alberto Morillas, Gucci Guilty Absolute Pour Femme is created using a unique blend that remains unchanged from the first time it is applied to the skin. The fragrance’s composition is intensified with patchouli oils and Bulgarian rose, while GoldenWood® is complemented with a mysterious note of blackberry, creating a contemporary chypre fruity fragrance.

name: Blackberry Plushies Lipstick
description: Lime Crime's recently introduced range of Plushies Lipsticks is a new generation of nude cosmetics that offer a luxuriously plush yet playful finish to the lips. The non-opaque, soft focus formula enhances natural lip colour and is comfortable to wear all-day with a touch-proof finish. With one coat achieve a smooth gloss, or apply twice for more intensity. Infused with a nostalgic blackberry candy scent, allow them to enhance the natural lip colour and add a delicious aroma. Simply wear with liner or under lip gloss.

name: Cherry Soda Plushies Lipstick
description: Lime Crime'srecentlyintroduced range of Plushies Lipsticks is a new generation of nude cosmetics that offer a luxuriously plush yet playful finish to the lips. The non-opaque, soft focus formula enhances natural lip colour and is comfortable to wear all-day with a touch-proof finish. With one coat achieve a smooth gloss, or apply twice for more intensity. Infused with a nostalgic blackberry candy scent, allow them to enhance the natural lip colour and add a delicious aroma. Simply wear with liner or under lip gloss.

name: Cola Plushies Lipstick
description: Lime Crime'srecentlyintroduced range of Plushies Lipsticks is a new generation of nude cosmetics that offer a luxuriously plush yet playful finish to the lips. The non-opaque, soft focus formula enhances natural lip colour and is comfortable to wear all-day with a touch-proof finish. With one coat achieve a smooth gloss, or apply twice for more intensity. Infused with a nostalgic blackberry candy scent, allow them to enhance the natural lip colour and add a delicious aroma. Simply wear with liner or under lip gloss.

name: Hair Rituel Revatilizing Scalp Fortifying Serum, 60ml
description: Hair Rituel By Sisley's Revitalizing Fortifying Serum for the scalp contributes to stronger and denser hair. Highly concentrated in plant-based extracts, proteins, vitamins and minerals, this fortifying serum invigorates the scalp, making the hair more resistant. Designed with a fresh fragrance to complement the effectiveness of the active ingredients.

name: Hair Rituel Revitalizing Volumising Shampoo, 200ml
description: Gently cleans the scalp and the hair while providing the necessary vitamins and minerals for vitality with Hair Rituel By Sisley's Revitalizing Volumising Shampoo. Its formula benefits from a combination of effective active ingredients targeting the hair bulb and the fibre, while the fresh fragrance complements the effectiveness of the active ingredients.

name: Gold Carrara Dual Tray
description: ANNA by RabLabs' charming Gold Carrara Dual Tray features a combination of Italian marble and gold-toned polished brass. The refined piece is the perfect accompaniment to contemporary home decor, and brings an air of decadence, whether it is used as a stand-alone accent on a console table or styled with additional gold decor pieces.

name: Gunmetal La Cire Candle
description: The bespoke Gunmetal La Cire Candle is part of the first fragrance collection from ANNA by RabLabs. Amber, cedar, sandalwood and musk notes seamlessly come together to create an oriental fragrance. The artistically handcrafted vessel is perfect to store personal treasures once the candle burns out.

name: Silver Torta Carrara Cake Plate
description: The classic Silver Torta Carrara Cake Plate from ANNA by RabLabs instantly elevates the appeal of baked goods, whether it stylishly displays a cake, cookies or Middle-Eastern treats. The smooth Italian marble exudes a luxe quality, while the silver-toned stand adds a contemporary aesthetic to tabletop decor. Pair with the matching cake server for the complete experience.

name: Soft Brown Brow Wiz® Eyebrow Pencil
description: The Soft Brown Brow Wiz® Eyebrow Pencil by Anastasia Beverly Hills leaves the brows fuller, filled with volume and a perfect arch that leaves you with a flawless finish. Use the spoolie to brush the hair and the pencil to create hair-like strokes.

name: Stripped Liquid Lipstick
description: Line the lips with the cult-favourite Stripped Liquid Lipstick by Anastasia Beverly Hills. The liquid matte lipstick leaves lips looking luscious with a smooth, matte finish that lasts for hours. Prep the lips with a lip primer and gently apply the liquid lipstick starting from the cupid's bow.

name: Sepia Liquid Lipstick
description: Anastasia Beverly Hills' Liquid Lipstick delivers full-pigment liquid lip colour along with smudge-proof, long-lasting wearability. Featuring ultra-saturated pigment in a comfortable matte formula, this lipstick features a double-sided flat applicator with a rounded tip that distributes the perfect amount of product and ensures precise lip colour application that lasts all day.

name: Dusty Rose Liquid Lipstick
description: Anastasia Beverly Hills' Liquid Lipstick delivers full-pigment liquid lip colour along with smudge-proof, long-lasting wearability. Featuring ultra-saturated pigment in a comfortable matte formula, this lipstick features a double-sided flat applicator with a rounded tip that distributes the perfect amount of product and ensures precise lip colour application that lasts all day.

name: Granite Brow Definer Eyebrow Pencil
description: Anastasia Beverly Hills' Brow Definer is an all-in-one triangular-tipped retractable eyebrow pencil to define, detail and fill in eyebrows. It features three different-sized edges and a soft, custom-built spoolie to perfectly blend for a natural-looking finish. Achieve hair like detail, shading, outlining, filling and defining with one multifunctional eyebrow tool.

name: Granite DIPBROW® Pomade, 4g
description: Long-lasting with a buildable formula, the Anastasia Beverly Hills DIPBROW® Pomade has been a cult favourite for years. This beautiful pomade's texture effortlessly blends into the eyebrows, drying down to a completely matte finish. A product used by industry professionals, it offers versatility in application to create natural, voluminous results.

name: Clear Brow Gel
description: Define and set brows with the Clear Brow Gel by Anastasia Beverly Hills. The lightweight formula holds the hair in place and leaves a clean, define look. Using an angled brush, dip into the brow gel and start by defining the arch, slowly into the ridge and finally all the way to the front.

name: Ebony Brow Wiz® Eyebrow Pencil
description: The Brow Wiz® Eyebrow Pencil by Anastasia Beverly Hills is an ultra-slim, retractable eyebrow pencil ideal for outlining and detailing brows with professional-quality precision. Its unique wax formula delivers a high colour payoff and adds natural-looking texture for the appearance of a fuller brow. The ultra-fine tip mimics hair-like strokes in sparse areas of the eyebrow, while the spoolie end blends for a natural-looking finish.

name: Sun Dipped Glow Kit
description: With a lightweight, refined formula, the Sun Dipped Glow Kit by Anastasia Beverly Hills provides an effortless, lavish illuminating finish. Each of the palette's four shades delivers buildable coverage with a luxurious, slightly metallic glow, which highlights the face beautifully. Ranging from a rose gold, bronze shade to a light quartz powder with a pearly shine, the palette is a perfect pick all year round.

name: Moonchild Glow Kit
description: The Moonchild Glow Kit by Anastasia Beverly Hills features six celestial shades for an outer-space luminosity. Take a damp sponge or makeup brush for precise application on the eyes, face or décolletage. Use a fan brush or a dome-shaped brush for precise application.

name: Staunch Matte Lipstick
description: The Staunch Matte Lipstick by Anastasia Beverly Hills pumps lips with a smooth, ultra matte pay-off that lasts longer. Pair this shade with a bronzed, sun-kissed look. Use a lip primer to lock moisture for a smooth, matte application.

name: Dusty Mauve Matte Lipstick
description: The Dusty Mauve Matte Lipstick by Anastasia Beverly Hills pumps lips with a smooth, ultra matte pay-off that lasts longer. Pair this hue with a brown smokey look. Use a lip primer to lock moisture for a smooth, matte application.

name: Soft Touch Matte Lipstick
description: Anastasia Beverly Hills Matte Lipstick is a full-pigment lip color with a smooth, ultra-matte finish. The creamy formulation effortlessly glides onto the lips, leaving behind rich colour that lasts longers. It is recommended to use a lip primer to lock in moisturise for a smooth appearance.

name: Grim Liquid Lips
description: A firm-favourite among beauty gurus, Anastasia Beverly Hills' Grim Liquid Lipstick is an absolute must-have in the makeup kit. The non-drying formula glides on effortlessly with a flat sponge-tip applicator and dries to a smudge-proof powder finish. Highly-pigmented and long-wearing, this matte liquid lipstick maintains its rich colour and stays put throughout the day.

name: Bittersweet Liquid Lips
description: Flaunt a gorgeous bold lip with Bittersweet Liquid Lips by Anastasia Beverly Hills. This rich, non-drying lipstick packs an intense pigment that delivers a brilliant brown-plum hue. Its natural oils moisturise the lips protecting against cracking or crumbling as the hours go by. The result - beautiful, matte lip colour that stays put all day.

name: Sunset Eye Shadow Singles
description: The Sunset Eyeshadow Singles by Anastasia Beverly Hills features a fine-milled powder eyeshadow packed in a custom, refillable palette. Use an eyeshadow brush to pick up the pigment. Tap to dust the excess off and sweep it across the crease.

name: Vermeer Eye Shadow Singles
description: The Vermeer Eye Shadow Singles by Anastasia Beverly Hills features a fine-milled powder eyeshadow packed in a custom, refillable palette. Use an eyeshadow brush to pick up the pigment. Tap to dust the excess off and sweep it across the crease.

name: Coral Candle
description: L'objet's Coral Candle brings back memories of tropical forests, adventures in the jungle and evokes a scent that exudes a whimsical journey. The candle features gold accents and an intoxicating essence.

name: Multi-Coloured Double G Stud Earrings
description: Gucci looks back to 1970s motifs for its delicate accessory edit, and these Running Stud Earrings are a striking example of that. They're meticulously crafted from 18kt yellow gold, feature a Double G motif with scalloped edges, and embellished with multi-coloured stones.

name: After Shave Energiser, 100ml
description: Clarins invigiorating post shave splash purifies and refreshes the skin. Formulated with blue Alpine, shea butter & Bison grass takes the heat off the burn.

name: Line-Control Balm, 50ml
description: Clarin's new blam reduces age related fine lines and wrinkles. Use in the morning after shaving and evening if skin is marked with wrinkles.

name: Mihana™ Pure-Fume™ Hair Mist
description: Add a new touch of luxury, shine, and sotness to hair with Aveda's Mihana™ Pure-Fume™ Hair Mist. It's scented formula is inspired by the forests and gardens of Japan, where citrus infuses with the spice aroma. It's quick-drying formula is a nourshing blend of jasmine, certified organic mandarian, clove and other pure flower and essences. Treat the hair with the best it deserves and let it breath its sensual aromas that won't collapse finished hair styles.

name: Off-White Ellipse Coarse Glitter Clutch
description: A simple yet an elegant choice for evening ensembles, Jimmy Choo's Ellipse Coarse GlitterClutchis a must-have for accessory edits. It's crafted in Italy from two resin shells, and linedwithluxurious nappa leather. Carry it by the detachable shoulder strap or on its own as a clutch.

name: Eau Rose Eau de Toilette, 100ml
description: Diptyque's Eau de Toilette leaves a rosy delicateness on the skin. It is composed with an infusion of the best roses in perfumery: damascena and centifolia, with slightly fruity accents and barely acidulated green notes. It is elegant homage to the entire rose flower, and includes pretty packaging making it a romantic gifting choice for Valentine’s day.

name: Golden Flawless Fusion Ultra-Longwear Foundation, 29ml
description: Laura Mercier's Flawless Fusion Foundation combines buildable coverage and high-performance wear into one weightless formula. It's waterproof, transfer resistant, impervious to sweat and doesn't oxidise. The foundation glides on, effortlessly evening out skin tone and minimises the look of pores and imperfections. The matte finish controls shine and the skin-fusion technology ensures 15 hours of flawless wear.

name: Butterscotch Flawless Fusion Ultra-Longwear Foundation, 29ml
description: Laura Mercier's Flawless Fusion Foundation combines buildable coverage and high-performance wear into one weightless formula. It's waterproof, transfer resistant, impervious to sweat and doesn't oxidise. The foundation glides on, effortlessly evening out skin tone and minimises the look of pores and imperfections. The matte finish controls shine and the skin-fusion technology ensures 15 hours of flawless wear.

name: Black Suede Peachy Sandals
description: This season, Jimmy Choo's iconic Peachy Sandals are reiterated with a suede finish to effortlessly complete curated outfits. The open-toe design is set atop a comfortable platform and elegantly secures at the ankle, while the block heel is perfect for all-day wear. Watch them add a refined touch to sleek separates and off-duty denim.

name: Red Bushy Brow Gel
description: Lime Crime's long-lasting Bushy Brow Gel is formulated for a super-strong yet flexible hold. It shapes, lifts and sets brows, keeping them in place all-day long. The custom-designed spoolie brush effortlessly coats each hair with the precise amount of product. Brush brows up for feathery fullness that also looks natural.

name: Dirty-Blonde Bushy Brow Gel
description: Lime Crime's long-lasting Bushy Brow Gel is formulated for a super-strong yet flexible hold. It shapes, lifts and sets brows, keeping them in place all-day long. The custom-designed spoolie brush effortlessly coats each hair with the precise amount of product. Brush brows up for feathery fullness that also looks natural.

name: Dubai Bahar Spray Perfume, 50ml
description: The Bahar Perfume by The Spirit of Dubai entails deep notes of patchouli and amber which mirror the depths of the seas, while the lighter notes comprise of lemon and bergamot, reminiscent of its cool breeze. This aquatic-woody scent awakens the senses and will make a perfect gift for someone special.

name: Eleventh Hour Eau de Parfum, 100ml
description: Byredo's Eleventh Hour is an exploration around the smell of the end of a story. The top notes, led by the peppery and citrus accents of Ban Timmur recreates the scenery of the Nepali highlands, where this plant grows. Wild fig is the heart note of Eleventh Hour, its sweet and captivating scent combines with the warmth of tonka beans and cashmeran woods.

name: Plum 03 MicroLiner Ink
description: Shiseido's foolproof eyeliner is inspired by sumi ink sticks used in traditional Japanese calligraphy. It is infused with high-impact pigments that deliver smudge-proof, saturated, matte color. The weightless, inky pencil features thermo-sensory technology that allows this formula to transform from a solid to a liquid upon contact with skin, creating a flexible, water-resistant film that lasts up to 24 hours. The micro-thin lead on this next-generation pencil can be dotted between lashes or glided across eyes with remarkable precision and no skipping.

name: White 05 MicroLiner Ink
description: Shiseido's foolproof eyeliner is inspired by sumi ink sticks used in traditional Japanese calligraphy. It is infused with high-impact pigments that deliver smudge-proof, saturated, matte color. The weightless, inky pencil features thermo-sensory technology that allows this formula to transform from a solid to a liquid upon contact with skin, creating a flexible, water-resistant film that lasts up to 24 hours. The micro-thin lead on this next-generation pencil can be dotted between lashes or glided across eyes with remarkable precision and no skipping.

name: Whisper 502 ModernMatte Powder Lipstick
description: Shiseido's non-drying formula delivers matte, full-coverage colour that feels utterly weightless and provides a powder-soft finish on lips. It is inspired by Tokyo’s vibrant nightlife, this statement-making lipstick provides eight hours of rich, velvety color. A unique blend of waxes and oils melts and transforms into an ultra-thin, featherweight powder, while spherical pigments float across lips to blur imperfections.

name: Nude Streak 503 ModernMatte Powder Lipstick
description: Shiseido's non-drying formula delivers matte, full-coverage colour that feels utterly weightless and provides a powder-soft finish on lips. It is inspired by Tokyo’s vibrant nightlife, this statement-making lipstick provides eight hours of rich, velvety color. A unique blend of waxes and oils melts and transforms into an ultra-thin, featherweight powder, while spherical pigments float across lips to blur imperfections.

description: Shiseido's non-drying formula delivers matte, full-coverage colour that feels utterly weightless and provides a powder-soft finish on lips. A unique blend of waxes and oils melts and transforms into an ultra-thin, featherweight powder, while spherical pigments float across lips to blur imperfections.

A unique blend of waxes and oils melts and transforms into an ultra-thin, featherweight powder, while spherical pigments float across lips to blur imperfections.

name: Exotic-Red 516 ModernMatte Powder Lipstick
description: Shiseido's non-drying formula delivers matte, full-coverage colour that feels utterly weightless and provides a powder-soft finish on lips. It is inspired by Tokyo’s vibrant nightlife, this statement-making lipstick provides eight hours of rich, velvety color. A unique blend of waxes and oils melts and transforms into an ultra-thin, featherweight powder, while spherical pigments float across lips to blur imperfections.

name: Daiya Fude Face Duo
description: This double-ended tool from Shiseido features a gel tip that mimics the effect of fingertips, while the red, diamond-cut brush was built for blending.The non-porous gel prevents product absorption while the bouncy texture precisely deposits pigment for full, even coverage.

name: Ruby-Red Code 221 VisionAiry Gel Lipstick
description: This long-lasting, full-coverage lipstick from Shiseido that stays put for six hours. It features innovative triple gel technology for high-impact, weightless colour. The water infused formula delivers a cooling sensation upon application, while the moisturising ingredients help keep lips feeling soft and hydrated.

name: Velvet-Red Scarlet Rush 204 VisionAiry Gel Lipstick
description: This long-lasting, full-coverage lipstick from Shiseido that stays put for six hours. It features innovative triple gel technology for high-impact, weightless colour. The water infused formula delivers a cooling sensation upon application, while the moisturising ingredients help keep lips feeling soft and hydrated.

name: Cranberry Shizuka-Red 223 VisionAiry Gel Lipstick
description: This long-lasting, full-coverage lipstick from Shiseido that stays put for six hours. It features innovative triple gel technology for high-impact, weightless colour. The water infused formula delivers a cooling sensation upon application, while the moisturising ingredients help keep lips feeling soft and hydrated.

name: Spiced-Pink J-Pop 210 VisionAiry Gel Lipstick
description: This long-lasting, full-coverage lipstick from Shiseido that stays put for six hours. It features innovative triple gel technology for high-impact, weightless colour. The water infused formula delivers a cooling sensation upon application, while the moisturising ingredients help keep lips feeling soft and hydrated.

name: Coral-Spark 306 LacquerInk LipShine Gloss
description: The high-intensity pigment of a lipstick meets the luminosity of a gloss in this featherweight formula from Shiseido that never leaves lips feeling dry or sticky. A custom, concave applicator hugs the contours of the mouth and dispenses the perfect amount of pigment that can be worn alone or layered over other lip products for extra dimension and sheen.

name: Rosewood Optic-Rose 309 LacquerInk LipShine Gloss
description: The high-intensity pigment of a lipstick meets the luminosity of a gloss in this featherweight formula from Shiseido that never leaves lips feeling dry or sticky. A custom, concave applicator hugs the contours of the mouth and dispenses the perfect amount of pigment that can be worn alone or layered over other lip products for extra dimension and sheen.

name: Peach Vinyl-Nude 311 LacquerInk LipShine Gloss
description: The high-intensity pigment of a lipstick meets the luminosity of a gloss in this featherweight formula from Shiseido that never leaves lips feeling dry or sticky. A custom, concave applicator hugs the contours of the mouth and dispenses the perfect amount of pigment that can be worn alone or layered over other lip products for extra dimension and sheen.

name: Solar Haze InnerGlow Cheek Powder
description: Shiseido's InnerGlow Cheek Powder is a blush and highlighter hybrid that's designed with a unique cream-powder matrix system that helps it stay put for up to eight hours. In addition to the high-colour payoff and superior glide, refined mica provides a natural glow from within. This feather-light formula delivers an instant, illuminating flush or a subtle shine without streaking.

name: Aura-Pink InnerGlow Cheek Powder
description: Shiseido's InnerGlow Cheek Powder is a blush and highlighter hybrid that's designed with a unique cream-powder matrix system that helps it stay put for up to eight hours. In addition to the high-colour payoff and superior glide, refined mica provides a natural glow from within. This feather-light formula delivers an instant, illuminating flush or a subtle shine without streaking.

name: Plum Blossom Kajal InkArtist Eye Pencil
description: Shiseido's Kajal InkArtist is a 4-in-1 eye pencil that acts as a eyeliner, kajal, eyeshadow, and brow colour. The smudge-proof, crease-proof, waterproof, and tear-proof formula provides high-impact pigment with an even glide. Its soft, graduated point is precise enough to create a thin line, and also wide enough to be easily swathed across the entire lid. A detachable sharpener maintains the tip for ultimate precision, while a built-in sponge can be used to blend for a seamless, smoky finish.

name: Chiyoko Minimalist WhippedPowder Blush
description: Shiseido's Minimalist WhippedPowder Blush uses breakthrough AirFusion Technology to blend seamlessly into skin. The mousse-like texture transforms into an ultra-thin, feather-light powder with a soft matte-finish that lasts up to eight hours

name: 01 ArchLiner Ink, 0.4ml
description: Shiseido's specially designed micro-fine, arched tip and ergonomic design create an entirely new-yet-intuitive gesture for applying eyeliner. Saturated with a high level of ultra-black pigment, this revolutionary flow-through liner delivers a precise, quick-dry formula that lasts up to 24 hours of waterproof, smudge-proof and tear-proof colour.

name: Blonde 01 Brow InkTrio
description: Shiseido's 3-in-1 tool features a slim, retractable pencil that defines and shapes brows, creating a natural look with ultra-fine hair-like strokes. The center opens to reveal a sponge-tip applicator pre-loaded with a featherweight powder that effortlessly fills in sparse areas and adds depth minus hard edges. Finally, a built-in brush conveniently blends and grooms for a polished finish. This long-wear formula resists sweat, smudging, and water.

name: Extra Rich Cleansing Milk, 125ml
description: A gentle foaming milk cleanser from Shiseido that effectively removes impurities, pollutants and makeup. It's moisturising ingredients remain on the skin for a refined, dewy and plumped feel. To be used daily, in the morning and evening as the first step in a skincare regimen.

name: Lunar Aura Dew Highlighter
description: Shiseido's multidimensional highlighter melds seamlessly with every skin tone. The formula features ultra-fine Japanese pearls suspended in a cushiony, transparent base. The revolutionary texture ensures that it stays put for 12 hours without caking and can be easily layered over the eye, lip, or cheek products without compromising color or adding weight.

name: Purifying Peel Off Mask, 100ml
description: Shiseido's refreshing and purifying rinse off clay mask helps absorb skin dulling impurities for skin that looks visibly refined and refreshed. The mask encourages the appearance of a flawless, rested-looking complexion with regular use. Skin is clarified and looks visibly awakened.

name: Treatment Softener Enriched, 150ml
description: Shiseido's 24-hour softening enriched lotion is filled with antioxidants, anti-aging and moisturising ingredients. It offers immediate hydration and balances skin for fresh, dewy, healthy-looking skin prepped for skincare treatment.

name: Moonstone Luxe Eyeshadow
description: Bobbi Brown’s all-new, multidimensional Luxe Eyeshadow is designed to give eyes instant incandescence. Infused with chromatic pigments, it delivers the ultimate 3-D metallic effect with a velvety texture that glides on and blends easily. In three distinct finishes - lustre, metal and sparkle - this molten shadow can be applied dry for instant impact or with a damp brush for an enviable, liquid-metal look.

name: Liquid Mercury Luxe Eyeshadow
description: Bobbi Brown’s all-new, multidimensional Luxe Eyeshadow is designed to give eyes instant incandescence. Infused with chromatic pigments, it delivers the ultimate 3-D metallic effect with a velvety texture that glides on and blends easily. In three distinct finishes - lustre, metal and sparkle - this molten shadow can be applied dry for instant impact or with a damp brush for an enviable, liquid-metal look.

name: Serpent Bohème Toi et Moi Turquoise S Motifs Ring  in 18kt Yellow Gold
description: Boucheron's Serpent Bohème collection was first created in 1868 and continues to enchant today. The Turquoise Two-Stone Ring from the signature collection is detailed and decadent, crafted from gleaming yellow gold finished with two dazzling tuquoise stones. Wear the ring alone or as part of an eclectic collection.

name: Island Hopping Enamel Nail Polish
description: Essie's Enamel Collection features an extensive colour palette of stunning shades that provide flawless, long-lasting coverage. This high-shine, glossy nail polish comes with a unique brush that fits every nail shape for an effortless, streak-free application. For best results, use it with the First Base Base Coat and the Good To Go Top Coat.

name: Dawn Perfume Spray, 100ml
description: The exclusive Frédéric Malle Dawn Spray conveys a mystic Middle Eastern energy. The dynamic scent opens with Turkish rose oil that commands attention, while delectable olibanum adds a rich flourish, and is drenched in Oud for full-bodied, opulent scent.

name: Resistance Therapiste Soin Premier, 200ml
