description: Kérastase Resistance Soin Premier Therapiste is a repairing conditioner for weak, over-processed and damaged hair. It contains Wheat Protein Derivative which repairs the flexibility and elasticity of damaged hair, restoring uniformity and smoothness.

name: Discipline Bain Fluidealiste, 250ml
description: This sulfate-free smoothing shampoo from Kérastase gently cleanses hair while providing discipline and fluidity. It delivers optimal nourishment without weight to unruly, sensitised or chemically-treated hair.

name: Discipline Fluidissime Spray, 150ml
description: Kérastase's anti-frizz protection spray instantly eases blowdry with heat protection up to 450°F for fine to coarse, unruly hair. It provides shine and control with 72 hours of frizz protection.

name: Densifique Bain Densite Stemfree, 250ml
description: Kérastase's daily shampoo is designed for hair fiber experiencing loss of density. Bain Densité strengthens the hair at the fiber and awakens dormant follicles to give more texture, substance, and resilience to the hair. Body and bounce are restored.

name: Discipline Keratin Thermique, 150ml
description: Kérastase's smoothing leave-in treatment is ideal for frizzy or curly hair. Smooths frizz and flyaways with humidity protection. Restores inner flexibility. Excellent leave-in care.

name: Rust Signature Lanyard ID Card Case
description: Coach's card case is a stylish way to keep organised. Crafted from the signature coated canvas, this sleek design features gold-tone hardware and a detachable lanyard. It's ideal size to store important IDs and credit cards.

name: Songes Eau de Parfum, 100ml
description: The Songes Eau de Parfum by Goutal Paris conjures the scenery of nightime strolls along the Belle Ombre beach on Mauritius Island. Notes of frangipani combine with fragrant tiaré flowers and give way to intoxicating patchouli and a sharp blend of spices.

name: Petite Chérie Eau de Parfum, 100ml
description: The Goutal Paris Petite Chérie Eau de Parfum is an exquisite fragrance inspired by an enchanting garden. Fragrant notes of rose blossoms combine with sweet peaches and pears to create an enveloping scent that lingers for hours.

name: Chat Perché Eau de Toilette, 100ml
description: The Goutal Paris Chat Perché Eau de Toilette recreates the scent of refreshing countryside air. Notes of citrusy lemon is blended with capucine and sweet pea for a pleasant fragrance that effortlessly uplifts the mood.

name: Diamond Royal Musk, 100ml
description: The Diamond Royal Musk by Areej Al Ameerat is a fragrance that embodies the rich heritage of the Arabian peninsula. The vibrant scent is a refreshing combination of sweet fruits, musk and amber. It is an ideal finishing touch for the daytime.

name: Diamond Radiance Face Mask, Set of 1
description: The Diamond Radiance Collagen Mask Collection uses Polypeptide Technology and Diamond Powder, which are designed for maximum absorption and delivery of nutrients into the skin. Diamond Collagen Mask utilises powerful GEMCLINICAL™ technology to combat signs of aging like dullness, dark circles, fine lines and dryness.

name: True Pink Luxe Matte Lip Colour
description: Bobbi Brown's bestselling Luxe Lip Colour is updated with a lightweight matte finish. The luxurious lipstick combines oil-infused powders and pure matte-powder pigments to deliver full-coverage, high-impact colour that feels comfortable on the lips and lasts for 12 hours.

name: Bold Nectar Luxe Matte Lip Colour
description: Bobbi Brown's bestselling Luxe Lip Colour is updated with a lightweight matte finish. The luxurious lipstick combines oil-infused powders and pure matte-powder pigments to deliver full-coverage, high-impact colour that feels comfortable on the lips and lasts for 12 hours.

name: Burnt Cherry Luxe Matte Lip Colour
description: Bobbi Brown's bestselling Luxe Lip Colour is updated with a lightweight matte finish. The luxurious lipstick combines oil-infused powders and pure matte-powder pigments to deliver full-coverage, high-impact colour that feels comfortable on the lips and lasts for 12 hours.

name: Red Carpet Luxe Matte Lip Colour
description: Bobbi Brown's bestselling Luxe Lip Colour is updated with a lightweight matte finish. The luxurious lipstick combines oil-infused powders and pure matte-powder pigments to deliver full-coverage, high-impact colour that feels comfortable on the lips and lasts for 12 hours.

name: Blood Orange Luxe Liquid Lip Velvet Matte
description: Bobbi Brown's long-wearing Luxe Liquid Lip Velvet Matte is perfect for busy days. This liquid lipstick formula is created with powdered pigments and wild mango butter to deliver vivid colour that wears comfortably for up to 12 hours.

name: Barely Nude Luxe Liquid Lip High Shine
description: Bobbi Brown's Luxe Liquid Lip High Shine is a luxurious liquid lipstick that delivers richly pigmented colour with a luminous glow. The paraben-free formula is lightweight and stays comfortable throughout the day.

name: Wild Orchid Luxe Liquid Lip High Shine
description: Bobbi Brown's Luxe Liquid Lip High Shine is a luxurious liquid lipstick that delivers richly pigmented colour with a luminous glow. The paraben-free formula is lightweight and stays comfortable throughout the day.

name: White Web & Feline Head Polo T-Shirt
description: Gucci's Polo T-shirt is discreetly elegant and sharp. Made in Italy from stretch cotton piquet, distinctive Gucci codes mix with a preppy feel in this Polo T-shirt, the feline head is matched with the classic green and red Web and decorates the polo's collar points. By day or evening, wear with sophisticated pants to ensure the overall mood remains sleek.

name: Web Feline Head Polo T-shirt
description:
Gucci's signature details mix enticingly with classic preppy styling in this polo shirt from the latest collection.

• Expertly crafted in Italy from stretchy cotton-blend pique

• The collar is adorned with the label's iconic webbing stripe and tiger head appliques

• For off-duty days, pair this piece with slim-fit jeans and leather loafers

name: Black Ace Embroidered Sneakers
description: Gucci’s Ace Sneakers pay homage to archival House codes that were first introduced in the 1970s. They’re crafted from supple leather with sleek low-top silhouettes and accentuated with gold embroidered bee motifs set against iconic blue and red Web stripes. Wear them with contemporary graphic T-shirts and off-duty denim for retro-inspired weekend looks.

name: Black Donnie GG Leather Loafers
description: Add an opulent finish to this season’s edits with Gucci’s Donnie Loafers. These Italian-made shoes are expertly cut from supple leather in a slim silhouette with slightly-elongated toes. Distinct house codes such as the green and red Web straps and gold-tone double ‘G’ hardware instantly elevate the luxe factor, imbuing a distinguished feel.

name: Megaflower Eau de Parfum Recharge, 100ml
description: The Megaflower Eau de Parfum by Hermetica is an exquisite oriental fragrance with a floral element. A bouquet of refreshing orange flower blossoms is combined with aromatic vetiver oil to create a powerful, long-lasting scent. It is presented in an emerald-green lacquered bottle and topped off with a gold-tone perforated cap.

name: Source1 Eau de Parfum, 100ml
description: The Source1 Eau de Parfum is a core fragrance. It acts both as a base of all Hermetica perfumes and as a standalone scent. The oriental composition is an exquisite blend of refreshing citrus notes, dried amber, fragrant bergamot and fresh wood. It is presented in an emerald-green lacquered bottle and is housed inside a gold-tone perforated cylinder.

name: Vaninight Eau de Parfum, 50ml
description: Hermetica pays homage to the Arabian desert with the Vaninight Eau de Parfum. At the heart of this oriental fragrance is a drop of pure vanilla absolute which is enveloped by jasmine blooms and powerful leather notes. It is presented in an emerald-green lacquered bottle and is housed inside a gold-tone perforated cylinder.

name: Jade888 Eau de Parfum, 100ml
description: Hermetica’s Jade888 Eau de Parfum is inspired by dense foliage and intertwining vines of the Amazon rainforest. The soft yet refreshing fragrance is blend of Lily of the valley, green musk and ginger extract. It is presented in an emerald-green lacquered bottle and is housed inside a gold-tone perforated cylinder.

name: Rosefire Eau de Parfum, 100ml
description: The Rosefire Eau de Parfum is inspired by the sweet taste of rose water in the Turkish dessert, Lukum. The oriental fragrance features a floral blend of rose and violet, while the essence of davana, an aromatic herb, adds a fruity element to the composition. It is presented in an emerald-green lacquered bottle and is housed inside a gold-tone perforated cylinder.

name: Rosefire Eau de Parfum Recharge, 100ml
description: The Rosefire Eau de Parfum is inspired by the sweet taste of rose water in the Turkish dessert, Lukum. The oriental fragrance features a floral blend of rose and violet, while the essence of davana, an aromatic herb, adds a fruity element to the composition. It is presented in an emerald-green lacquered bottle and topped off with a gold-tone perforated cap.

name: White Logo Striped Tennis Socks
description: A simple translation of Gucci's sports-luxe narrative, these tennis socks are a fine addition to anyone's style portfolio. They're crafted in Italy from a spongy stretch-cotton blend with stacked stripes at the ribbed cuffs and a ribbed knit for subtle texture. The house's moniker adorns this pair near the cuffs.

name: Black & Grey GG Supreme Briefcase
description: Gucci’s Supreme Briefcase pays homage to the timeless GG motif, presented here in a sleek black-and-grey silhouette. It comes with the signature Web strap with black leather trims and internal pockets to keep essentials organised. Practical and suave, this classic piece is sure to add a refined touch to well-honed work wear.

name: Black & Grey Kingsnake Print GG Wallet
description: Add an urban touch to this season’s contemporary outfits with Gucci’s sleek GG Wallet. Its bi-fold silhouette is detailed with the iconic Kingsnake print - one of the most recognisable motifs from the House’s eclectic narrative. It opens to reveal multiple card slots and currency compartments with a heat-embossed logo detail that further denotes impeccable style and fine Italian craftsmanship.

name: In The Rain Eau de Parfum Refill, 60ml
description: Floraïku's In The Rain joins the Forbidden Incense collection, inspired by the art of incense as Japanese traditions. The wood-based fragrance is offered as a refill format and is created with created with Bergamot Oil, Cedar Oil and Woody Musc.

name: Black Long-Sleeve Logo Cardigan
description: Archival codes and logomania continues to influence Gucci designs season after season. This cosy cardigan is spun from a soft wool blend and features the signature GG logo against a timeless black backdrop, while gold ribbed trims offer an opulent contrast. Layer it over a printed T-shirt and frayed denim on cooler days.

name: Maharaja Rouge d'Armani Matte Lipstick
description: The Rouge d'Armani Matte Lipstick is the latest addition to Giorgio Armani's makeup collection. The highly pigmented colour offers full coverage and the long-lasting matte finish does not compromise on comfort, thanks to the light-diffusing gel formula, while ester and jojoba oils make the application smooth and easy.

name: Kimono Rouge d'Armani Matte Lipstick
description: The Rouge d'Armani Matte Lipstick is the latest addition to Giorgio Armani's makeup collection. The highly pigmented colour offers full coverage and the long-lasting matte finish does not compromise on comfort, thanks to the light-diffusing gel formula, while ester and jojoba oils make the application smooth and easy.

name: White & Black Sorrento Crystal-Embellished Sneakers
description: Dolce & Gabbana's forte for designing outfit-elevating extras is perfectly illustrated in these Sorrento Sneakers. These sneakers are crafted from stretch jersey embellished with crystals allover and feature sublimation printing for ventilation, bold black and white branding, and they're grounded with two-tone rubber outsoles for cushioning and traction. Dial up the drama by wearing with the brand's sleek separates.

name: Waso Soft + Cushy Polisher, 75ml
description: This Shiseido Polisher is a gentle, skin-refining and exfoliating polish that removes impurities. The environmentally friendly formula gently polishes and clears pores with biodegradable, plant-based cellulose granules in a whipped, tofu-like formula. It leaves skin feeling smooth and helps reduce imperfections.

name: Future Solution LX Total Regenerating Cream, 50ml
description: Shiseido's Total Regenerating Cream is a rich nighttime cream that's formulated to help enhance skin for a youthful look and a vibrant appearance. The anti-aging formula improves firmness, smoothness and radiance while reducing wrinkles.

name: Botanical Kinetics™ Hydrating Lotion, 500ml
description: Give tired skin a nourishing treat with Aveda's Botanical Kinetics™ Hydrating Lotion. Its quick-absorbing formula contains nurturing emollients derived from coconut, jojoba and other natural ingredients that gently replenish moisture, leaving it soft and supple.

name: Shampure™ Body Lotion, 50ml
description: Enriched with organic olive oil, the hydrating Shampure™ Body Lotion by Aveda is an essential addition to the dry-weather skin care routine. This quick-absorbing lotion penetrates deep into the skin, replenishing moisture while its aromatic blend of flower and plant essences calm the senses. Perfect size for travel and on-the-go moisturising.

name: Hand Relief™ Moisturising Crème, 125ml
description: Pamper and nourish dry hands with Aveda's Hand Relief™ Moisturising Créme. Its intense hydrating formula is enriched with Andiroba oil and other natural essences that leaves skin noticeably softer and smoother. This rich moisturising cream also features the brand's own pure-fume™ aroma with certified organic orange, lavandin, eucalyptus and other pure natural essences, creating a faint yet addictive fragrance that lingers all day long.

name: Pure Abundance™ Volumising Shampoo, 1000ml
description: Aveda's Pure Abundance™ Volumising Shampoo is gentle enough to use daily, with a sweet, floral scent that lingers all day. Enriched with certified organic acacia gum and kaolin clay, this nourishing formula builds body and volume, helping hair look full and bouncy. Perfect for those with fine, limp or thin hair.

name: Brilliant™ Emollient Finishing Gloss, 75ml
description: Aveda's Brilliant™ Emollient Finishing Gloss is the secret to silky-smooth, shiny hair. This high-gloss emollient is enriched with rice bran oil that smooths dry ends, conditions and imparts extraordinary shine. Apply directly on dry hair to instantly refresh the look.

name: Pure-Formance Grooming Cream, 125ml
description: Aveda's Pure-Formance Grooming Cream for men creates definition and offers a medium hold. The moisture-rich formula conditions and delivers natural, healthy-looking shine. It also features the brand's pure-fume™ aroma, made with certified organic spearmint, vetiver, lavender and other pure flower and plant essences.

name: Damage Remedy™ Restructuring Conditioner, 40ml
description: Aveda's Damage Remedy™ Restructuring Conditioner delivers a boost of hydration to dry, tired tresses. It is enriched with quinoa protein and moisturising naturally-derived agents that help repair and strengthen damaged hair, leaving hair visibly smooth and soft.

name: Pure Abundance Style Prep, 100ml
description: Aveda's Pure Abundance Style Prep is nature's boost for fine hair. Delivering all-day weightless volume, it adds lightweight, natural bulk to each strand with a botanical blend of acacia gum, passion fruit, rice bran, açaí oil and certified organic aloe , while its weightless conditioners detangle and help to prevent breakage from combing. It's an excellent way to refresh volume on non-shampoo days.

name: Hand Relief™ Night Renewal Serum, 30ml
description: The Hand Relief™ Night Renewal Serum by Aveda is an essential for tired, dry hands. This restorative serum contains a potent blend of molasses and licorice extracts that visibly improve the skin texture and tone of hands overnight. Its hydrating plant essences plump skin to visibly smooth fine lines, leaving them soft and supple the next morning.

name: Light Elements™ Texturising Creme, 75ml
description: Aveda's Light Elements™ Texturising Cream™ is a quick-absorbing, weightless formula that hydrates hair, leaving them soft and silky-smooth. Its refreshing aroma is accentuated with organic grapefruit, ginger, geranium and other natural essences, that keep tresses feeling fresh and manageable all day long.

name: Foot Relief™ Moisturising Crème, 40ml
description: Treat tired, sore feet with Aveda's ultra-hydrating Foot Relief™ Moisturising Crème. Its luxurious blend of exfoliating fruit acids and plant-derived oils like jojoba and castor soften dry patches, leaving them silky-smooth. Lavender, rosemary and tea tree oils deliver a sweet, floral aroma with a cooling after-effect.

name: Botanical Kinetics™ Purifying Gel Cleanser, 150ml
description: Aveda's Botanical Kinetics™ Purifying Gel Cleanser features a plant-derived formula that gently foams away oil and impurities, while balancing the skin's moisture levels. This mild cleanser is enriched with lavender and vitamin E that nurture and nourish skin, leaving it soft, clean and supple.

name: Botanical Kinetics™ Exfoliant, 150ml
description: The Botanical Kinetics™ Exfoliant by Aveda gently wipes away spent surface cells, revealing a smoother, more refined complexion beneath. Its non-abrasive formula primes pores to derive maximum benefits from other moisturising treatments.

name: Invati Men™ Scalp Revitaliser, 30ml
description: Reducing hair loss to help keep the hair you have longer, the Invati Men Scalp Revitaliser has been formulated with a blend of powerful ingredients such as tangerine peel. When applied once daily, this invigorating revitaliser penetrates to help support hair’s natural keratin.

name: Botanical Kinetics™ Deep Cleansing Clay Masque, 125ml
description: The cool, aromatic Botanical Kinetics™ Deep Cleansing Clay Masque by Aveda is the perfect skin-pampering treat for a night in. Formulated with kaolin clay and bentonite, this clarifying mask absorbs excess oils and draws out impurities from skin, leaving it clear, conditioned and refined.

name: Chakra™ 3 Balancing Pure-Fume™ Mist Intention, 100ml
description: This Balancing Pure-Fume™ Mist from Aveda is an authentic fusion of pure essential oils blended to balance the power chakra, the center of motivation, according to Ayurveda, the ancient healing art of India. Essences of organic lavender, fir balsam and lemon leave one feeling well-balanced and self-confident, with a feeling strong motivation and direction.

name: Scalp Benefits™ Balancing Conditioner, 1000ml
description: Aveda's Scalp Benefits™ Balancing Conditioner is a deeply nourishing treat for tired, dull tresses. It balances hair and scalp moisture with a nurturing blend including burdock root, echinacea and sage, leaving them soft, silky-smooth and ready to be styled. Fragranced with the brand's own pure-fume™ aroma featuring vetiver, rosemary, cinnamon and other pure natural essences.

name: Pink & Gold Venus Lipgloss
description: Anastasia Beverly Hills' Lip Gloss is a full-pigment, weightless formula with lacquer, metallic and sparkle finishes that delivers the intensity of a stain and the shine of a gloss. The gold & pink sparkly shade is translucent with a multidimensional reflect

name: Norvina Eye Shadow Palette
description: The Norvina Eyeshadow Palette by Anastasia Beverly Hills features fourteen vibrant shades in matte and shimmer finishes. The long-lasting, full-pigment shadows blend flawlessly and come in bold and bright mattes and soft pastel metallics making this an absolute essential for the makeup kit. Perfect for daytime as well as evening gatherings.

name: Zafeer Oud Vanille Eau De Parfum, 100ml
description: Alexandre.J uses raw materials that are sourced from around the world, to create the Zafeer Oud Vanille Eau De Parfum with a rich and surprising olfactory palette. The sweet scent is a cocktail of warm oriental notes, and is uplifted with caramelised vanilla with hints of coconut to delight the senses.

name: Crystal Noir Eau de Parfum, 50ml
description: Versace's Crystal Noir is a more intense and concentrated version of the airy, rare and modern floral-oriental Bright Crystal. The sensual, luminous and rich top and heart notes are blended with amber that is purified almost to transparency creating a wonderful contradiction. Seductive and sensuous, it is housed in a glass bottle with violet highlights topped with a luxe diamond-cut stopper.

name: Bright Crystal Eau De Toilette, 90ml
description: Versace's Bright Crystal Eau de Toilette, like a precious jewel of rare beauty, is characterised by a fresh, vibrant, flowery scent. The enthralling and voluptuous fragrance delicately reveals colourful and juicy pomegranate grains, iced freshness and shining Yuzu. The beauty of magnolia, peony and lotus flower provide transparency, while vegetal amber is delicately sensual and will delight the senses.

name: Yellow Diamond Eau de Toilette, 90ml
description: Versace's Yellow Diamond reflects the magical, warm feeling of the sun on the skin and the intoxicating light of the sunset in the summer. The natural spray enchants with its Mediterranean refinement of sparkling bergamot, diamante citron, and noble neroli, with the captivating addition of irresistible and attractive accents of pear sorbet. The heart celebrates an intense and glamourous femininity, which expresses itself with creamy and velvety facets of jasmine petals and osmanthus, together with precious notes of orange blossom and freesia.

name: Legacy Youth Treatment, 50ml
description: Dr. Lancer’s Legacy Youth Treatment is a luxurious cream that helps rejuvenate skin’s youthful appearance, using five custom formulated complexes to address skin concerns. These innovative complexes, incorporating over 30 high quality ingredients were designed to help skin recapture the appearance of vitality while providing a vital moisture barrier to encourage water saturation and protect skin’s antioxidant defenses. Lancer Legacy™ Youth Treatment is unique—not only for its groundbreaking complexes, but also for the way the compounds work together to help skin recapture a more youthful look.

name: Glacial White Caviar Resort Leave-In Conditioner, 150ml
description: Miriam Quevedo’s Glacial White Caviar Resort Leave-In Conditioner delivers a blend of precious oils and botanical extracts to address the specific needs of hair exposed to the elements. Its lightweight formula detangles, eliminates frizz and protects against heat and colour-fading, while advanced biotechnology penetrates the hair fibre with potent antioxidants, proteins, amino acids and peptides to repair, strengthen and protect from the inside out. Its instant barrier function locks in moisture for unprecedented hydration and anti-aging benefits.

name: Glacial White Caviar Resort Beach Waves, 150ml
description: This award-winning texturising spray from Miriam Quevedo’s Glacial White Caviar Resort collection is formulated with sea foam that adds instant volume and plumps hair for an alluring after-beach look. It’s fortified with precious oils and a cocktail of potent antioxidants, proteins, peptides and amino acids that help address the specific needs of elemental stress. Its lightweight formula gently restores, hydrates and protects hair while creating perfectly-tousled tresses.

name: Black Saffiano Leather Buckle Loafers
description: Prada's Saffiano Leather Buckle Loafers in black are the epitome of class and comfort. Constructed from the label's signature Saffiano calf leather, these loafers feature a rounded toe and ridged rubber sole for an easy slip-on style. Accenting the clean design is the Prada logo across the bridge. Utilising luxe materials and an unmistakable quality for detail, these loafers make a versatile anchor to tailored business attire.

name: Black Nylon Triangle Logo Messenger Bag
description: Prada's Black Nylon Triangle Logo Messenger Bag offers a fine practical twist to the sleek and modern look of the tailored man. Medium in size, the bag features a single, adjustable shoulder strap with a fold-over top adjoined by two front buckle fastenings. Putting functionality at the forefront of this design, the bag includes a large inside pocket, two front slip pockets and rear slip pocket. Adorning the front is the iconic Prada logo plaque.

name: Black Double-Zip Belt Bag
description: Prada's collections are comprised of elegant designs and high-quality fabrics; this bag is no exception. Made in Italy, the bag features an adjustable technical fabric belt and is finished with polished steel-finish metal hardware. Adaptable for city breaks, work days and weekends.

name: Dark-Blue Triangle Logo Saffiano Leather Card Holder
description: Prada showcases its penchant for fine Italian craftsmanship in this card holder. It's crafted from Saffiano leather to a sleek silhouette with a central opening at six card slots - ideal for all the essentials. An enamel triangular logo plaque at the side lends an elegant finish.

name: Metal Logo Card Holder in Saffiano Leather
description:
The timelessly appealing design of this Prada card holder makes it into a savvy investment for your accessory collection.

• This Italian-made piece is crafted from luxurious Saffiano leather

• Metal logo hardware in one corner adds to its designer allure

• It has a handy central compartment and six slots for your essential cards

name: Black Logo Plaque Woven Belt
description: This Prada belt is sure to lend a luxurious finishing touch to smart casual outfits. The woven cotton-nylon design is trimmed with leather and defined by an adjustable metal plaque buckle. The engraved brand logo at the centre looks great when accompanying a white shirt and dark chinos combination.

name: Valentino Garavani Camouflage Rockstud Sneakers
description: Stamp bold personality on streetwear edits with Valentino Garavani's edgy Rockstud Sneakers. Standing on rubber soles, the lace-up low-tops are made in Italy from a combination of camouflage Nappa leather and textile, and are finished at the heels with the brand's iconic stud detail in contrast rubber. The military-inspired pattern works well with cargo pants or jeans.

name: Valentino Garavani Rockrunner Studded Sneakers
description: Introducing the studs to their unique sneakers, Valentino Garavani's Rockrunner Sneakers have been an instant success and popular choice by street style icons. The sneakers not only play with contrasting shades, but also with materials, featuring suede, leather and nylon all in one design. The matching studs on the heels create an edgy vibe that will look sleek with a monochrome activewear outfit.

name: Black VLTN Logo Slides
description: Crafted with comfort and ease in mind, Valentino’s Logo Slides are a luxurious upgrade from the classic pool slide. The open-toe sandals are expertly made in Italy from rubber with anatomically-shaped footbeds and the newly refreshed ‘VLTN’ logo. Team with casual shorts or denim on laidback weekends.

name: Valentino Garavani VLTN Bi-Fold Passport Cover
description: Valentino Garavani makes vacations more stylish with the VLTN Passport Cover. Made in Italy from luxurious calfskin leather, it features a contrast brand logo to the exterior, while the interior has space for essential travel documentation and three credit cards.

name: Pourpre Défilé Le Rouge Mat Lip Colour
description: Like a true haute-couture accessory, Le Rouge Mat Lip Colour by Givenchy luxuriously glides on to the lips delivering intense colour in a single stroke. Its velvety texture is highly concentrated in luxe pigments and moisturising agents, ensuring an ultra-matte, smooth finish that lasts for hours. It’s encased in an exquisite studded black leather tube – an exclusive signature of Maison Givenchy.

name: Le Soin Noir Eye Cream, 15ml
description: Givenchy’s luxurious Le Soin Noir skincare range is fortified with the Supreme Alliance of Life Algae Complex – a fusion of two types of algae that have extraordinary renewal properties. Glistening with iridescent reflections, the collection’s ultra-rich Eye Cream transmits a luscious sensorial experience that delivers an infusion of replenishing benefits, leaving the delicate under-eye area generously nourished and brightened. Continued use noticeably reduces the appearance of wrinkles and crows’ feet, resulting in visibly rested eyes that exude a luminous youthful glow.

name: Infra Rose Rouge Interdit Satin Lipstick
description: Givenchy's Rouge Interdit Lipstick features a satin finish that takes colour to a new dimension. The long-lasting lip colour is formulated with reflective micro crystals to accentuate depth and luminosity, while the brand's AbsoluteColorComplex ensures vibrancy and long-lasting wear.

name: Wanted Coral Rouge Interdit Satin Lipstick
description: Givenchy's Rouge Interdit Lipstick features a satin finish that takes colour to a new dimension. The long-lasting lip colour is formulated with reflective micro crystals to accentuate depth and luminosity, while the brand's AbsoluteColorComplex ensures vibrancy and long-lasting wear.

name: Rouge Insomnie Rouge Interdit Satin Lipstick
description: Givenchy's Rouge Interdit Lipstick features a satin finish that takes colour to a new dimension. The long-lasting lip colour is formulated with reflective micro crystals to accentuate depth and luminosity, while the brand's AbsoluteColorComplex ensures vibrancy and long-lasting wear.

name: Wild Rose Rouge Interdit Satin Lipstick
description: Givenchy's Rouge Interdit Lipstick features a satin finish that takes colour to a new dimension. The long-lasting lip colour is formulated with reflective micro crystals to accentuate depth and luminosity, while the brand's AbsoluteColorComplex ensures vibrancy and long-lasting wear.

name: L'intemporel Blossom Beautifying Cream-In-Mist Anti-Fatigue, 50ml
description: Givenchy reinvents the classic cream with travel-friendly, express-application anti-fatigue care. The formula sprays on in a fine mist to fully deliver its moisturising and revitalizing properties. Infused with its benefits, the skin seems soft and smooth, it appears more radiant and visibly more beautiful.

name: Darcy Eau de Parfum Spray, 75ml
description: A soft and sensual fragrance, the Darcy by Parfums de Marly blends sparkling citrus and sweet floral notes enveloped in fleecy and delicate white musk. The base of patchouli provides depth creating a heady and memorable scent.

name: Supershine Moisturizing Cream, Travel Size
description: Oribe's Supershine Moisturising Cream is a luxe reinvention of leave-in conditioner. It satisfies the thirstiest hair, calms frizz, elevates shine and restores hair to supernatural softness - especially medium-to-thick and extra-long hair.

name: Spot Stickers, Pack Of 16
description: This unique, almost-invisible, hygienic spot sticker is infused with pimple-purging scientific actives that release over time to help calm redness, soothe, decongest and accelerate blemish healing.

name: Mocha Fizz Compact-Expert Dual Powder
description: By Terry's Compact-Expert Dual Powder in Mocha Fizz instantly mattifies, highlights, and sets your makeup to a flawless finish. This hybrid powder features two finishes - matte and luminous - with a smooth, feather-light texture that seamlessly blends into skin without settling into fine lines or wrinkles.

name: Sun Beauty Silky Milk SPF15, 400ml
description: Doesn't your skin deserve the broadest, high-quality sun protection? Lancaster's Sun Beauty Silky Milk SPF15 for body brings you broad-spectrum protection as it helps you develop a lasting, golden tan. The unique formula combines exclusive Full Light Technology, which targets 100% of the sun's rays, and reinforced Tan Activator Complex for that even, radiant tan. It's specially developed for medium to dark skin that tans easily and rarely burns.

name: Sun Kids Invisible Mist SPF50 Water Application, 200ml
description: Let your kids splash away (that's what sunny days are for!). Water-resistant Lancaster SUN KIDS Invisible Mist for Children SPF50 keeps your little ones sun-protected. Easy to apply -- even to wet skin -- the innovative formula provides broad-spectrum protection that aims at targeting 100% of the sun's rays: UVB, UVA, Visible Light and Infrared.

name: Black Velvet-Lapel Jacket
description: SELMACİLEK's elegant black jacket should be a key part of a new season evening wardrobe. It is defined by velvet notch lapels, and is cut to a cropped, open front silhouette that is perfect for layering over dresses. Team with tailored pants for maximum impact.

name: Rose-Gold & Rhodolite Small Serpent Bohème Necklace
description: Boucheron's beautifully crafted Serpent Bohème Necklace will make an heirloom addition to any well-edited wardrobe. Designed with an 18kt twisted chain, the pendant is set with a Rhodolite stone - capturing the power of the snake. Watch it add an elegant finishing touch to an evening ensemble.

name: Blue Logo Waistband Boxers, 2-Pack
description: This set of two Dolce & Gabbana boxers are crafted from a soft and stretchy cotton blend with a hint of stretch. A bold contrasting logo woven into the waistband contributes to the 'logomania' trend whilst a seamless construction guarantees comfort.

name: Black Platform Leather Sneakers
description: Add a luxe update to weekend looks with Alexander McQueen’s Platform Leather Sneakers. This classic style features a built-in wedge and flexible midsole for all-day comfort, Its laidback low-top profile is the perfect accompaniment to off-duty denim.

name: White Platform Leather Sneakers
description: Add a luxe update to weekend looks with Alexander McQueen’s Platform Leather Sneakers. This classic style features a built-in wedge and flexible midsole for all-day comfort. Its laidback low-top profile is the perfect accompaniment to off-duty denim.

name: Platinum & Diamonds Luxurious Serum, 150ml
description: Miriam Quevedo’s Platinum & Diamonds Luxurious Serum restores ultra-volume with extreme silkiness while strengthening and imparting long-lasting, diamond-like sheen. This weightless leave-in serum is fortified with precious metal powders, thermal waters, and other organic active ingredients to deeply regenerate hair while restoring volume and nourishing the scalp. Global Keratin Protection & Rebuilding System binds to hair creating a seal that locks in moisture and protects against heat damage. Hair is left smooth with exceptional volume and shine.

name: Extreme Caviar Vitality Luxe Masque, 250ml
description: Miriam Quevedo’s Extreme Caviar Vitality Luxe Masque is intense formula that revitalises and invigorates weak and damaged hair without weighing it down. The creamy, gentle formula deeply penetrates both hair and scalp to hydrate and add life to hair, bringing back its youthful radiance. It's especially beneficial for those with coloured and chemically treated hair or those exposed to harsh environmental stressors.

name: Black Everyday Leather Passport Holder
description: Balenciaga’s luxurious leather accessories continue to evolve into practical designs, catering to sophisticated, jet-setting individuals. This Everyday Passport Holder is meticulously crafted from incredibly-soft, textured calf and lamb leather and accented with the label’s minimalistic sans-serif logo print. A passport compartment and multiple card slots keep essentials neatly organised during travel.

name: Pearl-Detail Portofino Sneakers
description: These Portofino Sneakers from Dolce & Gabbana brings the brand's refined approach to sports-luxe to casual edits. Crafted in Italy with a low-top silhouette, lace-up fastenings and chunky rubber sole, they have a metalllic gold leather accent and a pearl detail at the back. Wear with a fitted T-shirt and A-line skirt for a fresh off-duty look.

name: Logo Patch Small Messenger Bag
description: Another 1990s-inspired piece in Fendi's SS19 collection is the Logo Print Small Messenger Bag, with an outstanding character and design. The bag plays on both the retro and the mini accessory trend with a cool, effortless twist, featuring the brand's logo on the front and on the adjustable canvas strap. Make this a holiday must-have with a linen shirt and chino shorts.

name: Black Leather Card Holder
description: The allure of Prada's Card Holder lies in its innate elegance. Made by artisans in Italy from Saffiano leather, the holder is stamped with a metal lettering logo and polished gold-toned hardware. Open the wallet to reveal two slots for cards or everyday bills.

name: Black VLTN Funnel Neck Zip Sweatshirt
description: The house of Valentino is throwing back to the 1980s with the VLTN logo. Join the revival with this lightweight zipped sweatshirt. The designer has incorporated logo tape along the sleeves and shoulders. The stand collar gives a relaxed look with a hint of elegance. Wear this over a white T-shirt with a pair of black slim fit jeans, or team it with the matching sweats.

name: 1 Million Eau de Toilette Vaporisateuer, 50ml
description: The 1 Million Eau de Toilette from Paco Rabanne is a strong mix of masculine base notes, spicy heart notes, and fresh top notes. It will seduce the senses with its potent charms.

name: Invictus Intense Eau de Toilette, 100ml
description: Paco Rabanne's Invictus Intense Eau de Toilette is a vibrant and intense scent that pays homage to the raw masculine power of a conquering hero. It opens with the spicy and heady top notes of orange blossom, black pepper, cardamom and closes with powerful base notes of salt, black amber, and ambergris.

name: City Skin Overnight Detox Moisturiser, 50ml
description: Let Murad's City Skin Overnight Moisturiser work its wonders on the skin overnight. The formula is lauded for evening out skintone, eliminating dullness and combating wrinkles and fine lines.

name: Eau Magnolia Body Milk, 200ml
description: Eau Magnolia Body Milk is a rich yet easy to handle body wash that builds into a luxurious lather. It is formulated to cleanse and soften the skin, while perfectly rendering each fragrance. Each body wash contains the same concentrate featured in the original perfumes.

name: Notre Dame Candle, 220g
description: Frédéric Malle's candle has the scent of incense. From his lab in New York City, Bruno Jovanovic managed to overcome the technical difficulty that this specific scent entails in order to reproduce the dry warmth of the vapor and the damp coolness of the stone to create this church-like atmosphere.

name: Herrera Confidential Oud Couture Eau de Parfum, 100ml
description: Carolina Herrera’s Oud Couture Eau de Parfum from the celebrated Herrera Confidential collection combines the classic Middle Eastern fragrance with cues from New York’s cosmopolitan spirit and style sensibility. The luxurious warmth of Oud resin is enriched with sweet rose chords that add a floral depth to its composition. Elevated with hints of pepper, saffron and clove, the opulent fragrance leaves a sophisticated trail of distinct woody oriental notes.

name: Herrera Confidential Gold Incense Eau de Parfum, 100ml
description: The modern and enigmatic Gold Incense Eau de Parfum by Carolina Herrera celebrates time-honoured Arabian luxury. Powerful and elegant, its modern olfactive structure brings together a tapestry of marigold, vanilla caviar, cedarwood and labdanum to create a warm, intense, and fascinating trail that leaves a lasting impression.

name: Blond Jasmine Eau de Toilette, 100ml
description: Inspired by the most luxurious and confidential holiday destinations in South America, this fragrance is a tribute to the iconic flower of Carolina Herrera’s couture inspiration: the imperial jasmine. A sleek fragrance from a precise formula that gathers all facets of Jasmine distilled by Vert de Mandarin and Cedrat Oil, at the same time highlighted with Chypre and Musks.

name: Lady Million Lucky Eau de Parfum, 80ml
description: Seek out sensations with no limits with Paco Rabanne's Lady Million Lucky Eau de Parfum. A euphoric floral scent in every way it is sparkling, vibrant, addictive, with a dash of insolence, sandalwood and audacious rose.

name: Navy Luxor Fast Leather Backpack
description: Emporio Armani's Luxor Fast backpack takes a minimalist approach with clean lines and precise detail. Crafted from navy blue premium calf leather with an elegant smooth finish, it has brand logos on the front and on the shoulder straps. The main compartment is fabric lined and has a zip-fastening.

name: Reversible Boarded & Smooth Leather Belt
description: A classic yet modern piece, Emporio Armani's belt will instantly lift new season looks. It's expertly crafted from printed boarded and smooth leather decorated with polished metal hardware and is constructed with a reversible design. Wear it to add polish to a pair of jeans or an off-duty outfit.

name: Luxor Fast Leather Messenger Bag
description: Emporio Armani's expertise in creating refined accessories is evident in the Luxor Fast Messenger Bag. Crafted from textured leather punctuated with a metal eagle icon emblem, the sleek, structured silhouette hangs from an adjustable brand logo detail shoulder strap. A practical and stylish selection for everyday, it has an outer slip-pocket with snap-fastener, and opens with a zip to reveal a lined interior that has three compartments to keep essentials organised.

name: Eagle Plaque Leather Reversible Belt
description: Emporio Armani never compromise the quality of their designs and this belt is proof. The belt is constructed with a leather strap, features silver-tone hardware and is decorated with an all-over signature eagle embossed logo. Wear it to add polish to an off-duty outfit.

name: Black Logo Flip-Flop Sandals
description: Imbued with a relaxed vibe, these Emporio Armani Sandals will prove to be the perfect addition to the warm-weather wardrobe.They have been expertly crafted with leather and logo-embossed canvas straps and set atop flexible rubber soles for all-day comfort. Save them for the weekend and wear with everything from loungewear to casual edits.

name: Patent Leather Oxford Shoes
description:
These polished Oxford Shoes by Emporio Armani showcase the luxury brand's exquisite craftsmanship and classic style.

• They're crafted from patent calf leather with a lace-up fastening.

• The paneled design is held together by tonal stitching and set on a slight heel.

• The ideal pair to match with tailored suiting.

name: Cady Slim Fit Pants
description: A stylish choice for a smart casual look, the Emporio Armani Cady Slim Fit Pants were designed with simplicity in mind. The elegant cut, cady fabric and unlined detailing perfectly fit into the fashion house's signature formal aesthetic. Match this classic pair with a printed blouse and heels, or go casual with a cropped T-shirt and leather jacket.

name: Blue Straight-Leg Jeans
description: Few styles complete the off-duty wardrobe quite like this pair of Straight-Leg Jeans by Emporio Armani. Expertly cut from stretch cotton, they feature a classic five-pocket construction with a silver-tone logo plaque at the back and a medium-washed finish. Wear with the label’s logo print T-shirts and white sneakers for an effortless weekend look.

name: Oxford Slip-On Shoes
description: These Emporio Armani oxfords are sure to lend a refined touch to tailoring this season. Crafted from high-shine patent leather, they’re set atop stacked heels and have smooth leather lining for all-day comfort. Perfect for black-tie events and formal dinners.

name: Dark-Blue Regular Fit Jeans
description: These Regular-Fit Jeans by Emporio Armani will be a staple piece to round off this season’s off-duty edits. They’re cut to a neat straight-leg shape with classic five-pocket construction in a dark-wash finish that lends a refined edge. An ideal companion for pared-back cotton T-shirts, they’re also blended with a bit of stretch to ensure all-day comfort.

name: Mini Pashli Satchel in Shark Embossed Leather
description: Complete this season's contemporary edits with 3.1 Phillip Lim's iconic Pashli Satchel. The compact design is crafted from shark-embossed calf leather and features the signature push-lock closure on the front flap. It opens to reveal a compact interior that's sized for on-the-go essentials like keys, cards and lipstick. It's the perfect companion for both monochrome looks and vibrant prints.

name: Noble XXI Art Deco Perfume Spray, 50ml
description: The Noble XXI Art Deco Perfume by Clive Christian combines the modern and the classic in this luxurious floral fragrance. It opens to the evocative galbanum and crisp hyacinth before evolving into a warm bouquet of muguet. A sweet trail of vanilla, sandalwood, musk and smoky vetiver tapers the explosion of florals, resting in a captivating earthy scent. This perfume is certified to be suitable for vegans.

name: Monsieur. Perfume Spray, 100ml
description: Monsieur. Perfume Spray reveals the style behind impeccable appearance. Notes of patchouli blend with a cocktail of rum absolute and mandarin for a distinct aroma as cedar, suede and incense are the underlying sensual pulse, warmed by sweet vanilla.

name: L'eau D'Hiver Body Milk, 200ml
description: Carefully formulated as a skin care product, Frederic Malle's body milk is an alternative and complementary way to wear perfume. Easy to apply, it lends itself perfectly for everyday use and leaves the skin hydrated and is subtly scented with iris and bergamot notes.

name: N°3 Sparkling Brown Phyto-Khol Star Waterproof Eye Pencil
description: Sisley's Phyto-Khol Star is an automatically retractable pencil with an integrated sharpener for a precise application each time it's used. Enriched with Vitamin E and nourishing ingredients, the creamy formula and firm tip offer a uniquely smooth glide and ensure perfect definition that lasts all day.

name: Ruby Phyto-Lip Twist Matte Tinted Balm
description: Sisley's Phyto-Lip Twist is a tinted balm that's coloured like a lipstick and features an intense matte finish. Applied with a single twist, it leaves lips feeling supple and soft thanks to a blend of plant-based active ingredients. The bevelled tip allows for ultra-precise, even and easy application.

name: White Opal Phyto-Blanc Cushion Foundation, 14ml
description: Sisley's Phyto-Blanc Cushion Foundation is a fresh and delicately perfumed texture that offers optimal correction of the complexion creating a perfect skin effect while ensuring a radiant result with a glowing finish. Enriched with Wheat sugar derivative, Pro-vitamin B5 and Phytosqualane, the SPF30 cushion infuses the skin with moisture day after day and boosts the natural radiance of the complexion by delivering anti-pollution, anti-fine particle, and anti-free radical protection.

name: Rouge Monaco Le Phyto Rouge Lipstick
description: Sisley's Le Phyto Rouge Lipstick has an ultra-silky texture that envelops the lips in a smoothing, contouring and hydrating film. Its new-generation gel texture blends into the lips upon contact like a fluid and provides a sensation of incomparable, lasting comfort. Thanks to the "Hydrobooster Complex" composed of microspheres of Hyaluronic Acid and Konjac Glucomannans, lips are immediately plumped up, voluptuous and smoothed. A combination of ultra-pure pigments provides an immediate colour impact and an ultra-luminous finish.

name: Beige Bali Le Phyto Rouge Lipstick
description: Sisley's Le Phyto Rouge Lipstick has an ultra-silky texture that envelops the lips in a smoothing, contouring and hydrating film. Its new-generation gel texture blends into the lips upon contact like a fluid and provides a sensation of incomparable, lasting comfort. Thanks to the "Hydrobooster Complex" composed of microspheres of Hyaluronic Acid and Konjac Glucomannans, lips are immediately plumped up, voluptuous and smoothed. A combination of ultra-pure pigments provides an immediate color impact and an ultra-luminous finish.

name: Beige Jaipur Le Phyto Rouge Lipstick
description: Sisley's Le Phyto Rouge Lipstick has an ultra-silky texture that envelops the lips in a smoothing, contouring and hydrating film. Its new-generation gel texture blends into the lips upon contact like a fluid and provides a sensation of incomparable, lasting comfort. Thanks to the "Hydrobooster Complex" composed of microspheres of Hyaluronic Acid and Konjac Glucomannans, lips are immediately plumped up, voluptuous and smoothed. A combination of ultra-pure pigments provides an immediate color impact and an ultra-luminous finish.

name: Eau De Soir Eau De Parfum, 100ml
description: Originally created by Count Hubert d'Ornano as a gift to his Spanish wife Isabelle, Sisley's Eau du Soir is an eternally feminine fragrance. Built around the key note of the Spanish seringa flower, which blooms at night, this fragrance balances fresh citrus, sensual florals and intense amber. An easy-to-wear, charming and versatile scent presented here in this year's limited edition lacquered bottle.

name: Izia Moisturizing Perfumed Body Lotion, 150ml
description: Sisley's Izia Moisturizing Perfumed Body Lotion is an indulgent cream that’s fresh, light and silky-soft. Its satiny texture is rapidly absorbed and moisturises the skin instantly and lastingly, leaving it soft, supple and delicately perfumed with the signature scent.

name: Volumizing Spray, 150ml
description: Sisley Volumizing Spray instantly supports the hair from the roots and provides texture and density for a long-lasting lifting effect. It deliciously scents hair and has a light texture that doesn’t leave hair sticky. From the moment it is applied, it provides the hair with visible volume from root to tip. Day after day, hair is stronger and more resistant.

name: 212 VIP Rosé Eae de Parfum Spray, 80ml
description: Become the essential ingredient to any party with the fresh and dynamic 212 VIP Rosé Eau de Parfum by Carolina Herrera. Presented in an ultra-feminine matte version of the signature 212 bottle, the playfully seductive fragrance swirls into peach blossom accords before settling into a luxurious Queen Wood and amber base. It embodies sparkling festivities and a voluptuous innocence, all the charms that add to the confidence and dynamism of the modern woman.

name: Cinnamon Velvetines Lip Liner
description: Lime Crime's creamy lip liner is designed to prime and define lips. The waterproof formula effortlessly glides onto the lips and dries down matte, creating a precise line that prevents colour from feathering or bleeding. Wear it under the brand's collection of matte, glossy and metallic lipsticks.

name: 9 Honey Beige Nude-Expert Duo Stick
description: Achieve a camera-ready and flawless effect with By Terry's Nude-Expert Duo Stick. Half-foundation, half-highlighter, the foundation stick creates an instantly flawless and radiant matte complexion with ease.

name: 2 Neutral Beige Nude-Expert Duo Stick
description: Achieve a camera-ready and flawless effect with By Terry's Nude-Expert Duo Stick. Half-foundation, half-highlighter, the foundation stick creates an instantly flawless and radiant matte complexion with ease.

name: 2.5 Nude Light Nude-Expert Duo Stick
description: Achieve a camera-ready and flawless effect with By Terry's Nude-Expert Duo Stick. Half-foundation, half-highlighter, the foundation stick creates an instantly flawless and radiant matte complexion with ease.

name: Cappuccino Phyto-Sourcils Design Eye Pencil
description: Phyto-Sourcils Design is a multi-tasking eyebrow pencil with three specific functions. It is the ultimate must-have professional tool showcased in unique Sisley packaging: with a taming brush, triangular tipped eyebrow pencil to precisely redefine, reshape and fill in eyebrows, and includes a highlighter, to apply under the arch of the eyebrow for perfecting eyebrow make-up and highlighting the eyes.

name: Roses Vanille Eau De Parfum, 120ml
description: Mancera's Roses Vanille Eau De Parfum exudes sensuality for a distinctly memorable fragrance. Top notes of fresh lemon of Calabria provide a fruity welcome before Turkish delight with rose give the scent a floral overtone – underlined by a base of cedarwood, intense vanilla and white musk to maintain a luxurious quality of sensuality. Presented in a luxurious flask that is a tribute to French refinement fused with remote far away lands.

name: Primer Plus Radiance SPF 35, 40ml
description: Bobbi Brown's Primer Plus Radiance SPF 35 is a multitasking face primer designed to enhance the wear time of foundation. Ultra-fine pearl pigments illuminate the complexion while blurring imperfections and helps to even out the skin tone. The SPF-infused formula also helps prevent further sun damage by protecting against UVA and UVB rays.

name: Primer Plus Hydrating 3-in-1 Setting Spray, 100ml
description: Bobbi Brown's Primer Plus Hydrating Setting Spray is a sheer, nutrient-rich mist. The 3-in-1 formula makes it the ultimate multi-tasking product - it helps prep skin for foundation, sets makeup for a flawless finish and instantly refreshes the complexion giving a healthy-looking glow.

name: Rose-Gold & Enamel SH Letter Star Ring
description: Add a sense of vibrancy to everyday looks via this Bil Arabi's meticulously hand-crafted ring. It’s designed from 18kt rose gold, with a star-shaped band that’s set with deep green enamel and centred with the Arabic letter SH. Wear it with modern day looks.

name: 9 Neo Nude Fusion Powder Foundation Refill, 3.5g
description: Giorgio Armani Neo Nude Fusion Powder combines the practicality of a compact powder and the luminosity of a liquid foundation. It contains a high-performance colour fusion emulsion with advanced pigments that maintain a skin-matching veil, and offers a long-lasting finish after multiple touch-ups. Use to define or warm facial contours to embody the signature Armaniglow.

name: Fiona Velvetines Lip Liner
description: Lime Crime's creamy lip liner is designed to prime and define lips. The waterproof formula effortlessly glides onto the lips and dries down matte, creating a precise line that prevents colour from feathering or bleeding. Wear it under the brand's collection of matte, glossy and metallic lipsticks.

name: Fangs Velvetines Lip Liner
description: Lime Crime's creamy lip liner is designed to prime and define lips. The waterproof formula effortlessly glides onto the lips and dries down matte, creating a precise line that prevents colour from feathering or bleeding. Wear it under the brand's collection of matte, glossy and metallic lipsticks.

name: Poison Velvetines Lip Liner
description: Lime Crime's creamy lip liner is designed to prime and define lips. The waterproof formula effortlessly glides onto the lips and dries down matte, creating a precise line that prevents colour from feathering or bleeding. Wear it under the brand's collection of matte, glossy and metallic lipsticks.

name: Bittersweet Velvetines Lip Liner
description: Lime Crime's creamy lip liner is designed to prime and define lips. The waterproof formula effortlessly glides onto the lips and dries down matte, creating a precise line that prevents colour from feathering or bleeding. Wear it under the brand's collection of matte, glossy and metallic lipsticks.

name: Maestro UV Skin Defense Primer
description: Giorgio Armani’s Maestro UV Skin Defense Primer SPF50 perfectly primes the skin for makeup. Blended with high UV protection and antioxidant action, this lightweight formula stands alone as a broad spectrum sunscreen to absorb oil, soften the complexion, and blur imperfections for all-day, shine-free, gorgeous results. It is suitable for all skin types.

name: Fair Candleglow Sheer Perfecting Powder
description: Set your make-up with a soft luminous finish with Laura Mercier’s Candleglow Sheer Perfecting Powder. The silky sheer pressed powder comes in six stunning shades to cater to every skin-tone. Dust the powder on you skin with a brush to set your make-up and give it a subtle natural dewy look.

name: Light Candleglow Sheer Perfecting Powder
description: Set your make-up with a soft luminous finish with Laura Mercier’s Candleglow Sheer Perfecting Powder. The silky sheer pressed powder comes in six stunning shades to cater to every skin-tone. Dust the powder on you skin with a brush to set your make-up and give it a subtle natural dewy look.

name: Rose Hubris Eau de Parfum, 100ml
description: EX NIHILO's Rose Hubris Eau de Parfum is an indulgent tribute to the iconic Rose of May. The fragrance’s composition highlights all the facets of this unique ingredient with a sumptuous floral heart of rose magnified by the freshness of green leaves and the sparkle of citrus and spicy notes. for a contemporary result.

name: Blonde Sketch & Intensify Pomade & Powder Brow Duo
description: Get naturally beautiful brows with the Sketch and Intensify Pomade and Powder Brow Duo By Laura Mercier. Use the pomade to draw thin hair strokes to create a natural effect, then top it with powder to intensify the color and give dimension to your brows.

name: Black Pearl & AIN Initial Charm Bracelet
description: Delicate and dainty, Robert Wan’s black bracelet sits neatly on the wrist with a fine, adjustable band. It’s adorned with one of the brand’s iconic Tahitian light pearls, and finished with an Arabic AIN initial. Slip it on daily.

name: White-Gold Akila Pearl Earrings
description: Add to your everyday edit with Robert Wan’s Silver Pearl Earrings. A versatile addition to your jewellery collection, the delicate post-back fastening is crafted from 18kt white gold. Complete everyday dressing with this feminine piece.

name: Gold Ghida's Arabic Coffee Cup
description: Part of the brand's Ghida collection, this Arabic Coffee Cup will be an elegant addition to your serveware. Made from white porcelain, it is vibrantly adorned with the words ‘Al-Ikbal, Al-Ishraq,’ wishing you and your guests ‘Prosperity and Radiance.'

name: 02 Soft Beige Phyto-Teint Eclat Compact, 10g
description: Sisley's Phyto-Teint Eclat Compact is a velvety powder foundation that ensures an even, natural, and radiant complexion. Enriched with Gardenia, Woodmallow and Linden Blossom, its silky, airy texture creates a hydrating and softening effect with optimal comfort, even for dry skin, leaving the complexion flawless and smooth.

name: 03 Natural Phyto-Teint Eclat Compact, 10g
description: Sisley's Phyto-Teint Eclat Compact is a velvety powder foundation that ensures an even, natural, and radiant complexion. Enriched with Gardenia, Woodmallow and Linden Blossom, its silky, airy texture creates a hydrating and softening effect with optimal comfort, even for dry skin, leaving the complexion flawless and smooth.

name: Khaki Phyto-Khol Perfect Eye Pencil
description: Sisley’s Phyto-Khol Perfect is a firm yet smooth eye pencil that allows for a highly accurate line. The formula is specifically created with wild rose and castor oil, along with carnauba and bees waxes that will intensify the eyes with a rich, bold colour.

name: Lyslait Cleansing Milk, 250ml
description: Sisley’s Lyslait is a creamy make up removing milk that works to dissolve foundation etc. while making sure not to strip the skin of its natural resources, especially in dry and sensitive skin. It features white lily extract for comfort, and ensures a luminous and soft complexion.

name: Nude Phyto-Lip Shine
description: This treatment Phyto-Lip Shine has more colour than a gloss, and more shimmer than a normal lipstick. The creamy, invisible formula is crafted with mango and kokum butters, which leaves lips hydrated, protected and plumped with a lustful, luminous finish.

name: Sorbet Phyto-Lip Shine
description: This treatment Phyto-Lip Shine has more colour than a gloss, and more shimmer than a normal lipstick. The creamy, invisible formula is crafted with mango and kokum butters, which leaves lips hydrated, protected and plumped with a lustful, luminous finish.

name: Radiant Glow Express Mask, 60ml
description: Sisley's Radiant Glow Express Mask features red clay which immediately leaves the skin with a radiant glow. It's combined with carrot, red vine, and rosehip extracts and rosemary and chamomile essential oils, which help to eliminate impurities that dull the complexion. It has a soft, supple, and non-drying texture that will leave the skin is left clean and radiant.

name: Botanical D-Tox, 30ml
description: Sisley's Botanical D-Tox is a detoxifying nighttime treatment, which works by aiding cellular regeneration at the most favourable time to combat the signs of fatigue. It's formulated with highly concentrated plant extracts, and works in a comprehensive manner on the three main levels of the skin detoxification process. Recommended use for a month at a time. Expect the skin to appear fresh and younger-looking after just a few days.

name: Deep Black Mascara So Intense
description: For a volumising and fortifying mascara, opt for Sisley’s So Intense. It has a unique formula enriched with vitamin-rich peptides to lengthen and thicken the lash line in just two weeks. The innovative comb brush separates and distributes evenly for a full look daily.

name: Baby Phyto-Lip Twist
description: Sisley’s Phyto-Lip Twist fuses the colour of a lipstick with the shine of a gloss. Simply twist the product and the smooth, glide-on texture is revealed. The luminous shades are crafted with a cocktail of original plant-based active ingredients that hydrate, smooth, and plump.

name: Pinky Phyto-Lip Twist
description: Sisley’s Phyto-Lip Twist fuses the colour of a lipstick with the shine of a gloss. Simply twist the product and the smooth, glide-on texture is revealed. The luminous shades are crafted with a cocktail of original plant-based active ingredients that hydrate, smooth, and plump.

name: Nut Phyto-Lip Twist
description: Sisley’s Phyto-Lip Twist fuses the colour of a lipstick with the shine of a gloss. Simply twist the product and the smooth, glide-on texture is revealed. The luminous shades are crafted with a cocktail of original plant-based active ingredients that hydrate, smooth, and plump.

name: N°2 Bronze Phyto-Eye Twist Pencil
description: The Sisley Phyto-Eye Twist offers long-lasting waterproof color for the eyes, skincare benefits and holding power in a single twist. Enriched with plant-based active ingredients, this ultra-sensory all-in-one eye pencil glides smoothly to color the eyelids, easily applying graphic make-up or drawing an XXL line with flawless hold all day long.

name: N°9 Pearl Phyto-Eye Twist Pencil
description: The Sisley Phyto-Eye Twist offers long-lasting waterproof color for the eyes, skincare benefits and holding power in a single twist. Enriched with plant-based active ingredients, this ultra-sensory all-in-one eye pencil glides smoothly to color the eyelids, easily applying graphic make-up or drawing an XXL line with flawless hold all day long.

name: N°3 Khaki Phyto-Eye Twist Pencil
description: The Sisley Phyto-Eye Twist offers long-lasting waterproof color for the eyes, skincare benefits and holding power in a single twist. Enriched with plant-based active ingredients, this ultra-sensory all-in-one eye pencil glides smoothly to color the eyelids, easily applying graphic make-up or drawing an XXL line with flawless hold all day long.

name: Phytobuste + décolleté, 50ml
description: Sisley’s Phytobuste + décolleté is an intensive bust compound. Its formula sets out to achieve three main actions: tone, firm, and supply of moisture and nutrition. It is rapidly absorbed into the skin, and with repeated applications, ensures the area appears sculpted.

name: Moon Dance Eau de Parfum, 75ml
description: Juliette has a Gun’s Moon Dance has a contemporary composition that plays with contradictions; it brings together opposing ingredients to create a unique scent. Violet, bergamot and the rose, Aphrodite’s flower, are all enlivened with a touch of musk for an unforgettable finish. Spray it on the skin after dark.

name: 3R Peach Sisleya Le Teint Fluid Foundation, 30ml
description: If you are looking for an effective, anti-aging fluid foundation, look to Sisley’s Sisleya Le Teint. It is formulated with Persian Acacia extract – a key active ingredient of Sisleya L'Intégral Anti-Âge, that’s utilised for its cellular energy and ensures eight long hours of coverage. After four weeks, expect the smoothness and firmness of youthful skin, as well as faded wrinkles. The skin will also appear moisturised, plumped up and denser.

name:
Into the Void
 Eau de Parfum, 75ml
description: This woody fragrance from Juliette has a Gun has an alluring aroma. Into The Void opens with a cocktail of guaiac wood, papyrus, cedar, ambroxan and patchouli, and is enveloped by black orchid and tonka bean for a sensual finish.

name: Moisturiser with Cucumber, 50ml
description: This Moisturiser with Cucumber is a hydrating product, ideal for daily use. It has a fine, silky, non-greasy texture, and is designed to leave your skin feeling more comfortable and refreshed. Its active ingredient is rich in amino acids and mineral salts to revitalises the skin.

name: Phyto-Blush Twist N°3 Papaya, 5.5g
description: Sisley's Phyto-Blush Twist is as coloured as a cream blush, as soft as a powder blush and as fun as a Twist. The rounded tip allows for easy and precise application, even without a mirror, while the cream formula turns to powder upon contact with the skin to provide the benefits of both textures: the unique smoothing velvety finish of a powder and the long-lasting wearability of a cream.

name: Phyto-Blush Twist N°5 Contour, 5.5g
description: Sisley's Phyto-Blush Twist is as coloured as a cream blush, as soft as a powder blush and as fun as a Twist. The rounded tip allows for easy and precise application, even without a mirror, while the cream formula turns to powder upon contact with the skin to provide the benefits of both textures: the unique smoothing velvety finish of a powder and the long-lasting wearability of a cream.

name: Soir de Lune Eau de Parfum, 100ml
description: Sisley’s Soir de Lune is a unique and intimate fragrance inspired by an artistic world. The strong personality comes from its spicy and fruity notes – an elegant choice for everyday events.

name: Amino Acid Conditioner, 75ml
description: Kiehl's Amino Acid Conditioner is an exotic, silicone-free daily conditioner for all hair types. Formulated with wheat proteins and amino acids for a light, creamy texture, it imparts a healthy-looking shine to hair without weighing it down. It helps maintain hair’s natural moisture balance to further strengthen hair and improve manageability

name: Rare Earth Pore Cleansing Masque, 142g
description: This deep-pore cleansing mask from Kiehl's may be used for normal to oily skin types to help eliminate debris and dead surface skin-cell accumulation that can clog pores and leave skin dull-looking. It helps eliminate surface impurities and toxins from the skin, and ensures an illuminated complexion, as well as visibly minimised pores.

name: Clearly Corrective Dark Spot Solution, 30ml
description: Clearly Corrective Dark Spot Solution is a fast-acting serum that evens skin tone and diminishes dark spots to impart overall radiance and luminosity to the skin. In as little as 2 weeks, 55% of women clinically demonstrated a significant reduction in dark spot intensity, and in 8 weeks, 87% of women clinically demonstrated more uniform skin tone to deliver breakthrough clarity. With continued daily usage, Clearly Corrective helps to prevent the formation of future dark spots and other skin discolorations.

name: One-Step Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser with Orange Extract, 125ml
description: Cleanse and exfoliate in one easy step with Clarins clever time-saving exfoliating cleanser. Potent botanicals including orange extract give a refreshing, rejuvenating feel while Moringa Seed extract purifies the skin and protects from damaging pollution. Your face feels deep cleaned as make-up, embedded impurities and old skin cells are polished away to reveal the glowing and radiant skin beneath.

name: Amino Aid Shampoo,75ml
description: Kiehl's Amino Acid Shampoo for all hair types is enriched with Amino Acid and Coconut Oil to create a delightful, creamy lather that gently yet thoroughly cleanses the hair. Enriched with Wheat Proteins and Wheat Starch to help add body and fullness to the hair. Kiehl's Amino Acid Shampoo is suitable for all hair and scalp types when mildness is desired.

name: Calendula Herbal Extract Toner, 500ml
description: Calendula Herbal Extract Toner for oily skin and normal skin has been beloved by Kiehl’s customers since the 1960s. Within the cult-classic formula, hand-picked Calendula flower petals work with other ingredients like Great Burdock Root Extract to create a gentle cleansing and soothing alcohol-free facial toner.

name: Powerful Wrinkle Reducing Cream, 50ml
description: This skin fortifying anti-wrinkle cream from Kiehl's is formulated with a powerful combination of micronutrients: copper PCA and calcium PCA. It significantly smoothes skin texture and fine lines and minimises pores, and is clinically shown to improve elasticity by 32%.

name: Medium Beige 01 Instant Concealer
description: Clarins's Instant Concealer is a smoothing, long lasting fluid that provides customised correction for all types of blemishes. Formulated from aloe vera extract and caffeine, the texture blends flawlessly into the skin, providing medium to high coverage. It is tinted to mask the colour of dark circles while restoring the skin's natural tone.

name: Body Shaping Cream, 200ml
description: Refine, firm and contour your body with Clarins' Body Shaping Cream. A second-to-none contouring cream, the formula is specifically designed to fight stubborn fat, while its lovely texture is perfect for massage. Combine with sensible eating and exercise for a gratifying boost in body confidence.

name: Everlasting Foundation+ SPF15 Almond 110.5
description: A high-performance foundation with a silky smooth texture, Clarins’s Everlasting Foundation+ SPF15 guarantees flawless make-up for 18 hours. The ultra-fine texture offers a luminous complexion, and corrected fine lines and small imperfections, while also moisturising for a supple and comfortable finish. It comes in a slim, lightweight mirrored compact with sponge.

name: Everlasting Foundation+ SPF15 Nude 105
description: A high-performance foundation with a silky smooth texture, Clarins’s Everlasting Foundation+ SPF15 guarantees flawless make-up for 18 hours. The ultra-fine texture offers a luminous complexion, and corrected fine lines and small imperfections, while also moisturising for a supple and comfortable finish. It comes in a slim, lightweight mirrored compact with sponge.

name: Super Multi-Corrective Eye-Opening Serum, 15ml
description: This super-smart, five-in-one solution for the eye lifts, firms, smooths, hydrates, and restores a youthful shape of the eye, leaving the area looking more refined in less than one week - 95% of women showed a significant improvement in eye opening.

name: Mission Perfection Serum, 30ml
description: Clarins' innovative Mission Perfection serum addresses a range of skin tone issues without altering the skin's natural tone. Age spots, discolouration, dark areas, marks from acne, dullness and redness are all tackled with Clarins' potent blend of botanicals and science. With proven immediate and long-term benefits, this serum is an excellent choice for those looking to address pigmentation and reveal a naturally beautiful skin tone.

name: Super Restorative Remodelling Serum, 50ml
description: Clarins’s Super Restorative Remodelling Serum visibly lifts and defines the contours of the face for a healthy, younger looking complexion. It does this by utlising the brand’s three major innovations: remodeling, a blend of precious narrow-leaf plantain and organic harungana extracts; replenishing, calling upon the healing tree from Madagascar to boosts skin density for a youthful appearance; and the age-spot innovation, which uses the organic Montpellier rock-rose extract to visibly reduces the appearance of age-related dark spots.

name: Super Multi-Corrective Cream SPF 30, 50ml
description: Kiehl's Super Multi-Corrective Cream is a multi-targeted, anti-aging moisturiser that corrects the most visible signs of aging. It calls upon its SPF 30 broad spectrum UV protection to shield skin from early signs of aging caused by the sun, and lifts, smoothes, sculps, hydrates and retexturises for a younger looking complexion.

name: Mission Perfection Serum, 50ml
description: Clarins' innovative Mission Perfection serum addresses a range of skin tone issues without altering the skin's natural tone. Age spots, discolouration, acne marks, and dullness are all tackled with Clarins' potent blend of botanicals and science. With proven immediate and long-term benefits, this serum is an excellent choice for those looking to reveal a naturally beautiful skin tone.

name: White Plus Brightening Emulsion SPF20, 75ml
description: This excellently milky emulsion from Clarins will leave a beautiful velvety, matte finish. It is instantly absorbed into the skin, and creates a plumped, healthy look.

name: White Plus Brightening Aqua Treatment Lotion, 200ml
description: Clarins’s White Plus Brightening Pure Aqua Lotion is an oil-free, toning formula that clarifies for a fresh, hydrated complexion – idea for hot climates. It contains spergularia and alchemila extracts to slow down hyper-pigmentation, as well as ginkgo biloba to promote micro-circulation. Expect skin to feel soothed, smoothed, and invigorated.

name: Nude-Beige 02 Teint Pores & Matité Foundation, 10ml
description: Clarins’s Pore Perfecting Mattifying Foundation has a lightweight texture that smooths out fine lines and pores while still allowing the skin to breath. It instantly hydrates, and reveals a more unified finish.

name: Hydra-Essentiel Rich Cream - Very Dry Skin, 50ml
description: This Hydra-Essentiel Rich Cream from Clarins helps the skin to retain water for fresh, dewy complexion. The organic, medicinal kalanchoe extract is a powerful natural hydration activator that boosts the skin’s hyaluronic acid production - the skin’s natural water retention system. This particular product is ideal for very dry skin.

name: Bambou Oval Platter
description: A staple to any kitchen cupboard, L'Objet's Bambou Oval Platter will help you serve food in style. It's crafted with a 24kt gold plated bamboo base for opulence, while the polished stainless steel oval plate ensures enough space for your favorite cake.

name: Gold Lorél Photograph 4x6 Photograph Frame
description: L'Objet's Gold Lorél Photograph Frame will hold your treasured memories with opulent display. Meticulously handcrafted from 24kt gold plated, the frame features beveled glass, and sumptuous suede backs with beautifully detailed closures bring extra elegance to your home.

name: Small Bambou Bowl
description: Invite an organic expression of contemporary style into the dining area with this Bambou Bowl. It's crafted in polished stainless steel, and accented with hand-gilded, gold-plated bamboo motifs for a striking finish. Simply use to serve up delicious treats at dinner parties.

name: White Large Swan Bowl
description: Sculpted and finished entirely by hand, L'Objet's Swan Bowl will be an exquisite artistic addition to a table scape. It's designed with a white Limoges porcelain finish that is unmistakably modern, enhanced with the hand-gilded 24kt gold detailing for an opulent twist. It's perfect for everyday and special occasion settings alike.

name: Large Swan Bowl
description: Sculpted and finished entirely by hand, L'Objet's Swan Bowl will be an exquisite artistic addition to a table scape. It's designed with Limoges porcelain finish that is unmistakably modern, enhanced with the hand-gilded 24kt gold detailing for an opulent twist. It's perfect for everyday and special occasion settings alike.

name: Deco Leaves Cheese Serving Set
description: A striking addition to your table service, the L'Objet Cheese Serving Set is crafted from sleek marble and decorated with intricately crafted leaves. This statement piece is not only opulent, but also creates the perfect setting for your carefully chosen selection of after-dinner cheeses.

name: Gold Plated Deco Leaves Large Tray
description: Invite the spirit of the early 20th century into your home with L'Objet Gold Plated Deco Leaves Large Tray. A sophisticated combination of hand forged stainless steel and 24kt gold plated metal evoke timeless Art Deco design, while the generous size makes it perfect for dinner parties.

name: Black Mini Sylvie Top Handle Bag
description: The Mini Sylvie bag was a key staple on Gucci’s SS17 runway, and for good reason. It’s sleek, structured shape is detailed with the instantly recognisable House Web stripes, and polished gold-tone metal that radiates refinement. Choose between the tonal leather or red, white and blue torchon shoulder straps to go hands free.

name: Plexi 85 Suede Pumps
description: The materials of these Gianvito Rossi pumps make them a truly edgy wardrobe essential. The pair features suede toe caps and heels with unique plexi panelling on the sides. Thanks to its versatility, these pumps will go well with any dress or T-shirt and jeans combination for an off-duty chic look.

name: Golden-Bronze Maureen Backless Leather Flats
description: Effortlessly striking, Malone Souliers Maureen Backless Leather Flats will be statement style staple. Featuring a mule-inspired open back, two elegant leather straps frame the foot, while the small stacked heel offers a comfortable lift. Opt for a mini-length dress to ensure they pull focus in everyday looks.

name: Black Saffiano Zip Around Wallet
description: Prada's Saffiano Zip Around Wallet will bring timeless elegance to everyday tote bag. This practical style is fitted with multiple card slots as well as an internal zipped compartment – keeping your bills, cards and coins organised. Slip it with the Paradigne Tote Bag for an on-brand look.

name: Large Wallet in Saffiano Leather
description: With Prada’s Large Wallet in Saffiano leather, you’re guaranteed timeless elegance. Its two compartments for banknotes, two inside pockets, a zipped internal coin pocket and twelve card slots ensure everything in it is beautifully organised. Match it with the same-colour tote bag for full impact.

name: Rose de Grasse Eau de Parfum, 50ml
description: The timeless Rose de Grasse fragrance is inspired by the transcending rose. It’s specifically crafted with the label’s artisanal attention to detail, and features the hundred-petaled rose centifolia which is hand-picked in Grasse - the French capital of perfumery since the 16th century.

name: Carnal Flower Perfume, 30ml
description: If nature offers olfactive clashes, tuberose is probably the best example of these. These pretty flowers exude an almost carnal smell, superimposing in a quasi-miraculous way flower-shop freshness, camphorous violence - spicy and animalic - and milky sweetness.
