It's skillfully crafted from sustainably-sourced gold and features a faceted gemstone with astounding clarity that reflects light beautifully. A refined finishing touch to everyday edits, it looks elegant whether worn alone or stacked with other rings.

name: Dauphine Leather Bi-Fold Wallet
description: Sleek sophistication is a cinch with this wallet from Dolce & Gabbana'a SS19 accessories offering. Handcrafted in Italy from Dauphine calfskin leather, the wallet is designed with room for six credit cards and a central compartment for notes. It's perfect for everyday use or more refined occasions.

name: Bi-Fold Wallet in Dauphine Leather
description: Sleek sophistication is a cinch with this wallet from Dolce & Gabbana'a SS19 accessories offering. Handcrafted in Italy from Dauphine calfskin leather, the wallet is designed with room for six credit cards and a central compartment for notes. It's perfect for everyday use or more refined occasions.

name: Dark Blue Hooded Zip Up Sweatshirt
description: Luxe sportswear is holding its own in Dolce & Gabbana's newest collection and rightly so. The regular fit leaves plenty of room for layering, and the stretch knit collar, cuffs and hem keep this sweatshirt in shape. Keep things casual and wear it open with a statement T-shirt and shorts, or wrap up and stay warm with a pair of black pants.

name: Black Hooded Zip Up Sweatshirt
description: Luxe sportswear is holding its own in Dolce & Gabbana's newest collection and rightly so. Design flair synonymous with the house is seen in the satin side stripes, the metallic logo plate on the chest and drawstring tips. Keep things casual and wear it open with a statement T-shirt and shorts, or wrap up and stay warm with a pair of black pants.

name: Blue Sorrento Logo Slip-On Sneaker
description: Dolce & Gabbana want it known this up-to-the-minute sneaker is of their design. Made in Italy, the sneaker encases the foot with a breathable jersey fabric upper, and a lightweight rubber sole. Stretch tape and printing ensures the designer names are seen from every angle. Wear these sneakers with a white T-shirt and baggy, mid-length shorts.

name: Black Sports Crest Logo Brando Briefs
description: Comfort is key in these Dolce & Gabbana Brando briefs. They're crafted in Italy from bi-stretch cotton with a contrasting logo printed along the elasticated waistband. An embroidered sports crest logo at the centre lends the finishing touch to this pair.

name: Black & Silver Portofino Logo Sneakers
description: Combining sporty style with the current logomania trend, the Dolce & Gabbana Portofino sneakers are a must-have for any shoe collection. The low-top silhouette is shaped in Italy from black Nappa leather to a rounded toe with lace-up fastening and metallic leather detailing. It's set on a contrasting rubber sole accented with raised logo lettering at the back.

name: 212 Vip Men Black Eau de Parfum, 50ml
description: Carolina Herrera 212 VIP Black Eau De Parfum for Men has an invigorating fragrance that is equally woody and spicy. It is packaged in a stylishly designed rectangular bottle with curved edges.

name: Dark-Blue Step No-Show Socks
description: The Step No-Show Socks by Falke are designed to be invisible when wore with summer shoes. The medium-cut pair is crafted from a soft, stretch-cotton blend and is guaranteed to be non-slip thanks to the anti-slip system at the heel. They match well with loafers and slip-on sneakers.

name: Perforated Floral Mabkhar
description: This decorative mabkhar from luxury homewares designer Silsal is of perforated design, traditionally used when burning oud or incense. The teardrop shaped openings are arranged in an enchanting circular pattern. 22ct gold and pops of colour bring the detailed floral pattern to life.

name: Floral Arabic Coffee Dallah
description: The dallah has long been a symbol of hospitality, generosity and wealth in Middle Eastern culture. Based on the traditional design that has been used for centuries, luxury homewares designer Silsal has incorporated a contemporary floral pattern creating an exposion of colour against the smooth white porcelain and gold inlays.

name: Nappa Leather Sneakers
description:
Mini-me will be elegant and stylish with these Emporio Armani Kids collection sneakers adding a polish essential to the wardrobe.

• Expertly crafted from soft Nappa leather, gentle on little feet

• Brands logo is etched on side of the shoe, showcasing opulence

• Velcro strap for easy on/off and secure fit

name: EA7 Padded Vest in Techno Nylon
description: Representing an activewear aesthetic, the Emporio Armani High Neck Padded Vest is a practical essential for chilly evenings and family hiking. Although comfortable and cosy with the padded design and high neckline, the vest has a cool edge with a logo print on the chest and short sleeves. Layer it with a baseball hat, sweater and jeans for upcoming adventures.

name: Leather Crossover Sandals
description: Handcrafted from soft leather, the Babywalker Leather Crossover Sandals will be comfortable companions for your little one's summer holidays. Featuring an open-toe front, comfortable back straps at the heels and a statement criss-cross strap at the front, these sandals are ready for any adventure. Style them with a neutral linen dress or a printed T-shirt and shorts for a cosy and casual outfit.

name: Saftey Razor
description: Discover that the Captain Fawcett's perfectly balanced razor ensures a quite magnificent shave. It is simply a delight to the brand.

name: Intoxicating Le Rouge Parfum Satin Lipstick
description: Lasting from day to night to early dawn, Kilian’s Le Rouge Parfum Satin Lipstick is the perfect choice to flaunt a bold red lip. The iconic essential is covered entirely in the brand’s emblematic Achilles shield motif engraved into black lacquer making it a weighted, sensual accessory in hand. One stroke delivers high-intensity and pure colour pigments in a silky-smooth finish that lasts all day. A delectable floral-gourmand fragrance makes the experience both sensual and exquisite.

name: Devil Le Rouge Parfum Matte Lipstick
description: Lasting from day to night to early dawn, Kilian’s Le Rouge Parfum Matte Lipstick is the perfect choice to flaunt a bold red lip. The iconic essential is covered entirely in the brand’s emblematic Achilles shield motif engraved into black lacquer making it a weighted, sensual accessory in hand. One stroke delivers high-intensity and pure colour pigments in a powdery velvet finish that lasts for up to 10 hours. A delectable floral-gourmand fragrance makes the experience both sensual and exquisite.

name: Multi-Active Toner, 250ml
description: Dermalogica's light facial toner spray hydrates and refreshes. Help condition the skin and prepare for proper moisture absorption when you spritz over skin after cleansing, and before applying your prescribed Dermalogica Moisturizer. Refreshing facial spritz hydrates while smoothing the surface with moisture-binding humectants plus soothing Lavender, Balm Mint and Arnica. Formulated without artificial fragrances and colours.

name: Intensive Moisture Balance, 100ml
description: Smooth away the appearance of dry skin and skin damage with stabilized Vitamin C as extracts help reduce the signs of prematurely-aging skin.

name: Ultracalming Cleanser, 250ml
description: Dermalogica's gentle cleansing gel for reactive skin. This pH-balanced, non-foaming cleanser helps calm and cool the redness and heat associated with reactive, sensitized or overprocessed skin. Delicately fortifies skin's protective barrier without leaving an irritating residue, and easily rinses away or wipes off, making it ideal for sensitized skin.

name: Stress Positive Eye Lift, 25ml
description: Dermalogica's active, cooling cream-gel masque energises the skin to reduce visible signs of stress. High-performance formula minimises the appearance of puffiness and dark circles, increases skin luminosity, lifts the eye area and helps restore skin barrier integrity. Wild Indigo Seed actives brighten to help visibly reduce under-eye circles. Sea Water Extract and Arctic Algae counter the look of puffiness. Fermented Yeast and a unique Hyaluronic Acid blend firm skin to help generate a lifting effect. Bioactive Diglucosyl Gallic Acid works with your skin’s natural microbiome (microorganisms) to brighten and energise the eye area. Formulated without artificial fragrances or colours.

name: Total Eye Care Spf 15, 15ml
description: Dermalogica's SPF eye cream conceals dark circles. Retexturize to help reduce the appearance of puffiness and fine lines with skin-smoothing alpha hydroxy acids and plant extracts. Optical light diffusers help diminish dark circles and a chemical-free sunscreen helps to shield against further damage. Formulated without artificial fragrances and colours.

name: Ultracalming Cleanser
description: Dermalogica's gentle cleansing gel/cream for reactive skin. This pH-balanced, non-foaming cleanser helps calm and cool the redness and heat associated with reactive, sensitized or overprocessed skin. Delicately fortifies skin's protective barrier without leaving an irritating residue, and easily rinses away or wipes off, making it ideal for sensitized skin.

name: Habit Rouge Eau de Parfum, 100ml
description: Guerlain's Habit Rouge Eau de Parfum is loved for its masculine, oriental notes of wood and citrus. Starting with a lingering scent of crisp lime, bergamot, tangerine and basil, the fragrance dries down to a woody profile elevated by amber, cinnamon, cedar and sandalwood. Its modern reinvention of Guerlain's 1965 original men's fragrance is guaranteed to make Habit Rouge a mainstay in the French house's collection.

name: La Petite Robe Noire Eau de Parfum, 100ml
description: The iconic La Petite Robe Noire Eau de Parfum by Guerlain is embroidered with the most beautiful "black" notes of perfumery. The legendary "heart-shaped" bottle has been boldly reinterpreted with a crystalline transparency, fading from black to powdery pink, reminiscent of the classic little black dress. The ethereal fruity-floral fragrance is swirled with black cherry and elevated with a gourmand blend of almond, berries and bergamot. It evolves into a sweet rose heart before drying down to a tonka bean. almond and black tea for a smoky concoction.

name: La Petite Robe Noire Eau de Parfum, 50ml
description: The iconic La Petite Robe Noire Eau de Parfum by Guerlain is embroidered with the most beautiful "black" notes of perfumery. The legendary "heart-shaped" bottle has been boldly reinterpreted with a crystalline transparency, fading from black to powdery pink, reminiscent of the classic little black dress. The ethereal fruity-floral fragrance is swirled with black cherry and elevated with a gourmand blend of almond, berries and bergamot. It evolves into a sweet rose heart before drying down to a tonka bean. almond and black tea for a smoky concoction.

name: Météorites Powder Intense
description: Guerlain’s Météorites Pearl Powder delicately corrects and illuminates the complexion. Unique thanks to its ethereal texture and inimitable violet fragrance, Météorites transform loose powder into a constellation of multi-coloured pearls that reveal absolute radiance for every complexion. A combination of correcting and illuminating colours – pink for a youthful glow, yellow to counteract dullness and mauve to catch the light – even out the complexion for perfectly tailored correction and luminosity. It’s infused with Stardust technology, a diamond powder encapsulated in microspheres, that reflects light to create a soft-focus perfecting halo on the skin.

name: Les Voilettes Powder Light
description: Guerlain’s Les Voilettes Loose Powder combines mattifying and make-up fixing with unprecedented finesse and imperceptibility. Its lightweight texture is derived from a blend of ultra-absorbent powders and pearls, that envelop the skin in a translucent veil, leaving skin velvety, radiant and smooth.

name: Parure Gold Foundation 12
description: Guerlain Parure Gold Radiance Compact Foundation, with its precious dual-faceted pigments combined with a collagen-boosting active ingredient, envelops skin in a rejuvenating light. Somewhere between a foundation and a pressed powder, this unique and sensory powder formula is designed to give both comfort and lasting hold. Its softness and incomparable glide-on quality embraces the skin with a light touch, blurring lines and resulting in a naturally smooth, even and luminous complexion.

name: The Eye Pencil Jackie Brown
description: Guerlain's all-in-one Eye Pencil enables every makeup look from a simple elegant sweep to a sultry smoky eye. Its gliding texture includes intense pigments that provide long-lasting, smudge-free and waterproof colour that stays put all day long. It comes with a built-in stump to adjust intensity and includes a practical pencil sharpener.

name: Terracotta Powder 03 Natural Brunettes
description: The Terracotta Bronzing Powder by Guerlain reproduces varying shades of the sun, creating an instant natural glow any time of year, in one quick, easy motion. Enriched with moisturising active ingredients, its unique formula pampers the skin and ensures long-lasting comfort with over-drying. Use all over or to contour and sculpt an existing tan.

name: L'Instant de Guerlain Eau de Toilette, 100ml
description: Charming with its crisp boldness, L'Instant de Guerlain Eau de Toilette's notes blend perfectly together to create a unique, instantly recognisable scent. The fragrance's top notes of grapefruit, anise and citrus merge with fragrant florals, tea, musk and cacao for a balanced profile. L'Instant's endless versatility makes it perfect for any season and occasion.

name: Abeille Royale Youth Watery Oil, 30ml
description: The Abeille Royale Youth Watery Oil offers the skin all the power of Guerlain-exclusive ingredients: Ouessant Black Bee Honey and exclusive Royal Jelly. This revolutionary formula combines the power of a serum, the richness of an oil and the freshness of a lotion. Replenishing micro-drops of oil are released at the very last minute, leaving the complexion looking radiant around the clock. The result - skin feels incredibly silky and baby-soft to the touch.

name: Idylle Eau de Parfum, 100ml
description: Guerlain’s Idylle Eau de Parfum is a delightful combination of chypre sensuality and the intimate facet of white musks. Composed as a symbol of the declaration of love, Idylle opens with a shower of flowers, a fresh and joyful bouquet composed of lily of the valley, peony, freesia and white lilac. The heart reveals jasmine chords swirled with a blend of Bulgarian roses, while the base adds a sensual accord composed of patchouli and white musks.

name: Terracotta Light Powder 00 Light Cool
description: Guerlain reinvents the subtle natural-looking tan with Terracotta Light, the new powder that features a unique blend of sun-kissed tones enhanced with vibrant colors to reveal a healthy-looking glow for every skin tone. The powder contains a cocktail of active ingredients to help energise the skin, protecting it against free radicals and pollution and preserving its hydration for long-lasting comfort.

name: Terracotta Light Powder 04 Deep Golden
description: Guerlain reinvents the subtle natural-looking tan with Terracotta Light, the new powder that features a unique blend of sun-kissed tones enhanced with vibrant colors to reveal a healthy-looking glow for every skin tone. The powder contains a cocktail of active ingredients to help energise the skin, protecting it against free radicals and pollution and preserving its hydration for long-lasting comfort.

name: Rouge G de Guerlain Lipstick N°214
description: Guerlain’s Rouge G Lipstick Bullet is sealed with intense colour and luscious lip care. Enriched with plant-based polymers and reflective silver microcrystals, this exceptional formula beautifully enhances lips, cloaking them in intense and luminous long-lasting colour. Jojoba and mango butter nourish lips, offering them instant and lasting comfort, while hyaluronic acid and guggul resin help to smooth and plump up lips. Select the desirable shade and complete it with a Rouge G Lipstick Case.

name: Rouge G de Guerlain Lipstick N°62
description: Guerlain’s Rouge G Lipstick Bullet is sealed with intense colour and luscious lip care. Enriched with plant-based polymers and reflective silver microcrystals, this exceptional formula beautifully enhances lips, cloaking them in intense and luminous long-lasting colour. Jojoba and mango butter nourish lips, offering them instant and lasting comfort, while hyaluronic acid and guggul resin help to smooth and plump up lips. Select the desirable shade and complete it with a Rouge G Lipstick Case.

name: Rougeg Lipstick Refill, 3.5g
description: Guerlain's Rougeg Lipstick Refill delivers the ultimate luxury of customizable lips. With a blend of black seed oil and intense pigments, the semi-matte formula ensures the perfect balance between hydration and vibrant colour. It is enriched with hyaluronic acid and blurring powders to help smooth and plump up the lips.

name: Rougeg Lipstick Refill, 3.5g
description: Guerlain's Rougeg Lipstick Refill delivers the ultimate luxury of customizable lips. With a blend of black seed oil and intense pigments, the semi-matte formula ensures the perfect balance between hydration and vibrant colour. It is enriched with hyaluronic acid and blurring powders to help smooth and plump up the lips.

name: Rouge G de Guerlain Lipstick Case French Mademoiselle
description: Guerlain’s Rouge G line allows more choices than ever before. Named as the first customisable lipstick, the collection offers a a multitude of double-mirror cases, from the most timeless to the trendiest to collect endlessly. Complete with lipstick shades from the range to create a unique make-up essential. Please note that this product is not compatible with the previous Rouge G de Guerlain collection.

name: Rouge G de Guerlain Lipstick Case Exotic Safari
description: Guerlain’s Rouge G line allows more choices than ever before. Named as the first customisable lipstick, the collection offers a a multitude of double-mirror cases, from the most timeless to the trendiest to collect endlessly. Complete with lipstick shades from the range to create a unique make-up essential. Please note that this product is not compatible with the previous Rouge G de Guerlain collection.

name: Amethyst Emotion Rouge G Lipstick Case
description: Guerlain's Rouge G Lipstick Case from the Stunning Gems collection is inspired by the art of fine jewellery making. The double mirror design allows for easy application and can be customised with adding any lipstick shade from the Rouge G range.

name: Quartz Illusion Rouge G Lipstick Case
description: Guerlain's Rouge G Lipstick Case from the Stunning Gems collection is inspired by the art of fine jewellery making. The double mirror design allows for easy application and can be customised with adding any lipstick shade from the Rouge G range.

name: L'Homme Ideal L'Intense Eau de Parfum, 100ml
description: Chilli, smoke and leather give Guerlain's L'Homme Ideal L'Intense Eau de Parfum a strong, instantly noticeable character. Slightly toned by vanilla and tonka bean base along with a rose heart, the aromatic top notes of the fragrance settle into a mysteriously deep profile. The scent's geometric, black bottle beautifully represents its masculinity.

name: Orchidée Impériale Essence-In-Lotion, 125ml
description: The Essence-in-Lotion is the first step in Guerlain's Orchidée Impériale complete age-defying ritual. It is enriched with the new Orchidée Essential Water complex, coupled with the regenerative power of Cell Respiration™ technology. Combining the freshness and delicacy of a lotion with the roundness and power of an essence, it intensely moisturises and boosts the natural hydration of the skin deep inside. Perfectly plumped, the skin is smooth, supple, soft and radiant, ready to receive the beneficial effects of the Imperial Ritual.

name: Deep Throat Pressed-Powder Blush
description: The NARS blush delivers healthy-looking colour that immediately enlivens the complexion and provides a natural-looking flush. Formulated with super-fine micronised powder pigments, it ensures an irresistibly soft and easily blendable application.

name: Macao Sheer Glow Foundation, 30ml
description: The NARS Sheer Glow Foundation gives complexion a natural-looking finish that immaculately evens skin tone. Complete with skincare benefits, which includes the Complexion Brightening Formula that helps hydrates skin, it also improves brightness and texture of skin, leaving it softer and smoother to the touch.

name: O Pressed-Powder Blush
description: An award-winning product from NARS, the iconic pressed-powder blush brings a natural-looking flush to any complexion. The sleek black compact contains micronised powder that’s buildable and blends effortlessly. Use the blush to enhance the cheekbone, or bring a rich touch of colour to the eyes.

name: Santa Fe Sheer Glow Foundation, 30ml
description: The NARS Sheer Glow Foundation gives complexion a natural-looking finish that immaculately evens skin tone. Complete with skincare benefits, which includes the Complexion Brightening Formula that helps hydrates skin, it also improves brightness and texture of skin, leaving it softer and smoother to the touch.

name: Punjab Sheer Glow Foundation, 30ml
description: The NARS Sheer Glow Foundation gives complexion a natural-looking finish that immaculately evens skin tone. Complete with skincare benefits, which includes the Complexion Brightening Formula that helps hydrates skin, it also improves brightness and texture of skin, leaving it softer and smoother to the touch.

name: Audacious Lipstick
description: Part of NARS’ Audacious collection, the Lana lipstick is rich, creamy and long-lasting. The expertly formulated lipstick glides smoothly onto the lips, bringing a pop of highly pigmented, vivid orange red colour and finishing with a luxurious satin texture. It’s presented in the instantly recognisable NARS case and slips easily into a clutch or pocket.

name: Audacious Lipstick
description: Part of NARS’ Audacious collection, the Lana lipstick is rich, creamy and long-lasting. The expertly formulated lipstick glides smoothly onto the lips, bringing a pop of highly pigmented, vivid orange red colour and finishing with a luxurious satin texture. It’s presented in the instantly recognisable NARS case and slips easily into a clutch or pocket.

name: Powermatte Lip Pigment
description: Turn up the colour with NARS’ Powermatte Lip Pigment. The smudge-resistant formula is lightweight, drying with a matte finish in a bright pop of coral pink. The specially designed wand allows for precise application that lasts all day long.

name: Don't Stop Powermatte Lip Pigment
description: Turn up the colour with NARS’ Powermatte Lip Pigment. The smudge-resistant formula is lightweight, drying with a matte finish in a bright pop of colour. The specially designed wand allows for precise application that lasts all day long.

name: Powermatte Lip Pigment
description: Turn up the colour with NARS’ Powermatte Lip Pigment. The smudge-resistant formula is lightweight, drying with a matte finish in a bright pop of coral pink. The specially designed wand allows for precise application that lasts all day long.

name: Powermatte Lip Pigment
description: Turn up the colour with NARS’ Powermatte Lip Pigment. The smudge-resistant formula is lightweight, drying with a matte finish in a bright pop of coral pink. The specially designed wand allows for precise application that lasts all day long.

name: Nasty Girl Precision Lip Liner
description: This classic lip pencil from NARS defines and shapes the lips with precision and a highly pigmented colour. Formulated to glide on, the budge-proof colour is long-lasting and buildable for stronger or softer shades. It enriches the lips with vitamin E, silk powder and mango seed oil, leaving them smooth and supple.

name: Juan-les-pins Precision Lip Liner
description: This classic lip pencil from NARS defines and shapes the lips with precision and a highly pigmented colour. Formulated to glide on, the budge-proof colour is long-lasting and buildable for stronger or softer shades. It enriches the lips with vitamin E, silk powder and mango seed oil, leaving them smooth and supple.

name: Caracas Natural Radiant Longwear Foundation, 30ml
description: A hero product from NARS’ extensive catalogue, the Natural Radiant Longwear Foundation provides full coverage with a soft, glowing finish. The weightless, breathable and fade-resistant formula is infused with raspberry, apple, and watermelon extracts to help smooth and improve the look of your skin instantly, and over time. It blends effortlessly, mimicking the skin’s natural tone, instantly dulling redness and smoothing imperfections. It’s got serious staying power, ensuring a fresh-looking complexion for up to 16 hours.

name: Iguacu Natural Radiant Longwear Foundation, 30ml
description: A hero product from NARS’ extensive catalogue, the Natural Radiant Longwear Foundation provides full coverage with a soft, glowing finish. The weightless, breathable and fade-resistant formula is infused with raspberry, apple, and watermelon extracts to help smooth and improve the look of your skin instantly, and over time. It blends effortlessly, mimicking the skin’s natural tone, instantly dulling redness and smoothing imperfections. It’s got serious staying power, ensuring a fresh-looking complexion for up to 16 hours.

name: Zambie Natural Radiant Longwear Foundation, 30ml
description: A hero product from NARS’ extensive catalogue, the Natural Radiant Longwear Foundation provides full coverage with a soft, glowing finish. The weightless, breathable and fade-resistant formula is infused with raspberry, apple, and watermelon extracts to help smooth and improve the look of your skin instantly, and over time. It blends effortlessly, mimicking the skin’s natural tone, instantly dulling redness and smoothing imperfections. It’s got serious staying power, ensuring a fresh-looking complexion for up to 16 hours.

name: Highlighting Powder - Ibiza
description: All it takes is one sweep of the iconic NARS Highligher for an unparalleled dewy glow. The Ibiza shade brings a yellow-gold hue that blends effortly with makeup, creating a naturally luminous look. Use it to emphasise the nose and cheekbones, or apply a small amount the the inside corner of the eye for an extra sparkle.

name: Highlighting Powder - Ibiza
description: All it takes is one sweep of the iconic NARS Highligher for an unparalleled dewy glow. The Ibiza shade brings a yellow-gold hue that blends effortly with makeup, creating a naturally luminous look. Use it to emphasise the nose and cheekbones, or apply a small amount the the inside corner of the eye for an extra sparkle.

name: Eyeshadow
description: NARS’ high performance Rome Eyeshadow comes in a violet silver shimmer that suits any skin tone. The eyeshadow is expertly developed using Pigment Power Suspension technology using an innovative liquid binding system. With a single sweep, the finish stays soft while delivering a vibrant effect.

name: Madrid Eyeshadow
description: NARS’ high-performance Madrid Eyeshadow comes in an iridescent brown with gold and violet shimmer that suits any skin tone. The eyeshadow is expertly developed using Pigment Power Suspension technology using an innovative liquid binding system. With a single sweep, the finish stays soft while delivering a vibrant effect.

name: China Blue Eyeshadow
description: NARS’ high performance China Blue Eyeshadow comes in a matte rich navy that suits any skin tone. The eyeshadow is expertly developed using Pigment Power Suspension technology using an innovative liquid binding system. With a single sweep, the finish stays soft while delivering a vibrant effect.

name: Goa Eyeshadow
description: NARS’ high performance Goa Eyeshadow comes in an Iridescent peacock green that suits any skin tone. The eyeshadow is expertly developed using Pigment Power Suspension technology using an innovative liquid binding system. With a single sweep, the finish stays soft while delivering a vibrant effect.

name: Rome Eyeshadow
description: NARS’ high performance Rome Eyeshadow comes in a violet silver shimmer that suits any skin tone. The eyeshadow is expertly developed using Pigment Power Suspension technology using an innovative liquid binding system. With a single sweep, the finish stays soft while delivering a vibrant effect.

name: Persia Eyeshadow
description: NARS’ high performance Persia Eyeshadow comes in a bright paprika colour that suits any skin tone. The eyeshadow is expertly developed using Pigment Power Suspension technology using an innovative liquid binding system. With a single sweep, the finish stays soft while delivering a vibrant effect.

name: Alhambra Duo Eyeshadow
description: The cult classic duo from NARS serves up perfectly matched eyeshadow shades with professional-grade pigmentation. Delivering high-impact colour in a single brushstroke, the Alhambra palette pairs shimmering rose gold /shimmering champagne. Presented in a chic slimline compact, the buildable shades can be worn together or alone, and applied wet or dry.

name: Kalahari Duo Eyeshadow
description: The cult classic duo from NARS serves up perfectly matched eyeshadow shades with professional-grade pigmentation. Delivering high-impact colour in a single brushstroke, the Hammamet palette pairs Matte beige /Bronzed rose. Presented in a chic slimline compact, the buildable shades can be worn together or alone, and applied wet or dry.

name: Kingston Duo Eyeshadow
description: NARS’ high performance Kingston Eyeshadow comes in a matte grey taupe that suits any skin tone. The eyeshadow is expertly developed using Pigment Power Suspension technology using an innovative liquid binding system. With a single sweep, the finish stays soft while delivering a vibrant effect.

name: Bengali Single Eyeshadow, 2.2g
description: NARS’ high-performance eyeshadow is expertly developed using pure pigments suspended in an innovative liquid binding system to create rich, high-impact colour in just one stroke. The weightless, ultra-blendable eyeshadow stays soft while delivering vibrant, long-lasting wearability.

name: Explicit Black Climax Mascara
description: This innovative mascara from NARS delivers buildable volume and intensity in a lightweight, flexible formula without clumping or smudging. The exclusive ribbed bristles load up with whipped, blackened pigments for the ultimate lift and a soft feel, all with a featherweight touch.

name: Green Calfskin Arca Laserato Sandals
description: Private Collection's sandals are ideal for warm-weather dressing when the wearer prefers more refined alternatives to classic footwear. They have a subtle balance between distinctive identity and comfort of use and are designed to suit varied foot morphologies, using flexible, smooth calfskin and an assembly structure attentive to the contact points. Take a cue from the brand and style with a crisp white kandora for a traditional look or pair with black jeans for a casual day look.

name: Nutella-Brown Karung Cinghia Trecce Sandals
description: Private Collection’s sandals are refined and elegant with eye-catching details. They are crafted from karung snakeskin that originates from leading Italian tanneries, and are treated to give the sandals their durability, unique appearance and innate elegance. Wear with a traditional kandora or linen pants to imbue the directional shape with a proud Arabian mood.

name: Green Karung Snakeskin Peninsula Trecce Sandals
description: Private collection’s masterfully handcrafted sandals are fresh from the atelier in Milan. They have a subtle balance between distinctive identity and comfort of use and are designed to suit varied foot morphologies, using flexible and delicate snakeskin and an assembly structure attentive to the contact points. Choose pared-back accessories and traditional Kandora to complement the stylish and proud Arabian mood.

name: Natural-Cappucino Ostrich Leather Quadratura Sandals
description: Private Collection is a distinctive brand of luxurious Arabic sandals that pays homage the region’s timeless tradition for footwear and these sandals are proof. They are crafted from luxurious Ostrich leather that originates from leading Italian tanneries, and are treated to give the sandals their durability, unique appearance and innate elegance. Wear them with a Kandora or linen pantstoepitomize the harmonious merging of proud Arabian values with a passion for style.

name: Regine Minaudière Metallic Top Handle Bag
description: Inspired by the French singer and fashion icon Régine Zylberberg, this Bienen Davis Metallic Top Handle Bag pays homage to its namesake with a playful, art deco design. The metallic leather is in a gorgeous contrast with the velvet lining, while the micro size of this handbag makes its top handle pop even more. This little statement is a must-have bag for important occasions, such as fashion events, birthday brunch and family holiday trips.

name: Antonio Shirt in Linen
description:
Add a twist of Brazilian attitude to off-duty edits with this long-sleeved shirt by Frescobol Carioca.

• Crafted from the finest Italian linen with an easy-to-wear tailored regular-fit

• The brand's meticulous attention to detail is evident in the cut-away cuffs and pearl buttons

• The versatile design works equally well with beachwear and laidback pants

name: Aoud Orchid Eau De Parfum, 120ml
description: Luxury french fragrance house Mancera combined fruity and floral notes with woody undertones to create this sensual scent. Inspired by the timeless elegance of the orchid, the perfume is designed to be memorable, leaving a lasting impression wherever the wearer goes.

name: Acqua Di Gio Profumo Eau de Parfum, 125ml
description: Giorgio Armani lets one delve to the depths of the ocean with Acqua Di Gio Profumo. Fresh sea notes swirl with a heart of geranium, rosemary, and sage that impart a sense of lightness. Intoxicating accords of patchouli and incense feature as the base of this hypnotic fragrance.

name: Acqua Di Gio Eau de Toilette, 50ml
description: Giorgio Armani's Acqua Di Gio is a symphony of woody and aquatic accords, giving a burst of freshness to the wearer. Marine notes float with juicy citruses, sensual jasmine, rosemary, and neroli. It is enhanced by a base of Indonesian patchouli and amber for a luxuriously warm finish.

name: Armani Eau d’Arômes Eau de Toilette, 100ml
description: Giorgio Armani's Eau d’Arômes entices with its blend of woody and spicy accords - ideal for a man who wants to make a lasting impression. It opens with a citron cocktail and is spiced with ginger, cardamom and hot chili pepper. A sensual base of patchouli and ambergris lend warmth to this intoxicating fragrance.

name: White Maglia Polo Shirt
description: The Moncler Maglia Polo Shirt is a timeless piece that offers optimum styling versatility. Crafted in white pique cotton with a brand patch logo on the chest, it is trimmed with a contrasting red and blue college stripe at the collar and short sleeves. Team with track pants and sneakers for a cool, laidback look.

name: Silver & Lilac Mirror Sorpasso Sunglasses
description: Gear up for summertime fun with these Sorpasso sunglasses from Spektre. They are exquisitely crafted in Italy to a sleek aviator silhouette with a sturdy stainless steel frame set with lilac mirrored lenses. Adjustable nose pads ensure that this pair is comfortable to wear all day long.

name: Gold & Green Gradient Sorpasso Sunglasses
description: Gear up for summertime fun with these Sorpasso sunglasses from Spektre. They are exquisitely crafted in Italy to a sleek aviator silhouette with a sturdy gold-tone stainless steel frame set with green gradient lenses. Adjustable nose pads ensure that this pair is comfortable to wear all day long.

name: Silver & Smoke Gradient Sorpasso Sunglasses
description: Gear up for summertime fun with these Sorpasso sunglasses from Spektre. They are exquisitely crafted in Italy to a sleek aviator silhouette with a sturdy stainless steel frame set with smokey gradient lenses. Adjustable nose pads ensure that this pair is comfortable to wear all day long.

name: Thickening Shampoo, 250ml
description: Sachajuan Thickening Shampoo with Ocean Silk and Thickening Technology gives hair smooth volume. The hair is nourished, providing a foundation for amazing styling, while heat and UV protectants work together to make hair healthier and shinier.

name: Valentino Garavani Rockstud 100 Ankle Strap Pumps in Leather
description: Feminine with a dramatic flair, Valentino Garavani's Rockstud pumps are perfect for work and play. Crafted from smooth leather, the pair is finished with the label's iconic gold-tone pyramid studs set over a contrasting neutral-toned trim. Complement the sleek design with razor-sharp tailoring and elegant separates.

name: Luna Rossa Eau de Toilette, 100ml
description: The Luna Rossa by Prada draws inspiration from the resilient values that lie at the heart of extreme sailing. Named after the esteemed boat, it’s accentuated with fresh chords of lavender, bitter orange, clary sage and spearmint that subtly reference the strength and passion evoked by the sport. The sleek flacon is modeled after dynamic beauty of extreme sailing boats, completing the luxurious sensory experience.

name: Luna Rossa Carbon Eau de Toilette, 100ml
description: The Luna Rossa Carbon by Prada is a resilient, addictive fragrance designed to mirror the essence of masculinity. Tapered by steam-distilled botanicals, it brings forth a mineral-forward mix of metallic lavender, Italian citrus, radiant patchouli and dry amber, leaving a sensual trail in its wake that accentuates work encounters with refined sophistication.

name: Rose Teint Couture Radiant Drop 2-in-1 Highlighter, 15ml
description: The Teint Couture Radiant Drop by Givenchy is an ultra-sensorial formula enriched with fine Mother of pearl that captures, diffuses and intensifies the light for a radiant complexion. Its velvety texture instantly melts into the skin and creates a dewy iridescent finish in just a few drops.

name: Valentino Garavani Rockstud-Embellished Sandals in Leather
description: Add a hint of opulence to contemporary edits with Valentino Garavani's Rockstud Sandals. Expertly crafted in Italy from supple leather, they’re accentuated with the label’s hallmark pyramid studs in a polished platinum finish. Their relaxed, open-toe silhouette and comfortable mid-heels are ideal for both work and play.

name: Valentino Garavani Rockstud Medium Envelope Clutch in Grainy Leather
description: This Medium Envelope Clutch is subtly chic with the hallmark Valentino Garavani edge. Expertly cut from grained leather, it features a flap top with magnetic fastening and multiple card slots to keep essentials organised. Iconic rockstud embellishment and tonal wrist strap lend a refined finish to its minimalistic aesthetic.

name: Black Leather Morgan Slippers
description: These classic Morgan Slippers by British label Derek Rose are the definition of ultimate comfort. They’re expertly cut from calf leather and suede with incredibly soft cushioning to indulge tired feet. Wear them with the label's luxurious loungewear line for relaxed weekend looks.

name: Black Micro Touch Boxer Briefs
description: Hanro's Micro Touch Boxer Briefs are crafted from the finest, ultra-elastic microfibre for incredible comfort and fit. These lightweight briefs feature a classic design with a lined pouch, while the soft, elasticated waistband is detailed with the brand's logo.

name: Superior Cotton T-Shirt
description:
Hanro's short-sleeved T-shirt is a multifunctional design that can be worn by itself during summer or layered under sweaters come winter.

• It's crafted from high-quality, long-staple mercerised cotton with a touch of elastane for added stretch and comfort

• Lightweight and breathable, it has a classic crew neck and short sleeves

• Wear underneath fine knits or workwear for premium comfort throughout the day

name: Men's Shaving Cream, 100ml
description: This rich shaving cream by Shiseido helps prevent razor burns. The super-smooth, creamy texture adheres closely to the skin surface, allowing the razor to glide easily, preventing redness and irritation.

name: Playing With The Devil Eau De Parfum Refill, 50ml
description: Kilian's Playing With The Devil is a fiery, flirtatious scent composed of tart blood orange essence and rose-tinged lychee fruit, tempered by peppery pimento berries that take it to a whole new level. The refreshing fragrance simmers to a creamy sandalwood base, adopting a smouldering quality on the drydown. In keeping with the luxury-for-a-lifetime concept, the refill scent bottle comes with a spray glass vial with an additional pump, plus dropper and funnel for ease of use.

name: White Velcro Strap Leather Sneakers
description: Gucci bring together bold sporty elements to create these great-looking kids's sneakers. Crafted in Italy with white leather uppers and easy to use double Velcro strap fastenings, the brand's dark green and red webbing stripe and metallic contrast ankle collar add stand out detail. Youngsters will love wearing them with a cool hoodie and track pants.

name: Brown GG Supreme Canvas Backpack
description: Young Gucci fans will love to carry this SS19 Backpack. Ideal for school and off-duty activities, it is made from low-environmental impact canvas decorated with the brand's emblematic GG pattern and finished with brown leather trims. The stylish elements are balanced with practical details in the form of adjustable shoulder straps, zip-fastened outer pocket and main compartments and a top handle.

name: Black Leather Sim Card Wallet
description: Never lose a sim card again thanks to Montroi's handy Sim Card Wallet. It's expertly crafted in Italy from textured calf leather with a debossed monogram logo at the front and opens to internal compartments large enough to safely house five sim cards. The internal card slots can be used for credit cards as well as business cards.

name: Nomad Leather Backpack
description: Dubai-based label Montroi heralds a nomadic lifestyle, delivering travel-friendly quality products such as their Signature Backpack. It's crafted in Italy from textured leather, with one main zipped compartment large enough to house all the essentials. The padded shoulder straps are adjustable for a comfortable fit.

name: White Quartz Disc Bracelet
description: Tateossian's meticulously crafted accessories offer a touch of luxury to everyday edits. Semi-precious stones are combined with Sterling silver to create an opulent yet contemporary design.

name: Silver Cable Knot Cufflinks
description: Complete formal looks with Tateossian's contemporary cufflinks. This cable-knot design is crafted from rhodium-plated metal and combines a polished metal surface with intricate braiding for a unique finish.

name: Rose-Gold Square Gear Cufflinks
description: These unique cufflinks by Tateossian are inspired by the idea of motion and movement. The square-shaped pair features rotating gears in varying sizes, finished in a multitude of metal tones. Watch them add the perfect finishing touch to formal shirts looks.

name: Charcoal Wide-Harness Reversible Belt
description: Coach's Wide-Harness Belt makes a versatile addition to the new season wardrobe, thanks to the reversible design. One side of the belt features the brand's signature coated canvas, while the back reveals a solid colour crafted from pebbled leather, which is finished with a gunmetal-tone buckle. Match accordingly to the look of the day.

name: Purifying Cream Cleanser, 200ml
description: La Prairie's cleanser dissolves make-up and impurities without stripping moisture. Rich in natural emollients, this ultra-gentle, water-soluble cleanser is designed to effectively remove even the heaviest make-up.

name: Tender-Ivory Skin Caviar Concealer Foundation, 30ml
description: La Prairie’s Skin Caviar Concealer Foundation uses advanced pigment technology with caviar-infused ingredients and colour artistry to provide natural-looking coverage. This luxurious foundation perfects the complexion while enhancing skin elasticity and leaving it with a dewy finish, and a perfectly-matched concealer camouflages under-eye darkness and deeper imperfections. The unique formula is infused with SPF-15 sunscreen that simultaneously protects skin, leaving it smooth and radiant.

name: Satin-Nude Skin Caviar Concealer Foundation, 30ml
description: La Prairie’s Skin Caviar Concealer Foundation uses advanced pigment technology with caviar-infused ingredients and colour artistry to provide natural-looking coverage. This luxurious foundation perfects the complexion while enhancing skin elasticity and leaving it with a dewy finish, and a perfectly-matched concealer camouflages under-eye darkness and deeper imperfections. The unique formula is infused with SPF-15 sunscreen that simultaneously protects skin, leaving it smooth and radiant.

name: Flower Crown Eau de Parfum, 100ml
description: TFK, The Fragrance Kitchen is a Kuwaiti based fragrance house that was born of childhood memories and sensory memories. Part of the collection, the Flower Crown captivates the senses with a vibrant lemon accord, joined by rose and balanced by musk.

name: Juicy Date Crushed Liquid Lip Lipstick
description: The newest addition to Bobbi Brown’s line, the Crushed Liquid Lip marries the texture of liquid lipstick with the feel of a balm and the luster of a gloss. This moisturising formula is enriched with a superfruit blend of cranberry, blueberry and raspberry extracts for nourishing comfort that hydrates the lips and keeps them soft and plump all day. Intense, vibrant and pure colour pigments provide flawless coverage and long-lasting wear.

name: Bitter Sweet Crushed Liquid Lip Lipstick
description: The newest addition to Bobbi Brown’s line, the Crushed Liquid Lip marries the texture of liquid lipstick with the feel of a balm and the luster of a gloss. This moisturising formula is enriched with a superfruit blend of cranberry, blueberry and raspberry extracts for nourishing comfort that hydrates the lips and keeps them soft and plump all day. Intense, vibrant and pure colour pigments provide flawless coverage and long-lasting wear.

name: Haute Cocoa Crushed Liquid Lip Lipstick
description: The newest addition to Bobbi Brown’s line, the Crushed Liquid Lip marries the texture of liquid lipstick with the feel of a balm and the luster of a gloss. This moisturising formula is enriched with a superfruit blend of cranberry, blueberry and raspberry extracts for nourishing comfort that hydrates the lips and keeps them soft and plump all day. Intense, vibrant and pure colour pigments provide flawless coverage and long-lasting wear.

name: Big Apple Crushed Liquid Lip Lipstick
description: The newest addition to Bobbi Brown’s line, the Crushed Liquid Lip marries the texture of liquid lipstick with the feel of a balm and the luster of a gloss. This moisturising formula is enriched with a superfruit blend of cranberry, blueberry and raspberry extracts for nourishing comfort that hydrates the lips and keeps them soft and plump all day. Intense, vibrant and pure colour pigments provide flawless coverage and long-lasting wear.

name: Golden Touche Eclat High Coverage Concealer
description: French luxury fashion house YSL's Touche Eclat concealer was first created in 1992 and became so popular that one is sold every ten seconds somewhere in the world. With concealing, brightening and highlighting properties, this little tube may be the most effective product in your make-up artillery. The silky formula blends into the skin without any glittery fanfare - expect an enhanced complexion with a natural, luminous finish.

name: Warm Toffee Touche Eclat High Coverage Concealer
description: YSL's Touche Eclat Le Teint is one of the luxury French designer's best-selling foundations - and with good reason. The light-weight formula is tried and true, loved by make-up artists and aficionados around the world for its full coverage and ability to stay in place all day. Luminous pigments, a signature element of the formula, give the skin a radiant glow and a built-in sunscreen means all bases are covered.

name: Flame Powermatte Lip Pigment
description: The NARS Powermatte is a highly pigmented, full-coverage liquid lipstick that provides long-lasting, comfortable matte colour. The smooth liquid formula glides on with ease thanks to the custom doe-foot applicator - providing effortless precision in one swipe.

name: Black Opium Eau De Parfum, 50ml
description: Appeal to a rebellious side with YSL’s Black Opium Eau de Parfum. As the house’s newest fragrance, it offers a contemporary mix of floral and black coffee notes, blended with sweet vanilla. Wear it whenever to make a lasting impression.

name: TECHMERINO™ French Terry Sweatpants
description:
Z Zegna's TECHMERINO™ French Terry Sweatpants will accompany early-morning workouts with a high performance level and relaxed sleekness.

• The clean, neutral shade palette matches the design's understated silhouette even more

• The elastic waistband offers a comfortable, personalised fit

• The superfine merino wool composition provides breathability and comfort throughout active days

name: Nude Finish Tinted Moisturizer SPF15 - Medium to Dark, 50ml
description: Get the ultimate nude look with this lightweight, creamy moisturiser by Bobbi Brown that covers unevenness and infuses skin with refreshing, sustained hydration. The ultra-light formula provides just enough coverage to make skin look like its best (that means freckles show through, but redness and small marks disappear), while also moisturising the skin for a plump finish. SPF15 provides perfect everyday protection, and skin looks like skin, but softer, smoother and naturally radiant.

name: Nude Finish Tinted Moisturizer SPF15 - Dark, 50ml
description: Get the ultimate nude look with this lightweight, creamy moisturiser by Bobbi Brown that covers unevenness and infuses skin with refreshing, sustained hydration. The ultra-light formula provides just enough coverage to make skin look like its best (that means freckles show through, but redness and small marks disappear), while also moisturising the skin for a plump finish. SPF15 provides perfect everyday protection, and skin looks like skin, but softer, smoother and naturally radiant.

name: Leather Oud Eau De Parfum, 100ml
description: Leather Oud Eau De Parfume takes inspiration from when new fragrance oils would be delivered to Floris in small leather cases, adding their scent to the overall aroma of the essences as they were opened. The fresh new leather compliments and highlights the smoky aspects of the Oud oil. Radiating contemporary amber notes complete the balance adding intensity to the woody base accord.

name: Jacquard Pearl-Embellished Skirt
description: Poca & Poca's skirt is perfectly sized for your little girl. It's crafted from jacquard cut to a tulip shape and is decorated with pearl embellishment.Pair with a matching top and it is an adorable outfit to add to your girl's early wardrobe.

name: Cropped Jacket
description: Poca & Poca create sophisticated designs for little girls who love to dream. This chic cropped jacket is perfect for slipping on over party dresses on cold day or dressing up a more simple ensemble. It's handcrafted in Poland from tweed with lustrous trim that complements the elegant gold-tone buttons. Shrug this on over a sleeveless white top and blue jeans.

name: Tiered Skirt
description: This precious skirt from Poca & Poca's latest offering is the stuff of fairytales. Carefully handcrafted in Poland, the cascading layers of lustrous quilted fabric are designed to catch the light and lend a princess vibe. The skirt closes with a concealed zipper at the back. Pair it with a sleeveless white top and white leather ballerina flats for a party-ready look.

name: Medici Rollerball Pen
description: Evoking the grandeur of the Rennaissance period, the Visconti Medici Rollerball Pen is a delight to behold. Crafted from Acrosilk to create a gleaming polished wood effect finish, it is lavished with historical references, from the eight-faceted barrel evokes the Baptistery of St.John to the symbol of Florence lily engraved on the ring. The sumptuous feel of the piece is further enhanced with rose-gold plated trims.

name: Diamond Radiance Jade Roller Travel Kit
description: KNESKO’s Diamond Radiance Jade Roller Kit utilises GEMCLINICAL® technology to deliver the healing power of diamond microparticles to the skin. The precious stone powder encourages skin to absorb the all-natural ingredients in the masks including marine collagen and hyaluronic acid for gentle exfoliation and a more glowing complexion. The white jade roller massages the skin, encouraging maximum absorption while gently rejuvenating the skin.

name: Côté Maquis Diffuser Oil Refill, 235ml
description: L’Objet blends old world techniques while finding innovation within the integrity of natural ingredients. The Côté Maquis Diffuser Oil Refill creates an amazing scent of salt and incense with a labdanum and cashmere wood base to beautify the air and lift the spirit.

name: Rose Noir Porcelain Diffuser Set
description: L’Objet blends old world techniques while finding innovation within the integrity of natural ingredients. The Rose Noir Porcelain Diffuser Set creates an amazing scent of pimento berry with white pepper, rose, tea and moss base to beautify the air and lift the spirit.

name: Dark Sports SPF50 BB Cream, 30ml
description: This quick-dry Sports BB protector from Shiseido delivers non-sticky, longer-lasting beauty. It rapidly dries sweat to prevent makeup from running, while reacting with water to improve UV protection. Ideal for women with active lifestyles, apply daily to give skin a natural, healthy, contoured look for a beautiful finish that lasts in the sun.

name: Medium Dark Sports HydroBB SPF 50+ Compact, 12g
description: Shiseido's Sports HydroBB Compact is an intelligent foundation that “wicks” away sweat to prevent makeup from getting sticky or fading while reacting with water to improve UV protection. Ideal for on-the-go lifestyles, it helps to give skin a natural, lustrous & contoured look and provides long wear that resists the sun and outdoor activities.

name: Sports Invisible Protective Mist SPF 50, 150ml
description: Designed to provide optimum sun protection, the Shiseido Sports Invisible Protective Mist is ideal for those who lead active lifestyles. Whether playing tennis, yachting or simply relaxing outdoors, the lightweight, water-resistant spray feels dry on application to the skin and delivers rich hydration to the face and body.

name: Power Fabric Concealer 7.5, 6ml
description: Featuring high coverage with a blendable, seamless application, the Giorgio Armani Power Fabric Concealer is the perfect addition to the line's foundation for creating a flawless base. The concealer has a lightweight velvet finish and a longwear formula that prevents creasing or dryness. Cover any discolouration and imperfection for a bright, smooth complexion.

name: Power Fabric Concealer 12, 6ml
description: Featuring high coverage with a blendable, seamless application, the Giorgio Armani Power Fabric Concealer is the perfect addition to the line's foundation for creating a flawless base. The concealer has a lightweight velvet finish and a longwear formula that prevents creasing or dryness. Cover any discolouration and imperfection for a bright, smooth complexion.

name: Power Fabric Compact #2, 9g
description: Being a cult favourite alongside Giorgio Armani's other foundations, the Power Fabric Compact combines full coverage with a lightweight, slightly luminous finish. Upon application, the foundation gently melts into the skin, conceals discolouration and enhances the skin's natural glow. With an added SPF 25 filter, this foundation offers daily UVA and UVB protection, making it an ideal travel makeup essential.

name: Power Fabric Compact #3, 9g
description: Being a cult favourite alongside Giorgio Armani's other foundations, the Power Fabric Compact combines full coverage with a lightweight, slightly luminous finish. Upon application, the foundation gently melts into the skin, conceals discolouration and enhances the skin's natural glow. With an added SPF 25 filter, this foundation offers daily UVA and UVB protection, making it an ideal travel makeup essential.

name: The Cleansing Lotion, 200ml
description: This milky emulsion purifies and softens, leaving skin delicately cleansed. Gentle enough to remove eye makeup, this cleanser brings the complexion a sense of calm and nourishing purity.

name: The Mist, 100ml
description: Formulated with marine botanical extracts to instantly refresh and awaken. A spritz of this revitalizing treatment helps skin feel energized and revived on contact. A live internal magnet helps continually charge the ingredients for optimal results.

name: Good Girl Dot Drama Eau De Parfum, 80ml
description: Carolina Herrera's Good Girl Dot Drama Eau De Parfum is an exclusive collector edition of the best-selling feminine fragrance. Presented in a chic gold-heeled polka dot stiletto, it shines a spotlight on the duality of the modern femme fatale, playful and sensual with top notes of sweet almond, an honest heart of tuberose and a sweet contrasting base of roasted tonka beans and cocoa. A must-have for fans of the scent, it would make a charming gift for someone special.

name: Zip-Detail  Denim Jeans
description:
Subtle details are key to Alexander McQueen’s collections and this season the denim jean gets a modern update.

• They're made from soft cotton with natural stretch for long-lasting comfort

• They're a classic design – elevated by the placement of the zips

• Finished with three pockets on the front and two at the back to store everyday essentials

name: Harness Cotton Poplin Shirt
description:
Get set for the new season with Alexander McQueen's sleek shirt.

• Made from cotton poplin which provides durability and comfort

• It's a classic design – elevated by the placement of the non-functional harness detail

• The comfortable cut doesn't interfere with movement

name: Eagle Logo Polo T-Shirt
description:
This Emporio Armani polo is a classic choice to update your little one's casual wardrobe.

• It's crafted from a soft cotton blend that's breathable and comfortable

• Striped polo collar and cuffs lend a contemporary edge

• Signature eagle logo print at the chest adds the brand's trademark hint of luxury

name: Grainy Leather Business Laptop Bag
description:
This Giorgio Armani Business Laptop Bag is an essential and ultra-stylish accessory for the modern professional.

• Crafted in Italy from premium leather with a canvas lining

• Sleek minimalistic design features a signature embossed logo and opens with a two-way zip

• Top handles and adjustable shoulder straps allow various carrying options

name: Logo-Print Baby Bottle & Pacifier Set
description:
Emporio Armani's Baby collection, including the Logo-Print Baby Bottle & Pacifier Set is a must-have, adorned by the house's signature detailing.

• Synonymous with luxury, the label's signature eagle motif is printed on all parts of the set

• Set contains four essentials including two different, practical bottle sizes

• Made from a durable, lasting material

name: Uomo Eau de Toilette, 100ml
description: Revel in the charms of the Uomo Eau de Toilette from Roberto Cavalli. Its distinctively Eastern scent is headlined by notes of black velvet, honey, lavender, and is finished with strong cedar wood. It's sure to highlight the true essence of masculinity.

name: Yellow-Gold & Turquoise-Enamel Al Hobb Charm Necklace
description: The Gold & Turquoise-Enamel Al Hobb Charm Necklace from Bil Arabi is a lovely, classy piece that is sure to make a lasting impression. The turquoise enamel Al Hobb calligraphy charms add a colourful touch of style to the classic gold chain. It pairs wonderfully with a white, ruffled dress.

name: Yellow-Gold & Green-Enamel N Ring
description: Make a statement in the Gold & Green-Enamel N Ring from Bil Arabi. The 18kt yellow gold band is complemented by the striking green enamel motif of the Arabic letter "N". It pairs well with other yellow gold jewelry with emerald accents.

name: Lace-Trimmed Cotton T-Shirt
description:
Craig Green's T-Shirt will work with most any of the colours in the wardrobe; ensuring it will be a must-have staple for the new season.

• Made from cotton which provides durability and comfort

• It's a classic design – elevated by the placement of the lace-up detail at neckline

• The comfortable cut doesn't interfere with movement

name: Quilted Worker Jacket
description:
Craig Green's unique worker jacket exhibits the label's rebellious yet contemporary approach to the iconic style.

• Quilted design for added warmth and luxury touch

• Adjustable waist-tie for a personalized fit

• Four exterior pockets and inner pockets ensuring ample room for essentials

name: Levy Patent Leather Boot.
description: Gianvito Rossi's Levy patent boot is a season essential for the contemporary woman's wardrobe defining elegance with every stride. Expertly crafted from Nappa leather for an elegant look, the leather insole will keep feet comfortable and cool. Style with an evening party dress to polish the chic ensemble.

name: Garden Hand Balm, 40ml
description: Thegarden Hand Balm bygoutal is enriched with shea butter and camellia oil, known for their moisturizing and protective properties. Instantly melting onto the skin, it procures a nourishing sensation that instantly soothes the hands without leaving agreasy film. Its fragrance immediately sweeps one away to an Englishgarden, while its softness creates the impression of slipping the hands into velvetgloves.

name: Trophy 8CC Bi-Fold Leather Wallet
description:
Ensure cards are well organised with this luxury Roderer bi-fold wallet.

• The Italian calf leather is polished in a grained effect

• Brands metal logo adorns the front of the wallet and features embossed internally

• The leather lining encompasses eight card slots, two slip pockets and two bill compartments ensuring ample room for essentials

name: Cologne Absolute Eau De Parfum, 100ml
description: Tom Daxon Cologne Absolute Eau De Parfum was created on the principle that a cologne should be universal; a trusted staple for anyone who simply wishes to smell good. Distilling this ideal in every sense of the word the perfumiers produced this Eau de Parfum strength cologne that lasts all day and allows the wealth of noble ingredients to shine through

name: Iridium Eau De Parfum, 100ml
description: The Iridium Eau De Parfum by Tom Daxon is the fragrance equivalent of charcoal coloured cashmere. Created in 2013, it melds the powdery sophisticated of precious iris with a strong silvery spine of crisp cedarwood, aromatic juniper and spicy angelica notes.

name: Le Sel De La Terre 7 Eau De Parfum, 100ml
description: Zesty and full of life, this Thomas Kosmala, Le Sel De La Terre invigorates those who wear it. The subtle tones effortlessly combine fruity and earthy highlights for an aroma that can be worn daily and will not overpower the senses. Gently spritz on for an instantaneous elegant scent.

name: Skin Caviar Eye Lift Cream, 20ml
description: La Prairie's Skin Caviar Eye Lift Cream is a luxurious formula created to reawaken the eye, lifting and firming the entire eye area including the eyebrow. Two exclusive formulas are combined with the press of the pump: one encapsulated in La Prairie’s iconic caviar beads, the other in an innovative gel-cream emulsion. Include it in your skincare routine to restore elasticity, reduce dark shadows and do away with puffiness and dryness.

name: Tropical Citronella Travel Candle
description: The Tropical Citronella Teravel Candle from luxury label Montroi is expertly formulated to soothe and calm. The blend of citronella, eucalyptus, lemongrass and lavender revitalises and has a practical element: the travel candle will repel mosquitos and other insects.

name: Thin Classic Fireworks Diamond Bangle
description: This Suzanne Kalan Thin Classic Fireworks Bangle illustrates the designer's aptitude in creating timelessly appealing jewellery. Part of the signature collection, this slim bangle is exquisitely handcrafted from 18kt rose gold scattered with diamond baguettes. Slip it on and watch how it instantly elevates the glamour of any outfit.

name: Fireworks Rainbow Bar Necklace
description: Suzanne Kalan's Fireworks Rainbow Necklace infuses the designer's signature asymmetrical lines with vibrant colour. Handcrafted in the USA, this piece is characterised by round diamonds and sapphire baguettes set in 18kt yellow gold. The timeless design will make this a prized accessory for seasons to come.

name: The Moon Eau de Parfum, 100ml
description: Developed by perfumer Julien Rasquinet, Frederic Malle's The Moon Eau de Parfum is an exquisite blend that is sure to mesmerise. The oriental fragrance opens with sparkling fruity notes thatgently reveal a floral heart beforegiving in to oud and leather undertones. Long-lasting and opulent, its aroma lingers all day long enveloping the wearer in sheer luxury.

name: Fireworks Shimmer Diamond Earrings
description: Suzanne Kalan's Fireworks Shimmer Earrings lend the designer's signature twist to the classic hoops. Meticulously handcrafted in the USA, the exquisite pair features baguette and round diamonds set in 18kt yellow gold create a captivating interplay between symmetry and asymmetry. Their subtle elegance makes them a chic complement to everyday ensembles.

name: Skeleton Bracelet 41.5mm Watch
description: D1 Milano’s Skeleton Watch is one piece that's worth the investment. The watch has a skeleton Japanese movement in a 41.5mm stainless steel case and is finished with a durable link bracelet with classic clasp fastening. Slip it on against casual weekend looks as a refined finishing touch.

name: Ghida Arabic Coffee Cups, Set of 6
description: The Arabic tradition of serving coffee to guests is centuries old, and begins with a clicking of small cups. Crafted in porcelain, the Ghida Arabic cups are decorated with the wishes of "Al Ikbal, Al Ishraq", meaning "Prosperity and Light", in gold-tone calligraphy. The set is presented in a Silsal gift box complete with a satin ribbon and includes a gift card.

name: Dynamic Suede Boat Shoes
description:
It's the refined detailing that makes the Dynamic Suede Boat Shoes from Mengloria an ideal option for business appointments, travel and social engagements.

• Expertly made from supple Italian suede with unwavering attention to detail

• A durable construction finished with a rubber sole for comfort

• Lined with leather to keep feet fresh all day long

name: Brooks 47 Acetate Sunglasses
description: Opt for classic summer style with Garrett Leight California's Brooks 47 sunglasses. The rounded-square frames are made from lightweight acetate and fitted with blue tinted lenses with anti-reflective coating and UV protection. A keyhole bridge design ensures that this pair sits comfortably on the nose.

name: L’Essentiel Naturalglow Foundation, 30ml
description: L’Essentiel Naturalglow Foundation byguerlain is a long-wear liquid foundation with 97% naturally-derived ingredients, blended to deliver buildable coverage and a naturalglow finish. The innovative formula is enriched with skincare benefits to hydrate and balance the skin. The silky, smooth texture becomes one with the skin and complexion looks perfected, luminous, and fresh.

name: 035W Beige Dore L’Essentiel Naturalglow Foundation, 30ml
description: L’Essentiel Naturalglow Foundation byguerlain is a long-wear liquid foundation with 97% naturally-derived ingredients, blended to deliver buildable coverage and a naturalglow finish. The innovative formula is enriched with skincare benefits to hydrate and balance the skin. The silky, smooth texture becomes one with the skin and complexion looks perfected, luminous, and fresh.

name: Abeille Royale Cataplasm Mask, x4
description: A luxurious essential for relaxed weekends and pamper days, the Abeille Royale Cataplasm Mask isguerlain's latest-generation mask for minimising the visible signs of aging. Smoothing while promoting tissue firmness, the mask instantly hydrates and plumps the skin,giving it a naturalglow. After applying the mask, the complexion feels soothed, luminous and rested.

name: Rougeg Lipstick Refill, 3.5g
description: Guerlain's Rougeg Lipstick Refill delivers the ultimate luxury of customizable lips. With a blend of black seed oil and intense pigments, the semi-matte formula ensures the perfect balance between hydration and vibrant colour. It is enriched with hyaluronic acid and blurring powders to help smooth and plump up the lips.

name: L'Homme Ideal Cool Eau de Toilette, 100ml
description: L'Homme Ideal Cool Eau de Toilette byguerlain is inspired by relaxed masculine elegance and luxury. The olfactory seal of almond is restructured with freshness around three chords: the effervescence of the notes of bergamot and orange, together with the freshness of the mint. The refinement of a heart note that aligns the neroli with the aquatic notes, while a background note of patchouli and vetiver brings character and depth to this fragrance

name: Deep Terracotta Touch Loose Powder
description: Designed to keep the complexion matte with a hint of a naturalglow, the Deep Terracotta Touch Loose Powder byguerlain has a weightless, velvety finish. A mix of corrective mattifying beads and radiance-revealing flakes blend to create an even, flawless canvas enhanced with a sun-kissed feel. With a practical applicator, the powder's on-the-go packaging makes it perfect for weekendgetaways.

name: KissKiss Liquid Matte Lip-Colour, 5.8ml
description: KissKiss Liquid Lip Colour byguerlain has a matte finish that dresses lips in a comfortable, long-wearing and pigmented formula. A subtle blend of intense colour and powerful active ingredients, it takes care of the lips. Cranberry oil and Japanese pine oil help nourish and protect to preserve hydration while hyaluronic acid, delivers volume and plumpness to the lips.

name: KissKiss Liquidglitter Lip-Colour, 5.8ml
description: KissKiss Liquid Lip Colour byguerlain has aglitter finish to create makeup looks that dazzle like never before. A subtle blend of intense colour and powerful active ingredients, it takes care of the lips and adds luxurious sparkle. It contains cranberry oil and Japanese pine oil to help nourish, protect and hydrate with hyaluronic acid to enhance plumpness and volume.

name: KissKiss Liquid Matte Lip-Colour, 5.8ml
description: KissKiss Liquid Lip Colour byguerlain has a matte finish that dresses lips in a comfortable, long-wearing and pigmented formula. A subtle blend of intense colour and powerful active ingredients, it takes care of the lips. Cranberry oil and Japanese pine oil help nourish and protect to preserve hydration while hyaluronic acid, delivers volume and plumpness to the lips.

name: KissKiss Roselip Midnight Crush
description: Subtly coloured for a romantic and natural feel, the KissKiss Roselip Tinted Balm in Midnight Citrus is an elegant addition to everyday make up routines. Inspired by rose blossoms, the balm features a bright shade that adds a soft, delicate hue to the lips with a naturalglow. Its jojoba oil and hyaluronic acid ingredients ensure it's just as hydrating and plumping as it is beautiful.

name: Monguerlain Eau de Parfum Intense, 100ml
description: Guerlain continues to expand the Monguerlain range with the Monguerlain Intense Eau de Parfum. Inspired by Angelina Jolie and exuding a confident air of modern femininity, the woody oriental fragrance blends lavender and mandarin top notes with a patchouli and sandalwood base. The scent is tied together by vanilla heart notes — one of the brand’s most notable olfactory signatures.

name: Abeille Royale Day Cream - Normal to Combination Skin, 50ml
description: Containing the Pure Royal Concentrate ingredient, an exclusive formula toguerlain, the Abeille Royale Day Cream holds a range of firming and soothing benefits. Hydrating the skin without having an oily feel to it, the cream absorbs quickly while leaving the complexion with a natural, healthglow. The cream, andguerlain's entire Abeille Royale promotes tissue firmness, making it a beautiful choice for those with aging skin.

name: Ms. 101 Clip-On Wings
description: The Ms. 101 Clip-On Wings are a beguiling accessory from Dubai-based brand Le Marais 101. Beautifully crafted in premium leather, they feature a quilted finish that lends textural dimension to this eye-catching design. Fasten them onto a new-season bag to add unique personality to day and evening edits.

name: Ms. Divine Sinsation Clip-On Snake
description: Le Marais 101's Ms. Divine Sinsation Clip-On Snake is an alluring accessory that can be used to update any bag. The sleek serpent motif is handmade from premium leather adorned with sparkling Swarovski crystals. Whether worn with day or evening edits, it will create a glamorous and unforgettable impression.

name: CH Bad Boy Eau De Toilette, 100ml
description: The masculine fragrance by Carolina Herrera, Bad Boy is a sleek and sophisticated scent for the unique contemporary man who dares to embrace all the challenges of life. The vagueness of Tonka Bean, Cacao and Ambar Wood contrasts with the radiance of Sage, Black and White Pepper and Bergamot notes for a distinct scent. The charming aroma of Bad Boy is collected in an extremely distinctive flacon shaped like a lightning bolt.

name: Elemental Logo Print Backpack
description:
Nike's Elemental Backpack is a must-have accessory for your youngster's school books, sports kit and more.

• Crafted from hardwearing canvas with a logo print and patches

• External pocket, spacious main compartment and matching pencil case keeps the essentials organised

• Adjustable shoulder straps allow for a customised fit

name: Regenerating Night Cream, 40ml
description: The Grown Alchemist Regenerating Night Cream is a rich advanced facial moisturiser formulated with a potent synergistic blend of Peptides, Antioxidants, Vitamins, Hyaluronic Acid, Essential Omega Fatty Acids. It helps to restore skin elasticity, noticeably reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, softening and smoothing while boosting hydration and transforming the complexion for a more youthful look.

name: Saratoga Automatic Watch
description: First launched in 1986, Concord's Saratoga collection has consistently delivered refined design for contemporary tastes. This sleek edition is an automatic model of timeless elegance with a stainless steel and 18kt gold case that melds with integrated lugs at the link bracelet, has a stamped dial which features a date window and polished Roman numerals. A striking example of quality craftsmanship, this timepiece would make a charming gift for a loved one or business associate.

name: Love Heart Beat Automatic Diamond Watch
description: This Frederique Constant watch offers a playful feminine twist on a classic design. Crafted in Switzerland, the round polished stainless steel case holds a diamond-accented Mother of pearl dial featuring a stunning "Love" motif and a visible mechanism. The luxurious and romantic details make this timepiece into a memorable gift.

name: Valentino Garavani  VLTN 7 Calfskin Sneakers
description:
Accentuate relaxed edits with these luxury Valentino Garavani VLTN 7 Sneakers.

• Contrasting seven bands with rubber effect showcasing the brand's signature VLTN logo

• Brand's logo patch is embossed on the heel tab of the smooth calfskin leather

• The durable rubber sole offers a good grip on all surfaces

name: EA7 Sneakers in Mesh & Faux Leather
description:
Sneakers have come a long way from the gym - these EA7 ones from Emporio Armani are reserved for stylishly casual days.

• The tonal design is crafted in faux leather and mesh panels with contrast logo accents

• The contrasting rubber sole makes for comfortable days walking around.

• They will suit the brand's sweatpants for a full athleisure look

name: Gilda Long Slip Dress
description: The FW19 collection Gilda Long Slip Dress showcases Gilda & Pearl's signature blend of refined style and meticulous craftsmanship. Made from lustrous and soft silk satin, the lace inserts below the bust and side splits add to its allure. Top with the Gilda Robe to create an exquisite matched ensemble.

name: Clara Silk & Lace Tap Bottoms
description: The Clara Tap Pants by Gilda & Pearl bring a luxurious sensation to relaxed moments. Crafted by hand in lustrous and smooth silk satin, these dainty shorts are exquisitely finished with lace accents. Match with other pieces from the British brand's FW19 lingerie collection to create a captivating total look.

name: Silk & Lace Short Slip Dress
description: This elegant short slip dress radiates with Gilda & Pearl's luxurious vibe. A delicate French leavers lace panel compliments the silk satin fabric that effortlessly showcases the feminine fit and flare. Wear under an elegant gown or with a luxury robe.

name: Sap Moss™ Weightless Hydration Conditioner, 200ml
description: This silicone-free detangling conditioner by Aveda is formulated with a blend of Iceland moss and larch tree sap extract which hydrates hair without weighing it down. The enriching formula infuses hair with weightless moisture while helping tame frizz, leaving hair feeling perfectly quenched and manageable.

name: Pour Homme Eau De Toilette, 90ml
description: Bottega Veneta Pour Homme Eau De Toilette is a fresh, intriguing and understated fragrance, where distinctive signature notes of precious Labdanum, Fir Balsam and Bergamot blend into a sensuous leathery signature with the power to enchant. Woven with rare and noble materials, the fragrance, a woody, aromatic leathery scent, takes us on an inspiring journey in time and place.

name: Illusione For Him Eau De Toilette, 90ml
description: Bottega Veneta Illusione For Him Eau De Toilette captures a suspended moment between dream and reality. The masculine woody, citrus, aromatic fragrance, combines sparkling colours of Italian citrus with lemon and bitter orange essences. A fresh element is added with fir basalm and white cedarwood, with powerful notes of vetiver and sensual tonka bean completing the accomplished composition

name: N.10 Fuchsia Vibrant Le Rouge Deep Velvet Lipstick, 34g
description: Le Rouge Deep Velvet embodies the chic and sensorial attributes of the Givenchy Maison. Covered in a sumptuous red velvet case echoing its powdery matte finish, it is the ultimate couture signature to your look. Comforting, soft and lightweight, the generous powdery texture glides effortlessly on the lip, delivering an ultra matte color from the very first stroke, with a super thin film. Comfortable and long-wearing for 12 hours, the formula is infused with mango butter for absolute comfort and an intense makeup result.

name: Minea Metallic Leather Flats
description: Jimmy Choo's Minea Flats combine understated elegance with a laid-back approach.
